translation.en: Eliza?
translation.zh: 伊丽莎？

translation.en: I'm thinking about being vegetarian again.
translation.zh: 我真的在认真考虑再次开始吃素

translation.en: -Eliza. -Do you realize eating meat
translation.zh: -伊丽莎-你知道吃肉

translation.en: is worse than driving an SUV for a year?
translation.zh: 比开一年越野车对环境的破坏还要大？

translation.en: Eliza, am I fitting?
translation.zh: 伊丽莎 我停得进去吗？

translation.en: I'm parking, asshole!
translation.zh: 我在停车 混蛋！

translation.en: -I can't believe that's true. -It's true, Dad.
translation.zh: -我不敢相信你刚说的话是真的-是真的 爸爸

translation.en: I'll send you the podcast.
translation.zh: 我会把播客链接发给你

translation.en: -I don't think I'm fitting. -I'm telling you,
translation.zh: -我觉得我停不进去-我告诉你

translation.en: it's a big thing we can do for the environment.
translation.zh: 吃素是我们能为环境做的一大贡献

translation.en: Let's look it up.
translation.zh: 让我们研究一下

translation.en: But not while I'm pulling this maneuver.
translation.zh: 但别在我停车的时候谈

translation.en: -It's too small a space. -Shit.
translation.zh: -后面地方太小-该死

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Put the Mets game on.
translation.zh: 打开大都会队的比赛

translation.en: I splurged and got the satellite.
translation.zh: 我花了不少钱 才弄到卫星广播台

translation.en: Nice, turn it up.
translation.zh: 不错 声音开大点儿

translation.en: I put this on a tape for you when you were, like, 12.
translation.zh: 我是在你大概12岁的时候专门为你把这歌录在磁带上的

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: Shit! Was that a spot?
translation.zh: 该死！那是个车位吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, he's taking it. -How did I miss that?
translation.zh: -没错 有人正打算停那儿-我怎么就没注意到呢？

translation.en: -Fucking shit! -Just go around.
translation.zh: -该死！-周围再转转

translation.en: We've been around. I'm gonna go further east.
translation.zh: 我们一直在周围转悠我得再往东边走走

translation.en: How did I do this wrong?
translation.zh: 我哪里错了？

translation.en: -It's okay, Dad. We'll just garage it. -Know how much it is to garage it here?
translation.zh: -没事的 爸 我们就停车库里嘛-你知道这里停车费多少钱吗？

translation.en: If we garage it, you can't go to college.
translation.zh: 如果我们停在里面就没你上大学的钱了

translation.en: -I'll pay half. -I'm not taking your money.
translation.zh: -我出一半-我是不会让你出钱的

translation.en: What's the matter with me? I'm usually very good at this.
translation.zh: 我今天到底怎么了？平时我找个车位简直易如反掌

translation.en: -It's okay. -I'm an extremely good parker.
translation.zh: -没事的-我超会停车的

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Now, I'm getting gun-shy. I'm overthinking it.
translation.zh: 现在我总是杞人忧天 想太多

translation.en: -Dad... -I'm hot.
translation.zh: -爸…-好热啊

translation.en: -Wait until we're stopped! -It's interfering with my mobility.
translation.zh: -等我们停好车再脱！-这外套让我行动不便

translation.en: -Let me help you. -These the people who were behind us?
translation.zh: -我来帮你-这些是刚才跟在我们后面的车吗？

translation.en: -I don't know. -Keep the jacket right-side up.
translation.zh: -我不知道-把外套右边露在上面

translation.en: My wallet's in there.
translation.zh: 我钱包在那儿

translation.en: -This song is distracting. -It's too good.
translation.zh: -这首歌让人分心-太好听了

translation.en: It is too good.
translation.zh: 是很好听

translation.en: There's so much construction in Manhattan.
translation.zh: 曼哈顿真是高楼林立

translation.en: They're just endlessly building.
translation.zh: 他们还要盖个不停

translation.en: I used to go dancing around here at Danceteria, me and your Uncle Matthew.
translation.zh: 我以前经常和你马修叔叔在这里的夜店跳舞

translation.en: -Now it's all banks. -You guys went dancing together?
translation.zh: -现在这里全是银行了-你俩还一起跳过舞？

translation.en: We went together, we didn't dance together.
translation.zh: 我们只是一起去 但是没一起跳过

translation.en: For a short time in the '80s, we hung out.
translation.zh: 80年代有一小段时间我们经常厮混在一起

translation.en: I had moves, I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 跟你说吧 我也很会跳的

translation.en: Is this a museum now? Everything's glass.
translation.zh: 这里现在是博物馆了吗？都是玻璃

translation.en: Do you like the photographer Cindy Sherman?
translation.zh: 你喜欢摄影师辛迪·谢尔曼吗？

translation.en: Marcus and I went to the Cindy Sherman show at MoMA last week.
translation.zh: 上周我和马库斯去了辛迪·谢尔曼在现代艺术博物馆举办的摄影展

translation.en: Yes, I like Cindy Sherman.
translation.zh: 没错 我喜欢辛迪·谢尔曼

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I told you about Cindy Sherman two years ago.
translation.zh: 我两年前就跟你说过辛迪·谢尔曼了

translation.en: I don't remember.
translation.zh: 我怎么不记得

translation.en: I did, and you had absolutely no interest.
translation.zh: 我真的跟你说过但你当时丝毫没有兴趣

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: When Marcus tells you, suddenly you listen?
translation.zh: 怎么马库斯一讲你就马上听进去了呢？

translation.en: I'm telling you, I got good recommendations.
translation.zh: 告诉你 我的推荐都很不错

translation.en: I mean, I have a few years on you.
translation.zh: 我是说 我过的桥比你走的路要多

translation.en: Was that a spot? What did the sign say?
translation.zh: 那是个车位吗？牌子上写的什么？

translation.en: I'm trying to see.
translation.zh: 我正看呢

translation.en: -Quick, Eliza! -I find parking signs confusing.
translation.zh: -快点儿 伊丽莎！-停车标志让人摸不着头脑

translation.en: -Okay, what's today? -This asshole's on my tail.
translation.zh: -好吧 今天是星期几？-这混蛋一直跟着我

translation.en: -It was a good space. -Can I back up?
translation.zh: -那地方不错-我可以倒车吗？

translation.en: -I don't think so. -Shit, he's on my tail.
translation.zh: -不行-该死 他堵在我后面

translation.en: -I got to go around? -We should really just garage it.
translation.zh: -我得绕过去？-我们真该停里面

translation.en: -Son of a bitch! -Dad, stop yelling in the car!
translation.zh: -混蛋！-爸 别在车里嚷嚷！

translation.en: He cannot hear you, okay?
translation.zh: 他听不见 知道吗？

translation.en: -Only I can hear you. -It's "Nobody Can Fucking Drive Day!"
translation.zh: -只有我听得见-今天是“谁都别想开车日”！

translation.en: Hey! Shut the fuck up!
translation.zh: 嘿！闭嘴！

translation.en: Hello!
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: The outer door was ajar,
translation.zh: 外门半开着

translation.en: and the button on the foyer door was unlocked and pushed in.
translation.zh: 休息室门上的按钮没关而且按下去了

translation.en: Something smells weird.
translation.zh: 好奇怪的味道

translation.en: -Oh, wow! Hello! Hi! -Down, Bruno! Bruno, down!
translation.zh: -哇！你好！-冷静点 布鲁诺！冷静点！

translation.en: -Whose dog is this? -Bruno!
translation.zh: -这是谁的狗？-布鲁诺！

translation.en: Maureen and I bought him from a very elegant apricot poodle farm
translation.zh: 我和莫琳从一个上等杏色贵宾犬场买回来的

translation.en: near the country house.
translation.zh: 就在郊区住宅附近

translation.en: Dad, the outer door was left open,
translation.zh: 爸爸 外门开着

translation.en: and someone pressed the button in on the foyer door.
translation.zh: 有人按了休息室门上的按钮

translation.en: Maureen is always doing something. Maureen!
translation.zh: 莫琳总是忙个不停 莫琳！

translation.en: -You got to be more careful. -Maureen!
translation.zh: -你以后得多留点儿心-莫琳！

translation.en: Brune! Maureen!
translation.zh: 布鲁诺 别叫了！莫琳！

translation.en: This house isn't very big, but she never seems to be able to hear me. Maureen!
translation.zh: 房子虽然不大但她总是听不到我说话 莫琳！

translation.en: -This isn't the country. -What?
translation.zh: -这里不是乡下-怎么了？

translation.en: -Did you leave the front door open? -For the Con Ed guy!
translation.zh: -是你把前门打开的吗？-电力公司公司有人要来！

translation.en: -That was three days ago. -Sorry we're late.
translation.zh: -三天前就有人来过了-抱歉我们来迟了

translation.en: We had to garage the car.
translation.zh: 我们得把车停好

translation.en: Dad had to sell me into child slavery to pay for it.
translation.zh: 爸爸得把我卖去当童工才付得起停车费

translation.en: -That's basically right. -Did you try East?
translation.zh: -基本上说对了-你试过停在东区吗？

translation.en: -Twice. -We did.
translation.zh: -试了两次-我们试过了

translation.en: Bruno! He does this elegant pirouette.
translation.zh: 布鲁诺！他会做优雅的脚尖旋转

translation.en: Dad... what happened to your face? Did you get into a fight?
translation.zh: 爸…你脸怎么了？是不是打架了？

translation.en: I was walking Bruno in the country,
translation.zh: 我和布鲁诺在田间散步

translation.en: when he lunged for a feral hare in the brush, and I tumbled forward.
translation.zh: 然后他冲向了草丛里的一个野兔让我摔了个跟头

translation.en: Shit. Did you see a doctor?
translation.zh: 该死 你看医生了吗？

translation.en: I'm fine. My joke is, "You should see the other dog."
translation.zh: 我没事 跟你讲个笑话吧“没有最惨 只有更惨”

translation.en: Good one, Grandpa.
translation.zh: 真好笑 爷爷

translation.en: Maureen won't even walk that path anymore.
translation.zh: 莫琳再也不会去那条路了

translation.en: -She was mauled by a buck. -A buck in the Berkshires?
translation.zh: -她被一头鹿撞了-伯克郡的鹿？

translation.en: A male deer.
translation.zh: 一头雄鹿

translation.en: -Really? -Maybe it was a big dog or a small boy.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-或许是条大狗或是一个小男孩

translation.en: In her indomitable way,
translation.zh: 凭着她那不服输的性子

translation.en: she survived with just a nasty raspberry on her knee, but her wallet was gone.
translation.zh: 她膝盖上磕破了一块儿 但钱包掉了

translation.en: -The Mets have relinquished the lead. -Shit.
translation.zh: -大都会队失去领先优势了-该死

translation.en: -Your sister's here. -They were tied when we were in the car.
translation.zh: -你姐姐在这儿-我们在车里的时候还是平局呢

translation.en: I could tell Dad wanted to say hi to you guys by himself.
translation.zh: 我猜爸爸想亲自给你们打招呼吧

translation.en: -When did you get here? -A couple hours ago.
translation.zh: -你什么时候到的？-几小时前吧

translation.en: -Thanks for showing up late. -Oh, let's...
translation.zh: -谢谢你们来得晚-我们…

translation.en: I made cookies, but I stepped in dog shit. I like your sweater.
translation.zh: 我做了饼干 但是我踩到狗屎了我喜欢你的毛衣

translation.en: Oh, thanks. I like your pin.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我喜欢你的胸针

translation.en: -Are you excited for college tomorrow? -Yeah, I really can't wait.
translation.zh: -明天就要上大学了 你激动吗？-嗯 我都等不及了

translation.en: Dad keeps saying he wishes he hadn't retired now
translation.zh: 爸爸总是说他希望自己现在还没退休

translation.en: so that you could take his class.
translation.zh: 这样你就可以上他的课了

translation.en: -I couldn't make sculptures. -She's very excited,
translation.zh: -我在雕塑方面没有天分-她好兴奋

translation.en: -which I'm trying not to take personally. -It's too intimidating.
translation.zh: -我对此尽量不去想太多-太吓人了

translation.en: I'm bad with transitions.
translation.zh: 我不太容易接受转变

translation.en: You don't leave the house. There are no transitions.
translation.zh: 那就别离开这个屋子这里根本没有任何转变

translation.en: Maureen is plastered.
translation.zh: 莫琳喝醉了

translation.en: Maureen, everyone's here! Come down!
translation.zh: 莫琳 大家都来了！快下来！

translation.en: Maureen's making shark.
translation.zh: 莫琳在做鲨鱼肉

translation.en: -I don't think I've ever had shark before. -Maureen's a real gourmand.
translation.zh: -我应该没吃过鲨鱼肉-莫琳是个真材实料的美食家

translation.en: -You're in for a treat. -She's been sober for six weeks.
translation.zh: -你一定不会失望的-她已经戒酒六周了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: I told her, "I don't like you when you drink."
translation.zh: 我告诉她：“我不喜欢你喝酒时的样子”

translation.en: She becomes a different person.
translation.zh: 她就完全变了

translation.en: I made her a deal, I said, "If you stop drinking, we'll get a dog."
translation.zh: 我跟她达成了协议 我说：“如果你戒酒 我们就养条狗”

translation.en: This is very handsome shellfish, Maureen.
translation.zh: 牡蛎看起来很美味 莫琳

translation.en: The Dad says you're gonna study film at college.
translation.zh: 老爹说你要学习电影专业

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Seems to be what everybody's doing these days.
translation.zh: 貌似这个专业很受人追捧

translation.en: I think The Dad hoped that you might follow in his footsteps
translation.zh: 我觉得老爹想要你继承他的衣钵

translation.en: and take sculpture.
translation.zh: 从事雕塑行业

translation.en: Well, I think it's good that she's doing her own thing.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 我觉得她做自己喜欢的事就很好

translation.en: Since Clarence had a stroke and I retired,
translation.zh: 克莱伦斯中风以及我退休后

translation.en: the art department at Bard has really suffered.
translation.zh: 巴德学院艺术系遭受到重创

translation.en: She's quite a good editor.
translation.zh: 她是个很棒的编辑

translation.en: So, now we have a sculptor and a filmmaker in the family.
translation.zh: 现在家里既有雕刻家又有电影制作人了

translation.en: And a musician.
translation.zh: 还有位音乐家

translation.en: And an accountant, which sounds uninteresting,
translation.zh: 还有位会计 这职业虽然听起来乏味

translation.en: but Matthew's the only one in the family who's figured out how to make money.
translation.zh: 但马修是家里唯一会赚钱的人

translation.en: Sign of the times.
translation.zh: 时代趋势指向标

translation.en: We're supposed to say "business manager."
translation.zh: 我们应该说“商务经理”

translation.en: I thought we would've had more artists in the family.
translation.zh: 我还以为家里会出更多艺术家

translation.en: -What about Dad? -I'm artistic.
translation.zh: -那我爸爸呢？-我有艺术天分

translation.en: Matthew showed interest in fine art and Danny had musical talent,
translation.zh: 马修对美术感兴趣丹尼在音乐方面有天赋

translation.en: but Matthew was also talented musically and a wonderful mimic.
translation.zh: 但是马修在音乐方面有天分模仿方面就不必说了

translation.en: Jean, you showed interest in photography.
translation.zh: 琼 你对摄影感兴趣

translation.en: At Montessori, yeah.
translation.zh: 在蒙特梭利上学时是这样的

translation.en: In my office at Xerox, I'm known as the resident auteur.
translation.zh: 在施乐公司大家都知道我是常驻导演

translation.en: I make funny movies.
translation.zh: 我制作喜剧影片

translation.en: -For my coworkers' birthdays. -They're really good.
translation.zh: -为同事庆生-你制作的那些片子真的很好

translation.en: We have no idea what Jean does at Xerox.
translation.zh: 琼在施乐公司干什么 我们一无所知

translation.en: -I'm a facilities manager for special... -When was the last job you had, Danny?
translation.zh: -我是设备经理 负责管理特殊…-丹尼 你上一份工作是多久以前？

translation.en: -Those piano lessons. -Except for the piano lessons?
translation.zh: -给学生上钢琴课-除此之外呢？

translation.en: And there was that gig at Beefsteak Charlie's.
translation.zh: 还在查理牛排店表演过

translation.en: I haven't worked in...
translation.zh: 从伊丽莎出生后…

translation.en: -Since Eliza was born. -Danny was a house husband.
translation.zh: -我就不再出去工作了-丹尼是一个家庭主夫

translation.en: But now with the separation, he's gonna have to get a job.
translation.zh: 但是现在他离婚了就得出去找个工作

translation.en: You can't take alimony. That's not right.
translation.zh: 你不能拿赡养费 这样做是不对的

translation.en: What will you do for money?
translation.zh: 以后你打算怎么赚钱？

translation.en: Well, we sold the apartment, so we'll split that.
translation.zh: 我们卖了公寓 然后把这笔钱分了

translation.en: And I'll be staying here for a little, of course, while I figure it out.
translation.zh: 我会在这儿待一段时间等我想清楚为止

translation.en: -Thank you again. -While you're staying here,
translation.zh: -再次感谢-你待在这里的时候

translation.en: could you go through all the boxes upstairs
translation.zh: 可以去楼上的箱子里仔细翻一翻

translation.en: and take any posters or papers that you want from your childhood?
translation.zh: 把你想留下来的童年海报或者论文挑出来吗？

translation.en: Maureen is taking a fancy trip to Easter Island Monday with a group.
translation.zh: 莫琳周一要和一群人去复活节岛豪华游

translation.en: When I come back, we're gonna start throwing things away.
translation.zh: 我回来后 会把没用的东西丢出去

translation.en: -We lived in Queens with our mom. -We don't really have anything.
translation.zh: -我们和妈妈住在皇后区-这里基本没有我们的东西

translation.en: It's mostly Matt's stuff, but okay.
translation.zh: 基本上都是马修的东西但我会翻一翻的

translation.en: Matthew's coming out from the coast in a few weeks.
translation.zh: 要不了几周马修就要从西海岸回来了

translation.en: -He corresponded about meeting for lunch. -Matt is?
translation.zh: -他跟我写信说要一起吃午餐-是吗？

translation.en: He has some wealthy clients who are coming over Sunday
translation.zh: 他有几个有钱的客户周日过来

translation.en: to look at The Dad's work.
translation.zh: 看看老爹的作品

translation.en: -Matt does? -Apparently, they're admirers of mine.
translation.zh: -马修吗？-当然 他们都很崇拜我

translation.en: We never hear from him, and then suddenly poof.
translation.zh: 他从来没跟我们联系过然后他就突然要回来了

translation.en: That's not true. Matthew and I correspond quite frequently.
translation.zh: 不是的 我和马修经常通信

translation.en: Yeah, he texts with me.
translation.zh: 是的 我们发短信

translation.en: You guys text? About what?
translation.zh: 你们发短信？都聊什么？

translation.en: I don't know, things. Life.
translation.zh: 没什么特别的 就谈天论地 谈生活

translation.en: Maybe I'll try to see him when he's here.
translation.zh: 他回来后或许我该来拜访他一下

translation.en: He's only here for a day to see a client, he wants to see me during that time.
translation.zh: 他就在这儿待一天 见见客户在这期间他想见我

translation.en: Eliza, have more shark.
translation.zh: 伊丽莎 多吃点鲨鱼肉

translation.en: Maureen, give my granddaughter more shark.
translation.zh: 莫琳 再给我孙女来点鲨鱼肉

translation.en: You kids don't eat.
translation.zh: 小孩子不爱吃这东西

translation.en: It's amazing how much Matthew's clients make,
translation.zh: 如果跟老师或者护士比比

translation.en: when you think about what a teacher, or a nurse, or...
translation.zh: 那马修的客户真是赚得很多…

translation.en: I think I would've had greater success if I had been more fashionable.
translation.zh: 我就在想如果我当时更入时一些现在成就可能会更大

translation.en: Well, you were always out-of-step with the times.
translation.zh: 你总是与时代脱节啊

translation.en: That's true, I was a vanguard. L.J. Shapiro said that about me.
translation.zh: 没错 我就是时尚的前沿艾尔杰·夏皮罗就是这么说我的

translation.en: You know, L.J.'s having a retrospective at MoMA.
translation.zh: 艾尔杰正在纽约现代艺术博物馆举行回顾展

translation.en: Is he?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: L.J. was always very political.
translation.zh: 他的作品总是带有政治色彩

translation.en: He's not untalented, but he's a very skillful operator.
translation.zh: 他还是有些天赋的而且尤其精通人情世故

translation.en: You didn't play the game.
translation.zh: 这种事情你根本毫不感冒

translation.en: Do you think I should e-mail Matt about his visit?
translation.zh: 你觉得马特要来我需要提前给他写封邮件吗？

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 好呀

translation.en: I don't want to be presumptuous.
translation.zh: 我不想这么唐突

translation.en: He's your brother, Dan.
translation.zh: 他是你弟弟 丹

translation.en: Half.
translation.zh: 半个兄弟而已

translation.en: Isn't that when the Whitney bought a piece of yours?
translation.zh: 当时惠特尼不是买了一件你的作品吗？

translation.en: Yes, they were going to buy more work, too,
translation.zh: 是的 他们当时还打算多买一些

translation.en: but Bernie, my dealer at the time, didn't like the deal.
translation.zh: 但当时我的交易人伯尼对这个交易不太满意

translation.en: I probably shouldn't have listened to him.
translation.zh: 或许我当时不该听他的

translation.en: I don't know, he didn't respond the last time I reached out.
translation.zh: 不好说 我最后一次联系他的时候他没有回复

translation.en: When I called and wrote the Whitney about it, they couldn't find it.
translation.zh: 当我给惠特尼打电话或者写信提到它的时候 他们说找不到

translation.en: -It's there. -They can't find it.
translation.zh: -就在他们那里-他们找不到

translation.en: -Jean, damn it, they have the work! -Okay.
translation.zh: -琼 该死 作品在他们那里！-好

translation.en: It's lost.
translation.zh: 作品丢了

translation.en: The work looks stunning all together like this.
translation.zh: 把这些作品集中来看真是太令人震惊了

translation.en: Danny, you made this?
translation.zh: （哈罗德·迈耶罗维茨作品回顾展） -丹尼 这是你做的吗？-没错 我和琼一起完成的

translation.en: Jean and I did, yes.
translation.zh: -丹尼 这是你做的吗？-没错 我和琼一起完成的

translation.en: Harold Meyerowitz. A Retrospective.
translation.zh: 哈罗德·迈耶罗维茨 作品回顾展

translation.en: You send in the pictures and they make it for you.
translation.zh: 你只须把照片发给他们他们就会把册子做好

translation.en: Oh, Dad, Jean and I spoke to a woman at the museum at Bard.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我和琼在巴德学院的博物馆里跟一个女人聊过

translation.en: -Was that Hilma Federman? -Hilma, yes.
translation.zh: -是希尔玛·费德曼吗？-希尔玛 没错

translation.en: And there's some interest in doing a show there.
translation.zh: 他们有兴趣让你在那里举办展览

translation.en: Oh, that's the least they can do for you, after all those years you've given them.
translation.zh: 多年来你为他们贡献了那么多让你去那里办个展览是应该的

translation.en: I think with Eliza going this fall
translation.zh: 伊丽莎今年秋天就要去那儿读书了

translation.en: and your history as a teacher, we have a good shot.
translation.zh: 而且你还在那里教过书我们成功的可能性很高

translation.en: Danny, make sure Hilma sees the book.
translation.zh: 丹尼 一定要让希尔玛看到这本书

translation.en: A retrospective at this point would be a real feather in my cap,
translation.zh: 此时开回顾展真的大有益处

translation.en: and I think bring attention to the new work.
translation.zh: 能让大家注意到我的新作品

translation.en: The thing is, Dad, it would be part of a group show.
translation.zh: 爸爸 问题是你的展览只是联展的一部分

translation.en: Bard faculty.
translation.zh: 巴德学院教师作品联展

translation.en: A group show. No, that's essentially an insult.
translation.zh: 联展 不行 这简直是对我的侮辱

translation.en: I think Hilma's angry because I voted against her chairmanship.
translation.zh: 我觉得希尔玛之所以生我的气是因为我投票反对她当主席

translation.en: Tell Hilma no.
translation.zh: 告诉希尔玛我拒绝参加联展

translation.en: -Well, Hilma hasn't offered it yet. -When she does, tell her no.
translation.zh: -这个嘛 希尔玛还没发出邀请呢-那就等收到邀请后拒绝

translation.en: Maureen, where's the gourmet hummus?
translation.zh: 莫琳 鹰嘴豆泥在哪儿？

translation.en: It's upstairs, I think.
translation.zh: 应该在楼上吧

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: You'll always be my superstar
translation.zh: 你会一直是我心中的巨星

translation.en: You'll always be my number one
translation.zh: 你会一直是我心中最重要之人

translation.en: I'll always be your genius girl
translation.zh: 我会一直是你的天才女儿

translation.en: I'll never be your stupid son
translation.zh: 我不会成为你的傻儿子

translation.en: No, no
translation.zh: 不…

translation.en: You'll always be good at math
translation.zh: 你一直都擅长数学

translation.en: You'll always be good at naming stars
translation.zh: 你一直擅长命名星星

translation.en: You'll always be there to catch me
translation.zh: 你一直都伴我左右

translation.en: Except when I fall off the monkey bars
translation.zh: 除了我从攀架上掉下去的那次

translation.en: Still hate myself for that.
translation.zh: 为这事儿我到现在都恨自己

translation.en: That broken arm made you so sad
translation.zh: 你摔断了手臂 很是忧伤

translation.en: There went your shot at the Olympiad
translation.zh: 你失去了在奥运会上大放光彩的机会

translation.en: But that black-and-white cookie Made it not so bad
translation.zh: 但你做的巧克力奶油派抚慰了我

translation.en: And there's always you
translation.zh: 你总在这里

translation.en: And there's always me
translation.zh: 我也总在这里

translation.en: And there's always us
translation.zh: 这里总有我们的影子

translation.en: Mommy and Daddy and Genius Girl Make three
translation.zh: 妈妈 爸爸还有聪明的女儿我们三个

translation.en: You got my hands, you got my toes
translation.zh: 你遗传了我的手和脚

translation.en: But luckily I got Mommy's nose
translation.zh: 但幸运的是 我遗传到了妈妈的鼻子

translation.en: You're better than A hundred Broadway shows
translation.zh: 百老汇的演出都比不过你

translation.en: And there's always you
translation.zh: 你总在这里

translation.en: And there's always me
translation.zh: 我也总在这里

translation.en: And there's always us
translation.zh: 这里总有我们的影子

translation.en: Mommy and Daddy and Genius Girl Make three
translation.zh: 妈妈 爸爸还有聪明的女儿我们三个

translation.en: That was a Meyerowitz and Meyerowitz composition.
translation.zh: 这首歌词曲都出自迈耶罗维茨一家之手

translation.en: We wrote it when I was nine.
translation.zh: 我九岁的时候 我们一起写的

translation.en: Was the shark bad or was that bad shark?
translation.zh: 鲨鱼肉不新鲜还是不好吃？

translation.en: Dad, it was raw.
translation.zh: 爸爸 是因为饭都没做熟

translation.en: The rice was hard and the shellfish was closed.
translation.zh: 米饭还是硬的 贝壳都没煮开

translation.en: Dad, your limp is worse.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你脚跛得越来越厉害了

translation.en: It's always... worse after I've been sitting.
translation.zh: 我坐久了总会这样

translation.en: -Just got to stretch it. -Please see someone about it.
translation.zh: -起来活动活动就好了-去看看医生吧 拜托了

translation.en: I have an appointment with an acupuncturist on Tuesday.
translation.zh: 我已经预约了周二的针灸

translation.en: Someone real, please?
translation.zh: 拜托找真正懂医术的人去看看吧

translation.en: I'm telling you, you are going to meet a lot of...
translation.zh: 听我说 你会遇见很多…

translation.en: wonderful, interesting, new people.
translation.zh: 优秀而且有趣的新朋友

translation.en: Or I imagine you will.
translation.zh: 当然我希望你是如此

translation.en: I didn't make it more than a month at college because I liked drugs so much.
translation.zh: 我当时吸毒上瘾大学上了不到一个月就退学了

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you and Mom.
translation.zh: 我会想你和妈妈的

translation.en: I know. We'll miss you, too.
translation.zh: 我知道 我们也会想你的

translation.en: I still haven't wrapped my mind around it, you guys not being together.
translation.zh: 你跟妈妈分开了我到现在还是不太理解

translation.en: We don't get along when it's just us.
translation.zh: 我们两个人独处的时候合不来

translation.en: Sorry I don't get to drive you, but your mom won that one.
translation.zh: 抱歉我不能开车送你去学校但你妈妈赢了

translation.en: It's okay. She's a good driver.
translation.zh: 没事 她是个好司机

translation.en: And I'll be up there whenever you're ready for me.
translation.zh: 只要你需要 我随时可以接送你

translation.en: Marcus is picking you up.
translation.zh: 看来马库斯要来接你

translation.en: Does Marcus know to take the tunnel instead of the bridge?
translation.zh: 马库斯知道要走隧道而不是走大桥吗？

translation.en: At this hour, the bridge is gonna be jammed.
translation.zh: 现在这个点儿 大桥会很堵

translation.en: You'll be okay here?
translation.zh: 你在这里行吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: It'll be nice to spend time with Dad while Maureen's away.
translation.zh: 莫琳不在时 跟爸爸待在一起会很好

translation.en: You know? I didn't get a lot of time with him growing up.
translation.zh: 我成长过程中跟他相处的时间很少

translation.en: It's an opportunity to get closer now.
translation.zh: 现在是跟他增进感情的机会

translation.en: It's nice you and Jean are getting him this show.
translation.zh: 你和琼要帮他办展会 真是太好了

translation.en: I know it's just a college show,
translation.zh: 虽然只是在大学举办展会

translation.en: but I think it really could put him back on the map.
translation.zh: 当我觉得这真的是一个能够让他东山再起的机会

translation.en: The work is good and deserves more exposure.
translation.zh: 他的作品都很优秀应该得到更多人的关注

translation.en: You are a truly wonderful girl.
translation.zh: 你真的是个好姑娘

translation.en: You've been a great dad.
translation.zh: 你一直以来也是一个好爸爸

translation.en: I think I still am.
translation.zh: 我觉得我现在也是

translation.en: I didn't mean it that way.
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思

translation.en: Hey, Marcus.
translation.zh: 嘿 马库斯

translation.en: Hey, Danny.
translation.zh: 嘿 丹尼

translation.en: Text when you get...
translation.zh: 到了给我发短…

translation.en: This one's interesting.
translation.zh: 这个挺有意思的

translation.en: I think it's a masterpiece, Brian.
translation.zh: 布莱恩 我觉得这是一件惊世之作

translation.en: It's intended as a sort of sequel to "Gilded Halfwing."
translation.zh: 它算是镀金半翼那件作品的续篇

translation.en: The squiggly one outside Lincoln Center.
translation.zh: 就是林肯中心外面歪歪曲曲的那个雕塑

translation.en: Yes, James, "Gilded Halfwing."
translation.zh: 是的 詹姆斯那件作品叫做“镀金半翼”

translation.en: It's probably my most well-known work.
translation.zh: 那座雕塑大概是我最有名的作品了

translation.en: It has a young man's energy.
translation.zh: 我那时还年轻 精力无限

translation.en: But I like to think that my later work is richer,
translation.zh: 但我觉得我后期的作品更有内涵

translation.en: more interesting.
translation.zh: 更有意思

translation.en: When Matthew told me that was yours,
translation.zh: 马修告诉我那个雕塑出自你手时

translation.en: I was like, "I walk by there all the time."
translation.zh: 我当时的感觉就是：“我每天都从那里经过”

translation.en: We're on Central Park West now, but have been looking for the right place downtown.
translation.zh: 我们目前住在中央公园上西城但我们想在市中心找个合适的房子

translation.en: Show James and Brian the wood structures.
translation.zh: 带詹姆斯和布莱恩看看你那些木制品

translation.en: Yes, I've been working in wood recently.
translation.zh: 没问题 我最近一直在鼓捣木头

translation.en: Danny, give me a hand.
translation.zh: 丹尼 帮我一把

translation.en: How about this one, with the gold? Always loved this one.
translation.zh: 这件带金的怎么样？我一直都很喜欢它

translation.en: No, not that one. It's a minor work of mine.
translation.zh: 不 那个不行 那件作品我不太满意

translation.en: Over here.
translation.zh: 过来这边看看

translation.en: How's the noise in this area?
translation.zh: 这一带吵吗？

translation.en: -It gets very loud, all the tourists. -Only on weekends.
translation.zh: -非常吵 都是游客-只有周末才会这样

translation.en: How long has Matthew been your...
translation.zh: 马修当你们的…

translation.en: -Hey, Dad, let me help. -...business manager?
translation.zh: -爸爸 我来吧-业务经理多久了？

translation.en: He's been doing that for, I guess it's been close to five years.
translation.zh: 他大概做了快五年了吧

translation.en: How did you two meet?
translation.zh: 你们两个是怎么认识的？

translation.en: We met at a fundraiser for Chuck Schumer.
translation.zh: 在查克·舒默的筹款会上认识的

translation.en: -Great water pressure. -The art's over here.
translation.zh: -水压不错-作品是在那边

translation.en: It's largely intuitive, really,
translation.zh: 这件作品的完成主要靠直觉

translation.en: and in its way, a return to the old masters.
translation.zh: 然后以其原有的方式回归到了早期艺术大师的风格

translation.en: I think I'm doing the best work of my life right now, but...
translation.zh: 我认为眼前这些是我这辈子最出色的作品 但…

translation.en: that's just one man's opinion.
translation.zh: 这也只是一己之见了

translation.en: I found Brian very attractive.
translation.zh: 我觉得布莱恩很有魅力

translation.en: He's baby-faced but sinewy like an old lover of mine, Willem Dafoe.
translation.zh: 他虽然长着一张娃娃脸 但浑身肌肉像极了我的旧情人威廉·达福

translation.en: And James has very firm hands.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯的手很结实

translation.en: They were very enthusiastic about the work.
translation.zh: 他们对我的作品很感兴趣

translation.en: Are they interested in the house or the art?
translation.zh: 他们是对房子感兴趣还是对作品感兴趣？

translation.en: -I think the art. -Both.
translation.zh: -我觉得是作品-两者都有

translation.en: What do you mean, "both?" Maureen? What do you mean, "both?"
translation.zh: 莫琳 你说“两者都有”到底是什么意思？

translation.en: From Matthew, they're interested in purchasing all of the work,
translation.zh: 马修跟我说他们有意买下所有艺术作品

translation.en: some of the furniture, as well as the house.
translation.zh: 一些家具 还有这个房子

translation.en: The house? What did you tell them?
translation.zh: 房子？你都跟他们说了什么？

translation.en: -We're open to exploring it. -The Mets are staging a comeback.
translation.zh: -我们可以聊聊看-大都会队卷土重来

translation.en: -They got first and third with no one out. -You're thinking about selling, why?
translation.zh: -他们拿下了一垒和三垒 没人出局-你在考虑卖掉房子吗？为什么？

translation.en: It's very expensive to keep this place up,
translation.zh: 房子的维护费用太高了

translation.en: and we're spending more time at the country house.
translation.zh: 而且我们多数时间都住在乡下

translation.en: But the country's yours.
translation.zh: 但乡下那个房子是你的

translation.en: I had it before we were married, but it's ours. Everything is ours now.
translation.zh: 那房子结婚前是我的但现在是我们的 一切都是我们的

translation.en: You're selling all the art, Dad? Why?
translation.zh: 爸 你要卖掉所有作品？为什么？

translation.en: -We don't have room for it. -Do you want to sell?
translation.zh: -没地方放了-你真的想卖吗？

translation.en: Oh, come on. Cabrera just grounded into a double play.
translation.zh: 拜托 卡布雷拉刚刚打出地滚球双杀

translation.en: -Matt set this up? -I told him it was a family discussion.
translation.zh: -是马修安排的吗？-我告诉过他需要全家人讨论

translation.en: I think it is!
translation.zh: 我想是的！

translation.en: I don't think you should sell, I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 跟你说吧 你不该卖掉房子

translation.en: -I didn't expect you to get upset. -I am! I am upset about it.
translation.zh: -我没想到你会这么生气-没错！这件事让我很生气

translation.en: -Why do you care? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -你有什么可在乎的？-我不知道

translation.en: -We've lived here for years. -You haven't.
translation.zh: -我们在这里住了那么多年-你并没有

translation.en: This is where Matthew grew up. You lived in Queens with your mother.
translation.zh: 这是马修成长的地方你和你妈妈住在皇后区

translation.en: I lived here for a year when I was 16.
translation.zh: 我16岁的时候在这里住了一年

translation.en: Your studio's here.
translation.zh: 你的工作室在这里

translation.en: They want all the artwork?
translation.zh: 他们想买下所有的作品？

translation.en: I mean, Dad, with a show here or there, your work might become valuable.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我们去各地办办展览后你的作品说不定会变得有价值

translation.en: That is true.
translation.zh: 这倒是真的

translation.en: I say no.
translation.zh: 我不同意卖掉房子

translation.en: Everyone in the family will be consulted before we sell anything.
translation.zh: 这家里不管卖掉什么我会询问每个人的意见

translation.en: Matthew isn't here, you know?
translation.zh: 可是马修不在

translation.en: Matthew... isn't in the house now!
translation.zh: 马修…现在不在这个房子里！

translation.en: It's a Meyerowitz tradition, this house!
translation.zh: 这个房子是迈耶罗维茨家族传统的寄托！

translation.en: Well, I guess I wouldn't know about that.
translation.zh: 那我这个外人还真是不知道

translation.en: I didn't mean it like that.
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思

translation.en: She gets sensitive about these things. She feels like an outsider.
translation.zh: 她对这种事很敏感她感觉自己像个外人

translation.en: She doesn't have kids of her own.
translation.zh: 她没有自己的孩子

translation.en: I tell her, "Technically, you're their stepmother."
translation.zh: 我是这么跟她说的：“技术上讲 你是他们的继母”

translation.en: Take care of The Dad!
translation.zh: 照顾好老爹！

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: Will do.
translation.zh: 必须的

translation.en: Goddamn it!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: The old babushka.
translation.zh: 老奶奶要上场了呢

translation.en: I remember I spent months of allowance on that pool cue for your birthday.
translation.zh: 为了在你生日的时候送你这个撞杆我可是攒了好几个月的零花钱

translation.en: Son of a bitch!
translation.zh: 混蛋！

translation.en: The famous blueberry pancakes.
translation.zh: 大名鼎鼎的蓝莓薄饼

translation.en: The "famous blueberry pancakes?"
translation.zh: “大名鼎鼎的蓝莓薄饼”？

translation.en: Terry's gonna move Colón over to the bullpen.
translation.zh: 特里打算把科隆弄去候补区

translation.en: The Mets need a middle-inning reliever.
translation.zh: 大都会队需要一个中局替补投手

translation.en: Yes! All on one tape: Videodrome, Beverally Hills Cop, spelled wrong,
translation.zh: （《百弗利山警探 》） 太棒了！还有《录像带谋杀案》《“百”弗利山警探》写错了一个字

translation.en: and... Legal Eagles.
translation.zh: 还有…《法网神鹰》

translation.en: You have the right to an attorney.
translation.zh: 你有权聘请律师

translation.en: Looks like she's already had her attorney.
translation.zh: 似乎她已经有律师了

translation.en: Hey...
translation.zh: 嘿…

translation.en: Dad, you remember that song I wrote
translation.zh: 爸爸 你还记得我写的那首曲子吗？

translation.en: about that guy who worked at your studio who you never remembered his name?
translation.zh: 关于那个曾在你工作室工作但你从来记不住名字的那个人

translation.en: His name was Byron
translation.zh: 他的名字是拜伦

translation.en: But you called him Myron
translation.zh: 但你叫他迈伦

translation.en: Three times you called him Myron
translation.zh: 你叫了他三次迈伦

translation.en: Till you heard the other guy Say it with a "B"
translation.zh: 直到你听见别人叫他“拜”伦

translation.en: Byron, Myron Byron, Myron
translation.zh: 拜伦 迈伦 拜伦 迈伦

translation.en: What does it matter If you look him in the eye?
translation.zh: 如果你直视他眼睛叫错名字又如何呢？

translation.en: Say it with confidence And look him in the eye

translation.zh: -我得走了-别啊

translation.en: Are you not staying for the dinner?
translation.zh: 你不留下来吃晚饭吗？

translation.en: -I don't think we were invited. -Excuse me.
translation.zh: -我们没有受到邀请-稍等一下

translation.en: I'd better. He's old.
translation.zh: 我得走了 他年龄大了

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -It was great to see you. -It was so great.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-真的很高兴

translation.en: I got your hair again.
translation.zh: 我又挂到你的头发了

translation.en: Well... bye, Danny.
translation.zh: 那好吧 再见 丹尼

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: Dad.
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: Did you hear me?
translation.zh: 你没听到我在叫你吗？

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Ultimately, L.J. is a popular, but minor, artist.
translation.zh: 最终 艾尔杰成了一个小有名气的二流艺术家

translation.en: There's a superficial bravura, but there's no unconscious, no discovery.
translation.zh: 他的展览是一次大胆但又肤浅的尝试缺乏那种潜意识的美感 没有新发现

translation.en: I know you like the bears, but it's a reshuffling of obnoxious clichés,
translation.zh: 我知道你喜欢那些熊 但这不过是改头换面的陈词滥调 让人觉得恶心

translation.en: like listening to music played slightly off-key.
translation.zh: 就好像听稍微走调的音乐一样

translation.en: -I didn't get to see it. -And the video work is embarrassing.
translation.zh: -我都没去看成他的作品-视频作品也让人挺尴尬的

translation.en: I've never forgiven L.J. for using Loretta in those pieces.
translation.zh: 艾尔杰居然利用洛蕾塔完成作品这一点我永远不会原谅他

translation.en: You don't do that to a child.
translation.zh: 你不能那样对一个孩子

translation.en: And it's a disturbing commentary on the culture
translation.zh: 而且作品针对文化所表达的评论令人不安

translation.en: that truly ordinary work, made mostly by his assistants,
translation.zh: 那些普通不过的作品大部分是出自他的助理之手

translation.en: gets reverent reviews from the critics, who ought to know better.
translation.zh: 却让本该知道真相的评论家们俯身屈膝

translation.en: He's a talented, pretentious enigma.
translation.zh: 他真是个有才 又自命不凡的人令人捉摸不透

translation.en: Let me see if there's a cab.
translation.zh: 我看能不能打到车

translation.en: It's nice to see Loretta.
translation.zh: 见到洛蕾塔真好

translation.en: She was very happy to see me. She gave me quite a kiss.
translation.zh: 她见到我很高兴她给了我一个很棒的吻

translation.en: I did well.
translation.zh: 我表现得还不错

translation.en: I was pretty funny, I think. I didn't get her number or anything.
translation.zh: 比较搞笑 但我没问她要电话号码

translation.en: Maybe you could give me L.J.'s e-mail.
translation.zh: 或许你可以把艾尔杰的私人邮箱给我

translation.en: I don't feel comfortable giving it out. Maybe there's a work one.
translation.zh: 我觉得这样做不妥我可以给你他的工作邮箱

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I met Sigourney Weaver...
translation.zh: 我见到了西戈尼·韦弗…

translation.en: who was very friendly.
translation.zh: 她很友好

translation.en: She said, "Hi, I'm Sigourney."
translation.zh: 她说：“你好 我是西戈尼”

translation.en: I said, "Hi, I'm Harold."
translation.zh: 我说：“你好 我是哈罗德”

translation.en: Have you thought about getting a job?
translation.zh: 你有考虑过找份工作吗？

translation.en: You've essentially never worked in your life.
translation.zh: 你这辈子可以说是从未工作过

translation.en: I think you'd feel better about yourself.
translation.zh: 我觉得这样的话你自我感觉会好一些

translation.en: Have you thought about playing music again?
translation.zh: 有没有考虑过再开始弹钢琴？

translation.en: Maureen will be back next Thursday.
translation.zh: 莫琳下周四就回来了

translation.en: You should think about where you're going to live.
translation.zh: 你应该考虑下要住在哪里

translation.en: You can stay with us for a while, but...
translation.zh: 你可以跟我们住一段时间 但是…

translation.en: Maureen wanted me to remind you to go through the boxes and things upstairs.
translation.zh: 莫琳让我提醒你去楼上把箱子里的东西翻一翻

translation.en: We're gonna start throwing things away.
translation.zh: 我们要开始清理东西了

translation.en: You might want these sunglasses.
translation.zh: 你可能还想要这副太阳镜

translation.en: -Those are Matthew's. -I'm letting him know, too.
translation.zh: -那是马修的-我也会告诉他的

translation.en: -Hello? Sorry, hello? -Yo, how you doing?
translation.zh: -喂？抱歉 喂？-你怎么样？

translation.en: Sorry, Elvis is making me laugh.
translation.zh: 抱歉 埃尔维斯让我笑个不停

translation.en: Who's Elvis?
translation.zh: 谁是埃尔维斯？

translation.en: What? Sorry, Joaquin's roommate.
translation.zh: 你说什么？抱歉 他是杰奎因的室友

translation.en: Oh, okay. Who's Joaquin?
translation.zh: 好吧 那谁又是杰奎因？

translation.en: He's a friend. What's up, Dad?
translation.zh: 是我的朋友 怎么了 爸爸？

translation.en: Well, I'm at Harold's.
translation.zh: 我在哈罗德家

translation.en: We went to L.J. Shapiro's opening at MoMA.
translation.zh: 我们去了现代艺术博物馆参加了艾尔杰·夏皮罗艺术展的开幕式

translation.en: Was it fun?
translation.zh: 有趣吗？

translation.en: Yeah, for a little while.
translation.zh: 嗯 刚开始还行

translation.en: You having fun with Grandpa?
translation.zh: 你跟爷爷在一起开心吗？

translation.en: I might go stay at Jean's in Rochester for a while.
translation.zh: 我可能要去罗契斯特在琼家住一段时间

translation.en: I'll be closer to you, but don't worry.
translation.zh: 我会离你更近 但别担心

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We're gonna see this band, and then there's a party. Call you tomorrow?
translation.zh: 我们要去听一个乐队演奏然后要去派对 明天打给你 行吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I'll be up early.
translation.zh: 好啊 我明天早点儿起

translation.en: -What's wrong? -Nothing.
translation.zh: -到底怎么了？-没什么

translation.en: -I can hear it in your voice. -Nothing.
translation.zh: -我听你声音有些不对-真没什么

translation.en: Tell me.
translation.zh: 告诉我

translation.en: Hold on, I'm gonna step outside so we can talk.
translation.zh: 等等 我出去接这样我们就能好好聊聊了

translation.en: No. Go to your concert, I promise I'm fine.
translation.zh: 不用 去听你的演唱会我没事 我向你保证

translation.en: -You promise? -Yes.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-真的

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna keep my phone on in case you want to call, okay?
translation.zh: 我电话一直开着你想给我打电话就打 好吗？

translation.en: There's no need, don't worry.
translation.zh: 不用 别担心我

translation.en: Otherwise, let's talk in the morning?
translation.zh: 那要不我们早上再谈？

translation.en: -Okay, have fun. -But call if you need to.
translation.zh: -好的 玩得开心-要是有事就给我打电话

translation.en: -I won't. -Bye, Dad.
translation.zh: -不会有事的-拜 爸

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 拜

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 不错

translation.en: Go fuck yourself!
translation.zh: 去你妈的吧！

translation.en: Go fuck yourself! Go fuck your...!
translation.zh: 去你妈的！去你妈…

translation.en: Is that okay?!
translation.zh: 没事吧？

translation.en: -It's okay. Right? -Is that okay that that just happened?
translation.zh: -没事吧？-刚刚发生的事没关系吧？

translation.en: -I don't know. -I'm scared.
translation.zh: -我不知道-我很害怕

translation.en: -These guys are six months behind. -That's why I'm here.
translation.zh: -这些家伙比预计的晚了六个月-所以我才来

translation.en: I put together a document that anticipates where you'll be at the end of the year,
translation.zh: 我弄了一份文件出来它会预估到你今年年末的情形

translation.en: vis-à-vis the overages.
translation.zh: 如果你继续这么超支下去的话

translation.en: Oh, for Christ. Really? Have we already spent this much?
translation.zh: 天呐 真的吗？我们已经花了这么多？

translation.en: That's the first page.
translation.zh: 这只是第一页

translation.en: Suck a dick! Oh, God, really?
translation.zh: 真操蛋！我的天啊 这么多？

translation.en: The change orders are adding up.
translation.zh: 变更项目的订单越来越多了

translation.en: We didn't budget for the salt water pool.
translation.zh: 我们当时根本就没有买盐水泳池的预算

translation.en: How's your kid?
translation.zh: 你孩子还好吗？

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 还好

translation.en: I'm in a fight with my wife right now.
translation.zh: 我现在正跟我老婆吵架呢

translation.en: Randy, I don't want to sound alarmist,
translation.zh: 兰迪 我不想大惊小怪的

translation.en: but you're not gonna be able to sustain your lifestyle
translation.zh: 但如果事情继续这样发展下去

translation.en: if things continue like this.
translation.zh: 你迟早得放弃这种生活方式

translation.en: And you're not going on tour any time soon.
translation.zh: 又不是说你很快就会去参加巡演

translation.en: -That's nice. -Right?
translation.zh: -咖啡不错-是吗？

translation.en: It's my own espresso bean. See? I'm doing everything I can to make a buck.
translation.zh: 这是我自己种的特浓咖啡豆看到没？我在想尽一切办法挣钱

translation.en: The coffee will pay for the pool.
translation.zh: 卖咖啡赚来的钱可以支付泳池的费用

translation.en: That might be too much pressure to put on coffee.
translation.zh: 那这样咖啡的压力也太大了

translation.en: Here's what we're gonna do, we're gonna get you the pool...
translation.zh: 这样吧 你会有游泳池的…

translation.en: -Yes! -But not this year.
translation.zh: -太棒了！-但不是今年

translation.en: We're gonna rent out the bottom floor, which is zoned commercial anyway,
translation.zh: 我们打算把底楼租出去那里本来就被划作商业区

translation.en: -and get a tenant for the second floor. -But can't I afford...
translation.zh: -然后二楼找个房客-难道我就不能…

translation.en: Income from the rentals will cover the property taxes,
translation.zh: 收来的租金可以贴补房产税

translation.en: you can live on the top two floors.
translation.zh: 你可以在上面两层居住

translation.en: Everything else you can have. Let me just...
translation.zh: 其他都可以应有尽有 让我…

translation.en: -Hello? -They won't seat me without you.
translation.zh: -喂？-你不来他们不让我就座

translation.en: -Where are you? -I'm standing outside the place.
translation.zh: -你在哪儿？-我就在餐厅外面

translation.en: -You're 45 minutes early. -There are many available tables.
translation.zh: -你早到了45分钟-里面还有还多空桌

translation.en: -The guy was a jerk. -We have a reservation.
translation.zh: -那个人真混蛋-我们预定了的

translation.en: -Did you say my name? -I said my name.
translation.zh: -你说我的名字了吗？-我说的是我的名字

translation.en: -Let me finish up, we'll figure it out. -How long are you gonna be?
translation.zh: -等我把这边事情忙完就过去解决-你还要多久？

translation.en: I'll be there at one when we said we'd meet.
translation.zh: 我会按之前约好的时间过去下午一点

translation.en: Hurry up. Parking was easier than I anticipated.
translation.zh: 快一点 停车比我预想得容易多了

translation.en: Okay, I'll see you soon.
translation.zh: 好 待会儿见

translation.en: We won't do the pool now.
translation.zh: 现在还是别要泳池了

translation.en: -I think that's the right decision. -Everything okay?
translation.zh: -这是个正确的决定-一切都还好吗？

translation.en: Totally. Lunch with my father.
translation.zh: 都还好 午饭和我爸爸一起吃

translation.en: Say no more.
translation.zh: 完全理解

translation.en: No, now it's easy.
translation.zh: 不 现在好多了

translation.en: When I was younger, I was so invested in his grievances,
translation.zh: 我还年轻时 过于在乎他的不满

translation.en: his anger at the world, they were mine, too,
translation.zh: 他对世界的愤怒 但我跟他有同感

translation.en: but now that I live 3,000 miles away and have my own kid, a thriving business,
translation.zh: 但我现在离他差不多5000公里远有了自己的孩子 事业做得风生水起

translation.en: I don't even get angry at him anymore.
translation.zh: 我再也不生他的气了

translation.en: It's even just funny, you know...
translation.zh: 现在甚至觉得很有趣…

translation.en: Sorry, I don't know why I'm suddenly...
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不知道我为什么突然…

translation.en: I think it's all this plaster dust and coffee.
translation.zh: 可能是石膏粉和咖啡惹的祸

translation.en: -Do you need something? -Like what?
translation.zh: -你需要点什么吗？-比如说？

translation.en: Let's see. One brings you up and the other brings you down,
translation.zh: 看看吧 一片会让你嗨起来另一片能让你情绪平稳一些

translation.en: but I'm not certain which is which.
translation.zh: 但我分不清哪个是哪个

translation.en: Do you have a guess?
translation.zh: 就不能猜猜吗？

translation.en: -I haven't worn these pants in a while. -I don't...
translation.zh: -我有段时间没穿这条裤子了-我不…

translation.en: Take both.
translation.zh: 那就两片都拿去吧

translation.en: Thanks, Matt.
translation.zh: 谢了 马修

translation.en: I don't have anyone in my life like you.
translation.zh: 我身边再也没有像你这样的人了

translation.en: -There's my son. -Hey.
translation.zh: -我儿子终于来了-嗨

translation.en: These are yours. They were in the upstairs room.
translation.zh: 这是你的东西 是放在楼上房间里的

translation.en: Maureen is throwing things out. I wanted you to have them.
translation.zh: 莫琳在清理东西这些东西我希望你留着

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: -The Vuarnets are Danny's. -He said they were yours.
translation.zh: -这副太阳镜是丹尼的-他说是你的

translation.en: -No, you can throw them out. -They're quite fancy.
translation.zh: -不是我的 你丢掉就好了-这眼镜看起来挺不错的

translation.en: Maybe Maureen will use them.
translation.zh: 或许莫琳可以戴

translation.en: -What happened to your face? -We got a dog. Did I tell you?
translation.zh: -你脸怎么了？-我们养了条狗 我没告诉过你吗？

translation.en: -Maybe. -Bruno, my charge, we call him Bruno.
translation.zh: -或许吧-布鲁诺 我买的 我们叫他布鲁诺

translation.en: Named for the idiot in Werner Herzog's Stroszek.
translation.zh: 是以韦纳·赫尔佐格《史楚锡流浪记》里那个傻子命名的

translation.en: -Never seen it. -Really?
translation.zh: -我没看过那本书-真的吗？

translation.en: I own a cassette at home, if you wanna come over.
translation.zh: 你要想看的话我家里有磁带

translation.en: So, what happened?
translation.zh: 所以你的脸到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: Oh, he lunged for a deranged hare, taking me in the process.
translation.zh: 我们散步时它扑向了一只乱跑的野兔直接把我也拉到在地了

translation.en: -You should see the other dog. -You all right?
translation.zh: -没有最惨 只有更惨-你没事吧？

translation.en: I'm fine. He didn't mean it. It wasn't his fault.
translation.zh: 我没事 它不是故意的这不是它的错

translation.en: -Shall we go in? -I'm not eating here.
translation.zh: -我们可以进去了吗？-我不想在这里吃

translation.en: -Because they wouldn't seat you? -The guy was very obnoxious.
translation.zh: -就因为他们不让你入座吗？-那个家伙特别讨厌

translation.en: -Let me talk to him. -No, let's go somewhere else.
translation.zh: -我去跟他说道说道-不 我们去别处吃吧

translation.en: -I only have an hour and a half. -It's my protest, like McEnroe.
translation.zh: -我只有一个半小时-这是我的抗议 就像麦肯罗一样

translation.en: Okay, let me think.
translation.zh: 好吧 让我想想

translation.en: Not too far, because at three, I have to put money in the meter.
translation.zh: 不能太远 因为超过三点我还要多充停车费

translation.en: -This man is treading right on my heels. -No, Dad, he's with me.
translation.zh: -有个人一直跟着我-不 爸爸 他是跟我一起的

translation.en: This is Gabe. He works at my firm in New York.
translation.zh: 这是加布 他在我纽约的公司里上班

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Mr. Meyerowitz.
translation.zh: 幸会 迈耶罗维茨先生

translation.en: I thought Gabe could join us for part of lunch.
translation.zh: 我想说加布可以和我们一起吃午饭

translation.en: -His specialty is in estate planning. -I have an accountant.
translation.zh: -他的专长是财产规划-我已经有会计师了

translation.en: I had a chance to review some of the documents...
translation.zh: 我看过其中一些文件…

translation.en: Barry Sukenick doesn't work on this scale,
translation.zh: 巴里·苏克尼克无法完成这么大的工作量…

translation.en: and as we move toward selling the house,
translation.zh: 而且我觉得 既然要把房子卖了

translation.en: it might be a good time to get some affairs in order.
translation.zh: 我们刚好趁这个机会把一些事情处理好

translation.en: If we sell the house, it'll be my decision.
translation.zh: 卖不卖房我说了算

translation.en: -Pardon me. -Brian and James, who you met...
translation.zh: -抱歉-布莱恩和詹姆斯 你见过的…

translation.en: Very charming interracial homosexual couple, and smart about the work.
translation.zh: 一对很有魅力、跨种族的同性恋而且对我的作品很有见地

translation.en: They were familiar with "Gilded Halfwing."
translation.zh: 他们对“镀金半翼”很熟悉

translation.en: Yes, James says they like the work very much, and they love the house,
translation.zh: 是的 詹姆斯说他们很喜欢那些作品而且他们也喜欢那个房子

translation.en: and they made us an offer.
translation.zh: 他们也给我们出了价

translation.en: For the work, too?
translation.zh: 也包括我的那些作品吗？

translation.en: For the work, the house, some of the furniture.
translation.zh: 作品、房子以及一部分的家具

translation.en: -Your brother doesn't want to sell. -Brother?
translation.zh: -你哥哥不想卖掉房子-哥哥？

translation.en: Half-brother, we have a different mother. That's a real shame for him, then.
translation.zh: 半个哥哥而已 我们同父异母那对他来说真是太可惜了

translation.en: Danny stands the most to benefit. He doesn't work.
translation.zh: 丹尼是最大收益方 他都不出去工作

translation.en: -He and Karen have separated. -Really?
translation.zh: -他和凯伦分开了-真的吗？

translation.en: I took him in, but now he's with Jean in Rochester.
translation.zh: 我收留了他一阵子但现在他在罗契斯特和琼住一起

translation.en: -Shit. -Apparently, his mother moved to Florida,
translation.zh: -该死-显然 他妈妈搬去了佛罗里达

translation.en: which I didn't know. Did you?
translation.zh: 我不知道这事儿 你呢？

translation.en: -No. -She's still angry with me, apparently.
translation.zh: -我也不知道-很显然她还在生我的气

translation.en: Your brother and sister helped organize a show for me up at Bard.
translation.zh: 你哥哥和姐姐帮我在巴德学院举办了一次展览

translation.en: -A retrospective? -A retrospective of the faculty, yes.
translation.zh: -回顾展？-是的 一个教职工回顾展

translation.en: Like a... group show.
translation.zh: 算是一场…团体秀吧

translation.en: -I'll just sit here. -There's other artists,
translation.zh: -我坐这儿就好-当然也会有其他艺术家的作品

translation.en: but I was promised a very prominent place in the gallery.
translation.zh: 但他们许诺要把画廊里最显眼的位置留给我

translation.en: Sounds good, congratulations.
translation.zh: 听起来不错 恭喜你了

translation.en: You purchased the property in 1973 for $60,000,
translation.zh: 1973年你花了6万美元买了这房子

translation.en: but since you borrowed against the house a couple times,
translation.zh: 但因为你用这房子做过几次抵押贷款

translation.en: the net proceeds have diminished.
translation.zh: 所以净收入就减少了

translation.en: Danny thinks that after the show,
translation.zh: 丹尼觉得回顾展结束后

translation.en: my work could appreciate considerably in value and that we should wait.
translation.zh: 我的作品会有很大的升值空间所以我们应该等一等

translation.en: You just told me Danny doesn't want to sell at all.
translation.zh: 你刚才告诉我丹尼根本不想把房子卖掉

translation.en: Dad, whatever happens at Bard, you can't afford the real estate taxes.
translation.zh: 爸 无论巴德学院展览办得如何你都负担不起房产税了

translation.en: You're paying two grand a month in utilities.
translation.zh: 你每个月都要交两千美元的水电费

translation.en: Things you wouldn't think: housekeepers...
translation.zh: 还有你想不到的杂费：管家…

translation.en: Mercedes has been with us for years,
translation.zh: 梅塞德斯已经在我们家做了好多年了…

translation.en: and though I deplore her politics, I'm not letting her go.
translation.zh: 虽然我们政见不同但我不会让她走的

translation.en: -I'm giving examples. -Am I paying for him?
translation.zh: -我不过是举个例子-我需要付他钱吗？

translation.en: No, he's doing this as a favor. Gabe's specialty is not my specialty.
translation.zh: 不用 他这算是友情帮忙爸 加布的专业我并不擅长

translation.en: -I'm in personal wealth. -Something I wouldn't know about.
translation.zh: -我的专长是个人财富管理-我怎么会知道

translation.en: -Gabe would only get paid when we sell. -I'm not giving Gabe anything.
translation.zh: -只有我们把房子卖掉才会付加布钱-我不会付加布钱的

translation.en: Absolutely not. And I'm not having this conversation with him.
translation.zh: 绝对不会 所以我不要再跟他谈

translation.en: -This is a private family matter. -Okay, I understand.
translation.zh: -这是我们家的私事-好的 我理解

translation.en: Normally, conspiracy is mounted by people close to you.
translation.zh: 通常情况下阴谋都是你身边亲近的人搞出来的

translation.en: I don't even know this asshole.
translation.zh: 而我都不认识这混蛋

translation.en: -Can we get a check? -We didn't order anything.
translation.zh: -可以给我们结账吗？-我们什么都没点

translation.en: -I wanted to punch Gabe right in the nose. -The owner is a client.
translation.zh: -我真想直接照他脸上打一拳-这家餐厅的主人是我一个客户

translation.en: That's why we could get the table so last minute.
translation.zh: 这就是我们为什么短短几分钟就有位置坐的原因

translation.en: That's why they gave us this bigger table.
translation.zh: 而且还是一张比较大的桌子

translation.en: I imagine they'll send some complementary stuff, too.
translation.zh: 我想他们应该会送一些小菜什么的

translation.en: Is that baby aspirin?
translation.zh: 那是儿童服用的阿司匹林吗？

translation.en: -Adult aspirin bothers my stomach. -Are you okay?
translation.zh: -成人服用的让我胃疼-你没事吧？

translation.en: -I've had some headaches, it's fine. -Have you gone to a doctor?
translation.zh: -我最近有些头疼 但是还好-你看过医生了吗？

translation.en: It's not necessary.
translation.zh: 没这个必要

translation.en: You're so important you need two phones.
translation.zh: 你真是大人物啊 还带着两部手机

translation.en: L.J. has a show at MoMA, thought I'd check it out.
translation.zh: 艾尔杰在现代艺术博物馆有个展览我还以为自己能过去看看

translation.en: I was at the opening. I met Sigourney Weaver.
translation.zh: 我去开幕式了还遇到了西戈尼·韦弗

translation.en: -How is L.J.? -We chatted.
translation.zh: -艾尔杰现在怎么样？-我们聊了下

translation.en: She said to me, "My name is Sigourney." I said, "My name is Harold."
translation.zh: 她跟我说：“我叫西戈尼”然后我说：“我叫哈罗德”

translation.en: L.J. says he's gonna try to come to the show at Bard.
translation.zh: 艾尔杰说他尽量会去巴德学院的展览

translation.en: -That's great. -I'm sure he'd like to see you there.
translation.zh: -太好了-他要是在巴德见到你肯定会很开心

translation.en: Yeah, if I'm in town.
translation.zh: 好的 如果我在城里的话

translation.en: I think I'm gonna show one of the bronzes.
translation.zh: 我想挑一件青铜器参加展出

translation.en: It's an early piece I made when you used to sit on the floor and watch me work.
translation.zh: 是我早期的作品那时你经常坐在地上看我工作

translation.en: You remember that?
translation.zh: 你还记得吗？

translation.en: You've told me this before, and I don't remember it.
translation.zh: 你之前跟我说过 但是我记不起来了

translation.en: You'd hand me tools and make suggestions as if you, too, were the artist.
translation.zh: 你会把工具递给我 给我一些建议就好像你也是艺术家一样

translation.en: Well, I wasn't.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 但我不是啊

translation.en: It was originally untitled, but I'm gonna call it "Matthew."
translation.zh: 它本来是没有名字的但我打算叫它“马修”

translation.en: I'd like to see Eliza, too.
translation.zh: 我也想去看看伊丽莎

translation.en: She sent me her movie, which I thought was really good. Did you like it?
translation.zh: 她给我发了她制作的电影我觉得棒极了 你喜欢吗？

translation.en: At that time, I thought you might be interested in sculpture,
translation.zh: 那时 我还以为你喜欢雕塑

translation.en: or maybe an actor or a comic.
translation.zh: 或者会当一名演员或是喜剧演员

translation.en: You were a very talented mimic.
translation.zh: 你很有模仿天赋

translation.en: I do the voices of a lot of my coworkers, which cracks people up at the firm.
translation.zh: 我会模仿很多同事的声音能让公司里的同事笑到崩溃

translation.en: "I'm gonna run downstairs for an e-smoke."
translation.zh: “我要下楼抽根电子烟”

translation.en: You don't know...
translation.zh: 你不认识…

translation.en: You don't know Ezra, but that's a pretty good imitation.
translation.zh: 你不认识以斯拉但我确实模仿得惟妙惟肖

translation.en: You were also very musical, like Danny.
translation.zh: 你跟丹尼一样 也很有音乐天分

translation.en: -But Danny could really play. -No, that's true.
translation.zh: -但只有丹尼能弹出来曲子-不 你真的有天分

translation.en: He was quite gifted. I don't know why he didn't pursue it.
translation.zh: 他真的很有天分我不知道他为什么没有坚持下去

translation.en: I know he raised a child, but in this day and age, it's possible to do both.
translation.zh: 我知道他要养孩子 但现在这个时代他这个年龄完全可以两者兼顾的

translation.en: So many other things factor in, don't you think?
translation.zh: 还有很多其他的影响因素 不是吗？

translation.en: I thought you'd do something artistic.
translation.zh: 我以为你会从事与艺术相关的行业

translation.en: I work with artists. I understand the temperament.
translation.zh: 我和艺术家一起共事我了解艺术家的脾性

translation.en: Maybe Eliza will be my heir in that department.
translation.zh: 或许伊丽莎会继承我的艺术事业

translation.en: Although, she seems more commercially-minded,
translation.zh: 虽然她看起来更有商业头脑

translation.en: and potentially a lesbian.
translation.zh: 还是个潜在的女同志

translation.en: Really? I didn't get that.
translation.zh: 真的吗？我怎么没察觉到

translation.en: I think I mentioned to you I left the company I was with.
translation.zh: 我记得我跟你提过我离开了原来那家公司

translation.en: Me and a couple of other people started our own firm.
translation.zh: 现在正和一群人一起创业

translation.en: It was scary and a big change, but things have settled and we're doing really well.
translation.zh: 虽然提心吊胆 生活有这么大的变动但事情都安排妥当 我们做得不错

translation.en: -Maureen is talking to a friend... -A lot of old clients came with us.
translation.zh: -莫琳跟一个朋友在聊…-很多老客户都跟着我们走了

translation.en: ...about getting someone to come and review the show.
translation.zh: 找人过来为回顾展写评论的事

translation.en: -I think we're... -I've been ignored by the Times.
translation.zh: -我觉得我们…-我一直被《纽约时报》忽视

translation.en: We're a great alternative to some of the bigger firms.
translation.zh: 我们完全可以取代一些大点的公司

translation.en: -This might put me back on the map. -This is our logo.
translation.zh: -也许这次我能东山再起-这是我们公司的标志

translation.en: Fifty-five dollars for a steak?
translation.zh: 一份牛排要55美元？

translation.en: -They're known for their meat. -And $35 for salmon?
translation.zh: -他们这里的肉食很出名-三文鱼要35美元？

translation.en: Do you get the salmon to blow you for that price?
translation.zh: 出了这价钱 鲑鱼能让你爽翻吗？

translation.en: -Do you want to split a salmon? -I'm gonna get my own steak.
translation.zh: -要不要分一些鲑鱼给你？-我吃自己的牛排就好

translation.en: -A whole portion is too much for me. -Eat what you can.
translation.zh: -一整份对我来说太多了-能吃多少就吃多少

translation.en: -I'll have a starter. -I'm paying.
translation.zh: -我要开胃菜就好-我请你吃饭

translation.en: Have you dined with us before? Do you have any questions?
translation.zh: 你们之前在我们餐厅用过餐吗？有什么问题吗？

translation.en: We have answers. I'll have a salad...
translation.zh: 我们有答案 我要份沙拉…

translation.en: -The Little Gem, okay. -...to start, and then I'll have a steak.
translation.zh: -小叶莴苣沙拉 好的-…当开胃菜 然后我点牛排

translation.en: -The six ounce or the twelve? -Twelve, and maybe spinach for the table.
translation.zh: -170克还是340克的？-340克的 再来一盘菠菜

translation.en: -The potatoes sound good. -Sure.
translation.zh: -土豆貌似不错-没问题

translation.en: And... shall we get a wine?
translation.zh: 然后…要喝酒吗？

translation.en: Live it up.
translation.zh: 奢侈一点也无妨

translation.en: And maybe... this Brunello.
translation.zh: 那就…布鲁奈罗葡萄酒吧

translation.en: That's one of my favorites.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢的葡萄酒之一

translation.en: I'll have the steak and the market salad.
translation.zh: 给我来一份牛排 还有时蔬沙拉

translation.en: We don't have a ton of time, so bring everything at once.
translation.zh: 我们时间不多 所有的菜一起上吧

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: How's my grandson who I never get to see?
translation.zh: 我从没见过面的孙子怎么样？

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 给你看照片

translation.en: He's quite handsome. His hair's so blond.
translation.zh: 他真帅 一头金发

translation.en: No, that's his friend Sebastian.
translation.zh: 不 那是他的朋友塞巴斯蒂安

translation.en: He's the one with his hand in his trousers.
translation.zh: 那把手插在裤子里的小孩就是他了

translation.en: He's tucking in his shirt.
translation.zh: 他在把衬衣塞进裤子里

translation.en: He looks like the child in Kubrick's The Shining.
translation.zh: 他就像库布里克导演的那部《闪灵》里的孩子

translation.en: It's the sweater, I think.
translation.zh: 我想是毛衣的缘故吧

translation.en: Handsome boy, has the Meyerowitz eyes. Does he like the Knicks?
translation.zh: 小伙真帅 遗传了迈耶罗维茨家族的眼睛 他喜欢尼克斯队吗？

translation.en: I suppose he'll be a Lakers fan
translation.zh: 我觉得他应该喜欢湖人队

translation.en: since you're essentially an Angeleno at this point.
translation.zh: 因为你现在本质上是洛杉矶人了

translation.en: It's hard to have a relationship and a child.
translation.zh: 经营一段感情 养一个小孩都不容易

translation.en: -I imagine you felt that, too. -No.
translation.zh: -你肯定有同感-没有

translation.en: Not really. I didn't find that difficult.
translation.zh: 真没有 我不觉得有多难

translation.en: -You've been married four times. -Three, the first one was annulled.
translation.zh: -你结过四次婚-三次 第一次是无效婚姻

translation.en: I married her because of Tony, but I think about what it would mean to leave,
translation.zh: 我跟她结婚是因为托尼但我有考虑如果离开会怎样

translation.en: but even contemplating it makes me feel guilty.
translation.zh: 但即便想一想都让我内疚无比

translation.en: I haven't met his mother, so I can't advise you in that department.
translation.zh: 我没见过他妈妈所以这方面我无法提供建议

translation.en: You could've if you'd come to our wedding.
translation.zh: 要是你当时参加婚礼的话就可以见到她了啊

translation.en: You did it in L.A.
translation.zh: 但你婚礼是在洛杉矶举办的

translation.en: I didn't invite a lot of people, but everyone I invited,
translation.zh: 我没有邀请很多人 但是我邀请的人

translation.en: including Mom, came except for you.
translation.zh: 包括妈妈都来了 就你没来

translation.en: -So brazen. -What?
translation.zh: -脸皮也太厚了-怎么了？

translation.en: This jerk just put his glasses on our table.
translation.zh: 那混蛋把他的眼镜放我们桌上了

translation.en: -I don't think he realizes... -Oh, no. He knows exactly what he's doing.
translation.zh: -我觉得他没有意识到…-不 他知道自己在干什么

translation.en: Dad, in terms of your estate,
translation.zh: 爸 关于你的房产

translation.en: I don't want you making mistakes that could be avoided.
translation.zh: 我不想你犯低级错误

translation.en: Then they will be my mistakes.
translation.zh: 即便出错也是我的错

translation.en: We'll have this decanted.
translation.zh: 把酒醒一下

translation.en: Very nice. Before she dried out, Maureen drank half my wine cellar,
translation.zh: 很好 莫琳在戒酒之前喝掉了我半个酒窖的酒

translation.en: so I haven't had any good wine in a while.
translation.zh: 所以我暂时没有什么好酒了

translation.en: But she's been sober for six weeks.
translation.zh: 但她已经戒酒六周了

translation.en: -Is she still going to A.A.? -She's doing it her own way.
translation.zh: -她还会去戒酒协会吗？-她在用自己的方式戒酒

translation.en: Maureen is made uncomfortable by A.A., which I can understand.
translation.zh: 戒酒协会让莫琳感觉不自在这点我能理解

translation.en: It's quite infantilizing, giving away your control like that.
translation.zh: 管教太多 没有自主权

translation.en: I think that's the idea.
translation.zh: 戒酒协会不都是这样嘛

translation.en: I tell Maureen, "I don't like you when you drink. You become a different person."
translation.zh: 我告诉莫琳：“我不喜欢你喝酒的样子 完全变了个人一样”

translation.en: -Does it look like we need two ketchups? -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -我们看起来需要两份番茄酱吗？-你在说什么？

translation.en: The son-of-a-bitch just put his ketchup on our table.
translation.zh: 那个混蛋刚把他的番茄酱放我们桌上了

translation.en: Before you know it, he'll be sitting in my lap.
translation.zh: 过不了多久 他就会坐我腿上了

translation.en: -I'm gonna punch this guy in the nose. -It's fine. We have the bigger table.
translation.zh: -我要照他脸上打他一拳-没关系的 爸 我们桌子比较大嘛

translation.en: Dad, what the fuck?
translation.zh: 爸 你干嘛？

translation.en: -Please don't do that again. -It's my protest.
translation.zh: -求你别再那么做了-这是我的抗议方式

translation.en: You better hope he doesn't have a cold.
translation.zh: 你最好希望他没感冒

translation.en: They're leaving. Can you relax now? I'd like to relax now.
translation.zh: 他们走了 现在你能消停点儿了吧？让我消停会儿吧

translation.en: So brazen.
translation.zh: 脸皮真是厚

translation.en: I think the Knicks might be interesting this year.
translation.zh: 我觉得今年尼克斯队可能会有不错的成绩

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 稍等

translation.en: Wait a minute, where's my jacket?
translation.zh: 等等 我的外套哪儿去了？

translation.en: -Next to you. -This isn't my jacket.
translation.zh: -在你旁边-这件不是我的

translation.en: -That son of a bitch took my jacket. -What do you mean?
translation.zh: -那个狗娘养的拿走了我的外套-什么意思？

translation.en: -He has my jacket. -He's still outside. I'll get it back.
translation.zh: -他拿了我的外套-他还在外面 我去帮你拿回来

translation.en: Shit, it's 3:00. I have to put money in the meter.
translation.zh: 该死 三点了 我得去充停车费了

translation.en: -Forget it. -I'm not getting a ticket.
translation.zh: -算了吧-我可不想被开罚单 马修

translation.en: Fuck it. I'm gonna grab the guy, you get the check.
translation.zh: 好吧 我去追那个人 你去结账

translation.en: I thought you were paying. I wouldn't have ordered wine.
translation.zh: 我还以为你要结账不然我是不会点酒的

translation.en: -Well, what do you want me to do? -Where's our waiter? Excuse me!
translation.zh: -那你究竟想让我干嘛？-服务员呢？谁能过来一下吗？

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: Excuse me!
translation.zh: 停一下！

translation.en: Excuse me! Excuse me! Excuse me!
translation.zh: 停一下…

translation.en: -What? -Sorry, I think there was a mix-up.
translation.zh: -怎么了？-抱歉 刚才东西可能放混了

translation.en: -You seem to have taken my dad's jacket. -What?
translation.zh: -你好像拿了我爸爸的外套-什么？

translation.en: You have his jacket. We have yours.
translation.zh: 你拿了他外套 你的在我们这里

translation.en: -It's on its way. -This is my jacket, man.
translation.zh: -我爸马上就过来-这就是我的外套 伙计

translation.en: I think it isn't. Just wait till he gets here.
translation.zh: 我觉得你搞错了 等他过来看看

translation.en: -I know what jacket I took. -I understand, but you took the wrong one.
translation.zh: -我还能不认识自己的外套嘛-我理解 但是你拿错了

translation.en: -You crazy, man. -Listen, just wait a second, okay?
translation.zh: -你疯了吧 伙计-听着 就稍等一下下 好吗？

translation.en: Jesus, what does it cost you? Where you got to be?
translation.zh: 上帝 等一会儿又有何妨你要去哪儿？

translation.en: -Where's he going? -Just hang on. Hey, turn around.
translation.zh: -他要去哪儿？-稍等 嘿 转过来

translation.en: -You want to get hit, man? -What is your problem?
translation.zh: -兄弟 你想挨揍吗？-你到底怎么回事？

translation.en: Can't you see? You have my father's jacket, he has yours.
translation.zh: 你还不明白吗？你拿了我爸爸的外套他拿了你的

translation.en: What's the fucking problem? Dad, give him his jacket.
translation.zh: 这有什么难以理解的？爸 把他的外套给他

translation.en: -What is that? -It's a ticket stub
translation.zh: -这是什么？-是一部叫做

translation.en: for something called Fault in Our Stars.
translation.zh: 《星运里的错》的电影票根

translation.en: -I don't know that. -Of course you do.
translation.zh: -我不知道这部电影-你当然知道

translation.en: It has the kids dying of cancer. It was a big hit.
translation.zh: 讲的是处于癌晚期孩子的故事这部电影很火的

translation.en: I've seen it.
translation.zh: 我看过

translation.en: -When did you see Fault in Our Stars? -In the country at the triplex.
translation.zh: -你什么时候看的《星运里的错》？-在乡下那个电影院里看的

translation.en: It was quite affecting.
translation.zh: 片子很感人

translation.en: Those kids were tremendously winning.
translation.zh: 那些孩子真的很可爱

translation.en: Dad, how would he have your ticket stub to Fault in Our Stars in his jacket?
translation.zh: 爸 你《星运里的错》的票根怎么可能会在他衣服兜里？

translation.en: -No ticket, stroke of luck. -That guy was a real asshole.
translation.zh: -没被开罚单 运气真好-那个家伙真的是个混蛋

translation.en: -He was. We never really had our lunch. -Fucking tourist.
translation.zh: -没错 害得我们午饭都没怎么吃-该死的游客

translation.en: Should've said something more cutting. I let him get away with being a prick.
translation.zh: 我应该说些尖酸刻薄的话居然就那么轻易让他走了

translation.en: -It's gonna eat at me. -Sure you don't wanna come to the house?
translation.zh: -我会为这事儿烦恼不已的-你确定不去家里看看？

translation.en: -Maureen was gonna make pigeon. -No, I have to go, Dad.
translation.zh: -莫琳要炖鸽子-不了 我得走了 爸

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你要去哪儿？

translation.en: I'm going over to Mom's.
translation.zh: 我要去妈妈那里

translation.en: -Maybe I'll go with you. -I don't know if that's...
translation.zh: -或许我可以跟你一起去-我不知道这样好不好…

translation.en: That was the summer on Martha's Vineyard
translation.zh: 那年夏天我们跟艾尔杰、玛雅保罗和洛里

translation.en: -with L.J., Maya, Paul and Lori. -We were staying at the Knapp house,
translation.zh: -一起去了玛莎家的葡萄园-我们当时住在克纳普大宅

translation.en: -the one with that peculiar blind dog. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -大宅里有一条瞎了眼的怪狗-没错

translation.en: And Matthew, you were making up all of these card games, you remember?
translation.zh: 马修 你想出了好多种纸牌游戏还记得吗？

translation.en: And there was one in particular where I asked if it was based on luck,
translation.zh: 其中有个游戏 我当时问你要想获胜是不是全靠运气

translation.en: and you said it was based on hope.
translation.zh: 你回答说全靠希望

translation.en: You hoped you got a good card.
translation.zh: 你希望你能拿到一张好牌

translation.en: And that's what we said all summer, remember? "It's based on hope."
translation.zh: 我们整个夏天都在说“全靠希望”还记得吗？

translation.en: I was commissioned to make "Gilded Halfwing" that summer.
translation.zh: 那个夏天我受委托开始创作“镀金半翼”

translation.en: L.J. was very jealous. I had already sold a piece to the Whitney.
translation.zh: 艾尔杰当时嫉妒得不行我已经卖了一个作品给惠特尼了

translation.en: -Where do they keep that piece? -It's not lost. They catalog these things.
translation.zh: -那作品被他们保存在哪里？-没丢 他们会对东西进行分类整理

translation.en: -I didn't say it was. -Harold, did you see?
translation.zh: -我没说丢了-哈罗德 你看到了吗？

translation.en: You still have one of the sketches of "Gilded Halfwing."
translation.zh: 你现在还留着“镀金半翼”的草图

translation.en: -It looks good here. -Yeah, Cody really admires it.
translation.zh: -挂在这里还挺不错的-是的 科迪真的很喜欢

translation.en: -He says it gives him ideas. -I thought Cody was a gym teacher.
translation.zh: -他说草图能给他带来灵感-我还以为科迪是个体育老师

translation.en: No, he taught Spanish at P.S. 182 and coached the soccer team.
translation.zh: 不 他在纽约182号公立学校教西班牙语 兼任该校足球队教练

translation.en: Matthew, Cody's sons are coming for dinner. I'm making a meatloaf.
translation.zh: 马修 科迪的儿子要来吃晚饭我在做烤肉糕

translation.en: Okay, good, I'm starving.
translation.zh: 嗯 好啊 我快要饿死了

translation.en: I told Matthew this seems like an elaborate ruse
translation.zh: 我告诉马修说他那么做就像个精心设计的诡计

translation.en: just to get his parents back together.
translation.zh: 想让他的父母重归于好

translation.en: You didn't tell me that.
translation.zh: 这话你可没跟我说过

translation.en: This is Tony on FaceTime. You mind if I...?
translation.zh: 托尼要跟我视频聊天 你介意我…

translation.en: Harold, do you want coffee, or a tea, or anything?
translation.zh: 哈罗德 你是要喝咖啡茶还是什么？

translation.en: -He has to go! -Tea would be nice.
translation.zh: -他必须走！-茶就好了

translation.en: I can't have coffee after four.
translation.zh: 四点之后我不能喝咖啡

translation.en: -Hi, sweetheart! -If you have a Triscuit or something,
translation.zh: -嗨 亲爱的！-如果你有饼干什么的…

translation.en: -I'm also starving. -Hi. I'm playing a game for a minute.
translation.zh: -我也很饿-嗨 我现在正在玩游戏

translation.en: It's called All the Animals Are Dead. Do you want to see it?
translation.zh: 游戏叫《动物集体灭绝》你想看吗？

translation.en: Dad, would you rather have a beard made of paper
translation.zh: 爸爸 你是想要纸糊的胡子

translation.en: or a beard made from a tree?
translation.zh: 还是树做的胡子？

translation.en: What's a beard made from a tree?
translation.zh: 什么是用树做的胡子？

translation.en: A beard made from a tree is a beard which is like a tree.
translation.zh: 树做的胡子就是看起来像树的胡子

translation.en: -Like... leaves on a tree? -Yeah, but like a beard.
translation.zh: -就像…树叶那样的？-是的 但更像胡子一点

translation.en: -I'm in the middle of cooking. -I guess a beard made from a tree?
translation.zh: -我在煮饭-我猜是树做的胡子吧？

translation.en: -Me, too. -Is this my Buddenbrooks?
translation.zh: -我也这么觉得-这是我那本《布登勃洛克家族》？

translation.en: -I think this is my copy of Buddenbrooks. -I don't know.
translation.zh: -这好像是我那本-我不知道

translation.en: Would you rather die from old age or kill yourself?
translation.zh: 你是愿意自然死亡还是自杀呢？

translation.en: -Old age, I guess. -Me, too.
translation.zh: -自然死亡吧-我也是

translation.en: Did you give him regular milk?
translation.zh: 你给他的是全脂牛奶？

translation.en: -Victoria, I didn't know you were there. -Of course I'm here.
translation.zh: -维多利亚 我不知道你在旁边-我当然在旁边

translation.en: He doesn't know how to use the phone by himself.
translation.zh: 他自己根本不会用手机

translation.en: Yes, I do.
translation.zh: 我会用

translation.en: -He can't have dairy. -We don't know that for a fact.
translation.zh: -他不能吃乳制品-我们根本就不知道这个情况

translation.en: -Yes, we do. -I'm gonna press the button now.
translation.zh: -不 我们知道-我要挂电话了

translation.en: -Wait. I love you. Baby? -I'm pressing the...
translation.zh: -等等 我爱你 宝贝儿？-我要挂电…

translation.en: Tell him Grandma says hi.
translation.zh: 告诉他奶奶向他问好

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.zh: 爷爷也是

translation.en: We were very thorough when we divided the books, that I remember.
translation.zh: 我记得当时分书的时候很是认真

translation.en: Me, too. Put it back, Dad.
translation.zh: 我记得也是如此 爸爸 把书放回去

translation.en: I've been looking for this edition.
translation.zh: 我一直在找这一版

translation.en: You've lived without it now for 30 years. I think you can manage.
translation.zh: 你30年没找到也活得好好的我觉得没这本书你也能过

translation.en: You can take it, Harold, if you want. I've mostly stopped reading fiction.
translation.zh: 哈罗德 如果你想要 就拿走吧我基本上不看小说了

translation.en: -I'll walk you to the car? -I can stay a bit longer.
translation.zh: -我把你送去停车的地方？-我可以再待一会儿

translation.en: It's so nice to see you again, Harold.
translation.zh: 哈罗德 能再次见到你我真的很高兴

translation.en: I think the last time was Matt's graduation.
translation.zh: 我记得上次见面还是在马修的毕业典礼上

translation.en: You know...
translation.zh: 其实…

translation.en: there's something that I wanted to say and...
translation.zh: 有些事我想告诉你…

translation.en: I thought of calling or writing, but I never did.
translation.zh: 我想过打电话或是写信但都没付诸实践

translation.en: I have huge regrets about how I was with Danny and Jean.
translation.zh: 我很后悔以前没能跟丹尼和琼好好相处

translation.en: I was a kid myself in many ways, and...
translation.zh: 我自己当时还很不成熟 而且…

translation.en: they were so angry with me... I took your lead, frankly,
translation.zh: 坦白来讲 他们很生我的气…因为我在养孩子方面学了你

translation.en: and we were starting over, we had Matt.
translation.zh: 然后我们重归于好 就有了马修

translation.en: We didn't want to look back, and that was understandable, but...
translation.zh: 我们不愿回首过去这点是可以理解的 可是…

translation.en: I wish I'd been more nurturing of them.
translation.zh: 我希望自己当时能多照顾他们一些

translation.en: More generous.
translation.zh: 度量大一些

translation.en: More mothering, really.
translation.zh: 给他们更多母爱 真的

translation.en: I think they suffered in part because of that, and... I feel terrible.
translation.zh: 我感觉在某种程度上 他们为此心伤所以…我感觉很糟

translation.en: Anyway, that's what I wanted to say.
translation.zh: 总之 这就是我想说的

translation.en: Nice to see you.
translation.zh: 见到你很高兴

translation.en: It's called flirting when you're young.
translation.zh: 年轻的时候 这叫打情骂俏

translation.en: I'm not sure what it's called when you're over 70.
translation.zh: 但人过七旬 我就不知道该如何定义这种行为了

translation.en: You're just up here.
translation.zh: 你还不到那个岁数

translation.en: She still has my drawing on her wall next to the gym teacher's doodle.
translation.zh: 她还是把我的画挂在墙上旁边就是那个体育老师的涂鸦

translation.en: Cody's a good guy.
translation.zh: 科迪是个不错的人

translation.en: Your mother is more comfortable ultimately being with men who are half-smart.
translation.zh: 你妈妈最后跟了一个老实巴交的男人这样她日子过得舒心多了

translation.en: Then she can dominate. I was much too formidable.
translation.zh: 她可以在生活中占主导地位我性格太过要强

translation.en: After our separation and before Cody, she was with a homosexual,
translation.zh: 但我们分开后 遇到科迪前她跟一个同性恋在一起过

translation.en: and before that, a man who had no foot.
translation.zh: 在那之前她跟一个没脚的残疾男子在一起过

translation.en: Her fraudulent claims about not reading fiction I find offensive.
translation.zh: 她骗我说她不看小说了我觉得很是冒犯

translation.en: She's masquerading as a populist so as to not threaten Cody.
translation.zh: 她假装自己是平民主义者这样科迪就不会觉得有威胁感

translation.en: But it's a clever, yet bogus, subterfuge.
translation.zh: 但这是一个聪明但虚假的说辞

translation.en: It's a shame your mother, who knows better,
translation.zh: 你母亲心里明明很清楚这一点…

translation.en: has succumbed to this fashionable anti-art movement.
translation.zh: 却还要屈从于反艺术的浪潮真是可惜

translation.en: This is why we have a Republican Congress.
translation.zh: 这就是为什么有共和党国会的原因

translation.en: -I can't believe you took the book. -She said I could have it. It was mine.
translation.zh: -我真不敢相信你真拿了那本书-她说我可以拿 本来就是我的

translation.en: You have your keys?
translation.zh: 你钥匙带着呢吗？

translation.en: She was clearly very happy to see me.
translation.zh: 显然 她见到我很开心

translation.en: When it ended, we weren't on speaking terms,
translation.zh: 我们分手时 彼此之间都不说话了

translation.en: but now you see that big hug she insisted on giving me?
translation.zh: 但刚才你看见了吗？她硬要给我一个大大的拥抱

translation.en: Maureen always said that your mother was the love of my life.
translation.zh: 莫琳经常说你妈妈是我一生的挚爱

translation.en: -You gonna take the bridge or the tunnel? -I thought you were leaving tomorrow.
translation.zh: -你要走大桥还是走隧道？-我以为你明天就要走了

translation.en: That's why I drove all the way into Brooklyn.
translation.zh: 所以我才一路赶来布鲁克林

translation.en: I'm staying a few days.
translation.zh: 我要待几天

translation.en: I was around all this plaster dust earlier.
translation.zh: 早些时候我一直在石膏土里打转

translation.en: We have lots of room. Maureen is keen on seeing you as well.
translation.zh: 我那里有很多房间莫琳也很想见见你

translation.en: She's your stepmother as much as Cody is your stepfather.
translation.zh: 科迪是你的继父可她也是你的继母啊

translation.en: I told Mom I'd stay here.
translation.zh: 我跟妈妈说过了 我要留在这里

translation.en: Maybe split half the time there and half with us?
translation.zh: 那你一半时间陪她一半时间陪我们 如何？

translation.en: I'm not splitting the time like I did at 15.
translation.zh: 我不会再像15岁那年来回奔波的

translation.en: It was very important to me after our separation
translation.zh: 我们分开之后我能有一半时间跟你在一起

translation.en: that I see you half the time.
translation.zh: 对我来说很重要

translation.en: I wanted to make it up after Danny and Jean.
translation.zh: 经历了丹尼和琼的事情后我希望能好好弥补这一点

translation.en: -Then make it up to them. -I made a real effort with you.
translation.zh: -那你就去弥补他们啊-我在你身上花了很多心思

translation.en: Danny and Jean, I could've done better,
translation.zh: 至于丹尼和琼 我本可以做得更好

translation.en: but I don't see anything significant I could've done better with you.
translation.zh: 但我不知道怎么对你才算更好

translation.en: -Really? Nothing? -Oh, come on, Matthew.
translation.zh: -真的吗？没有吗？-别这样 马修

translation.en: You feel like that all was great?
translation.zh: 你觉得你做得一切都很好吗？

translation.en: Danny definitely got shit, and Jean didn't even get shit.
translation.zh: 丹尼经常受到你的责骂而琼连被责骂的机会都没有

translation.en: But I got your focus, and that fucked me up in a whole other way.
translation.zh: 但你的注意力都集中在我身上你用这种方式把我搞得一团糟

translation.en: We never see each other. Let's not fight.
translation.zh: 我们这么久没见过面 还是别吵了

translation.en: I keep thinking I know how to handle you now,
translation.zh: 我一直在想要如何面对你

translation.en: but then I see you and I get suckered into your shit all over again.
translation.zh: 但当我一见到你立马又被你牵着鼻子走

translation.en: Your career, your jacket...
translation.zh: 你的事业 你的外套…

translation.en: Then, when I try to actually help, like today, you won't listen.
translation.zh: 当我真正想要帮你的时候就像今天一样 你根本就不听

translation.en: I don't see how I could be such a bad father.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么在你眼里我是个不称职的父亲

translation.en: -Look how successful you are. -Right.
translation.zh: -看看你现在多成功-没错

translation.en: -I could never be the businessman you are. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我永远成为不了你这样的生意人-好吧

translation.en: I've said to Maureen, "I don't know who Matthew takes after.
translation.zh: 我之前跟莫琳说：“我都不知道马修随的谁

translation.en: I certainly didn't know how to make money."
translation.zh: 我真的不知道怎么挣钱”

translation.en: That's right, I don't take after you! None of us do!
translation.zh: 没错 我没随你！我们几个都没随你！

translation.en: You had to be the only artist in the family!
translation.zh: 只有你才能是家里唯一的艺术家！

translation.en: It doesn't matter that I make money, because you don't respect what I do!
