translation.zh: 我挣不挣钱无所谓因为你根本就不尊重我的职业！

translation.en: What do you need my respect for?
translation.zh: 你要我的尊重干嘛？

translation.en: The world respects you because you make money.
translation.zh: 只要你钱多全世界都会对你俯首称臣

translation.en: I want to punch you in the nose!
translation.zh: 我真想揍你一拳！

translation.en: I know you think you can treat me this way because of your money.
translation.zh: 我知道你是怎么想的你觉得自己有钱 就能这样对我

translation.en: It doesn't matter how much money I make!
translation.zh: 这跟我挣多少钱没关系！

translation.en: You make me feel like a big piece of shit because you don't care about it!
translation.zh: 你让我感觉一团糟因为你根本就不在乎！

translation.en: But you also actually do!
translation.zh: 但其实你在乎得很！

translation.en: You're privately obsessed with it!
translation.zh: 你自己非常痴迷于这种感觉！

translation.en: You know that I beat you!
translation.zh: 你知道我比你强！

translation.en: I beat you!
translation.zh: 我比你强！

translation.en: I beat...
translation.zh: 我比…

translation.en: It's quite startling.
translation.zh: 让人十分惊讶

translation.en: A collection of fluids on the left side of his head
translation.zh: 左脑液体聚集

translation.en: was shoving the brain clear to the right.
translation.zh: 正推向右脑

translation.en: His brain experienced so much pressure and irritation
translation.zh: 他大脑受到的压力和刺激太多了

translation.en: that he was in an almost comatose state before we operated.
translation.zh: 在我们开始手术之前他基本上都处于昏迷状态了

translation.en: There was still some bleeding in the left frontal lobe, but no tissue was lost.
translation.zh: 左大脑额叶还在流血但没有软组织脱落

translation.en: The head trauma clogged up the spinal fluid absorption pathways,
translation.zh: 头部创伤堵塞了脊髓液吸收的途径

translation.en: which slows speech, causes lethargy, headaches.
translation.zh: 由此造成语速慢 嗜睡和头痛

translation.en: Honestly, this should have been taken care of immediately after the trauma.
translation.zh: 老实说 受到创伤之后应该立即就医

translation.en: Did you notice his wife was heavily perfumed?
translation.zh: 你没察觉他妻子香味太浓了吗？

translation.en: -I think I smelled alcohol on her breath. -Yes, I'm worried about her as well.
translation.zh: -我倒是从她的呼吸中闻出了酒味-是的 我也很担心她

translation.en: I didn't realize anyone was here. How's he doing?
translation.zh: 这里人我都不认识 他怎么样了？

translation.en: -He's sleeping. -Not doing much, sleeping. Shit! Sorry.
translation.zh: -在睡觉-就是在睡觉而已 该死的！抱歉

translation.en: -Good. You're family? -Yes.
translation.zh: -好 你是家属吗？-是的

translation.en: -Maureen only told us this morning. -Yeah. Via text.
translation.zh: -莫琳今早才告诉我们的-嗯 短信告知的

translation.en: -They were in Maureen's country house. -We drove from Rochester to Pittsfield.
translation.zh: -他们现在在莫琳的乡间小屋-我们从罗契斯特开到皮茨菲尔德

translation.en: -We wanted to talk to a doctor. -We haven't been able to get information.
translation.zh: -我们想跟医生谈谈-我们连具体情况都不知道

translation.en: I'm Pam. This is Dr. Soni.
translation.zh: 我是帕姆 这是索尼医生

translation.en: -Hi, nice to meet you. -Jean.
translation.zh: -你好-我是琼

translation.en: -Hi, nice to meet you. -Danny.
translation.zh: -你好-我是丹尼

translation.en: Dr. Soni, can you tell us what's going on with our dad?
translation.zh: 索尼医生 麻烦告诉我们爸爸的情况 好吗？

translation.en: When your mother's here, we can go over it.
translation.zh: 你妈妈在这里的时候我会告诉你们的

translation.en: She's our stepmother.
translation.zh: 她是我们的继母

translation.en: She would've been seven when she had me.
translation.zh: 才比我大七岁而已

translation.en: Well, when your stepmother comes back.
translation.zh: 还是要等你继母回来

translation.en: We can't find her. She's not at the country house.
translation.zh: 我们找不到她 她没在乡下屋子里

translation.en: -Her voicemail's full. -Why can't you tell us right now?
translation.zh: -她的语音信箱满了-为什么你不现在就告诉我们呢？

translation.en: This is awkward.
translation.zh: 其实有点尴尬

translation.en: -What's awkward? -What?
translation.zh: -尴尬什么？-什么？

translation.en: I don't want to get involved in family dynamics,
translation.zh: 我不想涉足你们的家庭矛盾

translation.en: but she told me not to talk to anyone else.
translation.zh: 但她告诉我不要跟任何人讲

translation.en: Well, that's not right, obviously. We're his kids.
translation.zh: 这显然不对劲啊 我们是他的子女

translation.en: -You can talk to us. -No, that's what I'm saying.
translation.zh: -你可以跟我们说说他的病情-不 我说了不行

translation.en: Since she's the next of kin, I legally cannot talk to you. I'm very sorry.
translation.zh: 因为她是最近的亲属从法律上来讲我不能告诉你 抱歉

translation.en: He has an opening on Monday.
translation.zh: 他周一有个开幕式

translation.en: This is our first real hospital...
translation.zh: 这真是我们第一次来医院…

translation.en: Talk to your stepmother.
translation.zh: 跟你继母谈谈

translation.en: Why'd you tell the doctor not to talk to us?
translation.zh: 你为什么不让医生告诉爸爸的病情？

translation.en: Maureen, where have you been?
translation.zh: 莫琳 你去哪里了？

translation.en: Are you moving that way on purpose?
translation.zh: 你是故意这么走路的吗？

translation.en: What? No, it's always worse after I've been sitting.
translation.zh: 什么？不是 我一直坐着就会更瘸

translation.en: -I thought you were mocking me. -You don't walk that way.
translation.zh: -我以为你是在嘲笑我-你不是那么走路的

translation.en: -I thought it was a bad imitation. -We need to be able to talk to Dr. Soni.
translation.zh: -你模仿得真蹩脚-我们需要跟索尼医生谈谈

translation.en: Dr. Soni looks very much like a chum of mine at university
translation.zh: 索尼医生长得很像我大学的一个室友

translation.en: who became an art looter, but that's of no use to you.
translation.zh: 之后成了一个艺术强盗但这对你们来说也没用

translation.en: -No. -Absolutely none.
translation.zh: -不-绝对没用

translation.en: I'll get the information, and you can ask me.
translation.zh: 我有了消息后你们可以问我

translation.en: E-mail might be best if we're gonna be in Rochester.
translation.zh: 如果我们在罗契斯特最好用邮件联系

translation.en: -I'm here, Danny's here. -I'm here.
translation.zh: -我和丹尼都在这-我在这

translation.en: You need to tell her it's okay to speak to me, or Danny, or Matt,
translation.zh: 你需要告诉她 给我或者丹尼或马修

translation.en: who's on his way.
translation.zh: 讲病情都可以

translation.en: -Matt's coming? -He texted me, I texted him.
translation.zh: -马修要来吗？-我们发了短信

translation.en: He texted you, you texted him.
translation.zh: 你们互发了短信

translation.en: Do you think I'm not gonna tell you the truth?
translation.zh: 你觉得我不会告诉你实情吗？

translation.en: -I can drive, Maureen. -Jean...
translation.zh: -我能开车 莫琳-琼…

translation.en: you were wearing that same sweater that last time I saw you.
translation.zh: 上次我见你也是穿的这件毛衣

translation.en: Was I?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Maureen, we've been sitting in that room with him,
translation.zh: 莫琳 我们跟他在屋子里坐着

translation.en: and he's attached to those machines, and there's a drain in his head,
translation.zh: 他被接到那些机器上头上还有一根引流管

translation.en: and he's unconscious,
translation.zh: 他没有意识

translation.en: and we don't know where you are or what's going on.
translation.zh: 我们不知道你在哪里 或出什么事了

translation.en: Talk to the doc...!
translation.zh: 跟医生谈谈！

translation.en: Oh, hi. Still sleeping?
translation.zh: 嗨 还在睡吗？

translation.en: I'm Pam, the nurse.
translation.zh: 我是护士帕姆

translation.en: Hey, I'm Matt, the son.
translation.zh: 你好 我是他儿子马修

translation.en: Oh, I met your brother and sister.
translation.zh: 我见了你哥哥和姐姐

translation.en: Half-brother and sister, yeah. Is he okay?
translation.zh: 同父异母的哥哥和姐姐 他还好吗？

translation.en: Dr. Soni spoke with your stepmother, and then your siblings... half siblings,
translation.zh: 索尼医生跟你继母谈了然后还有你的哥哥姐姐…同父异母的

translation.en: and it's all been cleared up, and she can talk to you freely now.
translation.zh: 都谈妥了 她现在可以随意跟你说了

translation.en: Oh, okay. How's he doing?
translation.zh: 嗯 好 他怎么样了？

translation.en: Your father was brought to us the night before last,
translation.zh: 你爸爸是前晚送进来的

translation.en: but because he was taking baby aspirin,
translation.zh: 因为他服用了儿童阿司匹林

translation.en: which thins the blood, Dr. Soni had to wait until the morning to operate.
translation.zh: 让血液稀释了索尼医生得等到早上才能给他动手术

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: He had a chronic subdural hematoma,
translation.zh: 他得了慢性硬膜下血肿

translation.en: which meant in his case there had been steady bleeding in his head for some time.
translation.zh: 也就是说他的大脑已经持续渗血了一段时间

translation.en: How did he get this?
translation.zh: 怎么会这样？

translation.en: Something like this generally can happen from a fall, or if he hit his head.
translation.zh: 通常是摔跤或头部受创造成的

translation.en: He fell about four months ago. Bruno pulled him onto a path.
translation.zh: 他四个月前摔了一跤布鲁诺在一条小路上把他拉到了

translation.en: Honestly, I'm surprised he had such a delayed response.
translation.zh: 老实讲 他的延迟反应让我很震惊

translation.en: He must have a real tolerance for discomfort.
translation.zh: 他对于不适感的忍耐力肯定很惊人

translation.en: Will he be okay?
translation.zh: 他会好转吗？

translation.en: Because he waited so long,
translation.zh: 由于受创时间太长

translation.en: there was quite a bit of irritation in the frontal lobe,
translation.zh: 他前额叶受到了刺激

translation.en: and now that the pressure's off the brain, it causes severe agitation.
translation.zh: 现在大脑内的压力导致了严重的振荡

translation.en: The frontal lobe has language,
translation.zh: 前额叶管控言语能力

translation.en: but it's potentially a hundred percent recoverable.
translation.zh: 但也可能完全恢复

translation.en: He was very responsive this morning.
translation.zh: 他今早反应还不错

translation.en: He was identifying objects. I showed him a flashlight, he said "flashlight."
translation.zh: 他能够认得东西了我给他看手电筒 他就说手电筒

translation.en: I'll leave you guys.
translation.zh: 我让你们独处一下

translation.en: Thanks, Pam.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 帕姆

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Do you know my name?
translation.zh: 你知道我叫什么吗？

translation.en: Of course, it's Matthew.
translation.zh: 当然知道 你是马修啊

translation.en: What is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: Blackberry.
translation.zh: 黑莓手机

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: This is...
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: What, Dad?
translation.zh: 是什么 爸爸？

translation.en: This...
translation.zh: 是…

translation.en: You...
translation.zh: 你…

translation.en: It's okay, we don't have to talk.
translation.zh: 没事 我们不用非得聊天的

translation.en: I can say it.
translation.zh: 我能说出来

translation.en: You're here...
translation.zh: 我希望你…

translation.en: is what I wanted.
translation.zh: 来这儿

translation.en: How...? How are you feeling?
translation.zh: 你…你感觉怎么样？

translation.en: I'm happy...
translation.zh: 我很高兴…

translation.en: I'm happy you're here.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你能来

translation.en: Yeah, I took a red-eye when I heard.
translation.zh: 是的 我一听这事就赶深夜航班回来了

translation.en: I'm sorry we...
translation.zh: 很遗憾 我们…

translation.en: I'm sorry this happened.
translation.zh: 很遗憾发生了这种事

translation.en: When is my...?
translation.zh: 什么时候是我的…

translation.en: Your opening?
translation.zh: 你的开幕式吗？

translation.en: It's on Monday.
translation.zh: 周一

translation.en: Is that today?
translation.zh: 是今天吗？

translation.en: No, today is Wednesday.
translation.zh: 不 今天是星期三

translation.en: Will it happen?
translation.zh: 还会有展览吗？

translation.en: It will happen, Dad.
translation.zh: 会的 爸爸

translation.en: I don't know if you'll be able go.
translation.zh: 我不确定你的身体情况允不允许你去

translation.en: Will you?
translation.zh: 你会去吗？

translation.en: Sure, I'll go.
translation.zh: 我当然会去

translation.en: You speak for me.
translation.zh: 你代我发言

translation.en: Yeah, I can say something, yes.
translation.zh: 嗯 我可以代你说几句

translation.en: It's yours.
translation.zh: 那就交给你了

translation.en: We made it together.
translation.zh: 是我们共同创作的

translation.en: I have a meeting in the city which I need to get to.
translation.zh: 我得去城里开个会

translation.en: -Okay. -That's okay, right?
translation.zh: -好吧-这没关系 对吧？

translation.en: -Sure. -He's okay, right? I'm not abandoning him?
translation.zh: -当然-他没事吧？我不是不管他 对吧？

translation.en: -I can't really answer that. -I just have this client meeting.
translation.zh: -这个问题我可回答不了-我必须去见客户

translation.en: -I understand. -He's okay, right?
translation.zh: -我理解-他没事 对吧？

translation.en: I think so, yeah.
translation.zh: 我想是的

translation.en: I left my number in the room. Call me if anything changes.
translation.zh: 我把号码留在了病房里有事就打电话给我

translation.en: Where you are?
translation.zh: 你在哪儿？

translation.en: I'm in Pittsfield. It's in Massachusetts.
translation.zh: 我在马萨诸塞州的皮茨菲尔德

translation.en: Is that like New York?
translation.zh: 那里像纽约一样吗？

translation.en: Well, it's a different state.
translation.zh: 这里和纽约不在一个州

translation.en: It's sunny here. What is it there?
translation.zh: 这里阳光明媚 那里天气怎么样？

translation.en: Rainy.
translation.zh: 在下雨

translation.en: You can't fight the weather. You can fight knights.
translation.zh: 你不能对抗天气 但你能对抗骑士

translation.en: -Yeah. -And ninjas.
translation.zh: -没错-和忍者

translation.en: Do you know who's good at playing ninjas? Jim.
translation.zh: 你知道谁擅长演忍者吗？吉姆

translation.en: -Who's Jim? -He's the handyman.
translation.zh: -吉姆是谁？-他是这里的杂务工

translation.en: I've never heard of Jim.
translation.zh: 我从未听说过吉姆

translation.en: You used to live here, but you don't anymore.
translation.zh: 你过去住在这里 但现在不在了

translation.en: If you did, you would know Jim.
translation.zh: 要是你一直住在这里你就会认识吉姆

translation.en: Do you see a lot of Jim?
translation.zh: 你常常见到吉姆？

translation.en: He comes on weekends. Is this a weekend?
translation.zh: 他周末过来 今天是周末吗？

translation.en: In three days it's a weekend.
translation.zh: 再过三天就是周末

translation.en: Three days, that's three weeks.
translation.zh: 三天 是三周吧

translation.en: No, sweetheart, it's three days. Does Jim stay over?
translation.zh: 不 甜心 是三天吉姆会留下来过夜吗？

translation.en: No, Jim doesn't sleep.
translation.zh: 不 吉姆不睡觉

translation.en: He stays up all night with Mommy eating dinner and leaves in the morning.
translation.zh: 他和妈咪会一起待一整晚吃晚餐 然后在早上离开

translation.en: Hold on, I'm getting another call.
translation.zh: 等一下 我接个电话

translation.en: Raise your hand if ninjas are your favorite thing.
translation.zh: 认为自己最喜欢忍者的人请举手

translation.en: -Just wait a second, sweetheart. -Bye now.
translation.zh: -等一下 甜心-再见

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Maybe if he hears it?
translation.zh: 也许他听到了呢？

translation.en: Danny, stop. It doesn't help. Do you know who this is?
translation.zh: 行了 丹尼 这没用你知道这个人是谁吗？

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: Do you remember when you said "Danny?"
translation.zh: 记得你叫我“丹尼”吗？

translation.en: -You have to stop giving him the answers. -It's all right.
translation.zh: -别把答案告诉他呀-我没事

translation.en: Who's this?
translation.zh: 知道这个人是谁吗？

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: -Oh, no. -It's Matt. He just got here.
translation.zh: -不-这是马修 他刚刚到

translation.en: -Stop giving him the answers. -So, how we doing?
translation.zh: -别再告诉他答案了-病人情况怎么样？

translation.en: -It's all right. -Where's Pam?
translation.zh: -我没事-帕姆去哪了？

translation.en: -Pam Engels or Pam Chin? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -帕姆·恩格斯还是帕姆·金？-不知道

translation.en: I was just here. He knew what a Blackberry was
translation.zh: 我刚才在这里看过他他知道黑莓手机是什么

translation.en: and could say my name and everything.
translation.zh: 知道我的名字和其他所有事

translation.en: We talked about his show.
translation.zh: 我们聊了他的展览

translation.en: You were here? Where were you?
translation.zh: 你刚才在这里？之后去哪了？

translation.en: Sometimes they can take a little while to come back from these surgeries.
translation.zh: 有时病人需要一点时间从外科手术中恢复过来

translation.en: No, he was already back.
translation.zh: 不对 他之前已经恢复过来了

translation.en: I'm sorry, who are you? Who is everybody? I just got here.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不认识你 你们是谁？我刚调过来的

translation.en: -We're his kids. -Where's Pam?
translation.zh: -我们是他的子女-帕姆在哪？

translation.en: -I wasn't here, so I don't know. -I was, that's what I'm telling you.
translation.zh: -我刚才不在这儿 不知道-我刚才在这儿 这么告诉你吧

translation.en: Why didn't you call us? Where'd you go?
translation.zh: 你为什么不联系我们？你刚才是去了哪儿？

translation.en: I was heading to the city for a meeting, and I turned around when Pam called.
translation.zh: 我要去市里开会接到帕姆的电话后又掉头回来了

translation.en: Tiredness can cause this, and his blood pressure is high.
translation.zh: 疲惫会导致这种情况 他的血压很高

translation.en: This isn't tiredness. Something's wrong. Where's...? Can't we find Pam?
translation.zh: 不是疲惫的原因 肯定是哪出了问题那谁…不能把帕姆找来吗？

translation.en: No, I'm the charge nurse.
translation.zh: 不行 我是这里的护士长

translation.en: -You were here. Why didn't you call us? -It never occurred to me.
translation.zh: -你当时在 为何不给我们打电话？-我从没想过给你们打电话

translation.en: -Where's Dr. Soni? -She's on her rounds.
translation.zh: -索尼医生在哪？-她在查房

translation.en: Something is happening to my father.
translation.zh: 我父亲的病情有变

translation.en: -I want Pam! -Okay, you're gonna have to stop shouting.
translation.zh: -叫帕姆过来！-好吧 别大喊大叫

translation.en: -We're sorry, he's just emotional. -It's our dad.
translation.zh: -抱歉 他有点情绪失控-是因为我们的爸爸出事了

translation.en: I'm not emotional, Danny! I want Pam!
translation.zh: 我没有闹情绪 丹尼！把帕姆找来！

translation.en: Right now we're waiting for a neurologist to read his EEG for brainwave activity.
translation.zh: 现在我们在等一个神经病医师看他的脑电图 看看脑电波是否正常

translation.en: -When will that happen? -I don't know. It's being read in India.
translation.zh: -什么时候出结果？-我不知道 那个医师在印度看图

translation.en: Because of... Why?
translation.zh: 因为…为什么？

translation.en: In the meantime, I'm gonna give him Lotensin for his high blood pressure.
translation.zh: 在这期间 我会给他开洛丁新用药物控制他的高血压

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我马上回来

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: He's giving him Lotensin. What did he get for his blood pressure before?
translation.zh: 他要给爸爸开洛丁新他以前用什么降压药？

translation.en: The other nurse came by. She did something.
translation.zh: 另一个护士负责看护爸爸用药什么的都是她负责

translation.en: -Yeah, she seemed to know. -Did you write it down?
translation.zh: -嗯 她貌似知道他之前用什么药-你们把它记下来了吗？

translation.en: -I can't remember. -Me neither.
translation.zh: -我记不清了-我也是

translation.en: From now on, everything gets written down. Do you understand?
translation.zh: 从现在开始 一切都要记下来明白了吗？

translation.en: It's one thing! You can read what the number is now.
translation.zh: 用什么药都一样！各项数值都显示在这里

translation.en: He's alive!
translation.zh: 他还活着！

translation.en: Jesus, these people do this for a living.
translation.zh: 老天 这些人就是吃这碗饭的

translation.en: These people change every five minutes.
translation.zh: 这些人每五分钟一轮换

translation.en: If we're not paying attention, he might die.
translation.zh: 要是我们不注意 他可能会死

translation.en: -Do you understand that? -I do.
translation.zh: -你们明白了吗？-明白了

translation.en: -Jesus. -I'll write everything down.
translation.zh: -天啊-我会把一切都记下来

translation.en: -Everything. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -一切-好

translation.en: -I got it! -I'm sorry!
translation.zh: -我知道了！-对不起！

translation.en: It's okay!
translation.zh: 没关系！

translation.en: It's nice to see you, Matt.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你 马修

translation.en: The lost speech could be because of frequent or partial seizures.
translation.zh: 失语的原因可能是间歇性或部分性癫痫发作

translation.en: An up and down is common, but this is more of a down than expected.
translation.zh: 病情时好时坏很常见但这个恶化程度超出预期了

translation.en: If it was his heart, we'd shock him out of it,
translation.zh: 如果是他的心脏有问题我们可以采取电击治疗

translation.en: but you can't shock the brain in these cases,
translation.zh: 可这种情况下 你不能电击他的大脑

translation.en: so we need to quiet the brain.
translation.zh: 我们必须让他的大脑休眠

translation.en: We're putting him in a barbiturate coma,
translation.zh: 我们要给他打巴比妥麻醉药

translation.en: with a combination of propofol and pentobarbital or phenobarbital.
translation.zh: 再加上丙泊酚、戊巴比妥或者苯巴比妥米那

translation.en: Probably pento. I want to be aggressive.
translation.zh: 但戊巴比妥可能性较大我建议激进治疗法

translation.en: Will he be okay?
translation.zh: 他会好起来吧？

translation.en: Think of it like shutting down a computer and then restarting.
translation.zh: 就把这想象成关闭电脑 然后再重启

translation.en: Or, if you're a Luddite like me, like a grain of sand becoming a pearl.
translation.zh: 或者 如果你是像我一样的勒德分子这就象成一颗即将变成珍珠的砂砾

translation.en: Will he be okay?
translation.zh: 他会好转吧？

translation.en: Well, it's not what we'd hope at this stage.
translation.zh: 现阶段不要考虑这种事

translation.en: Because he'll be completely sedated, we'll need to intubate.
translation.zh: 因为等镇静剂充分发挥作用后我们必须给他插管

translation.en: I want you to know we're doing our very best.
translation.zh: 我想要你知道 我们会尽最大努力

translation.en: We want to see your father walking out of here soon.
translation.zh: 希望看到你爸爸不久后就能自己走出这里

translation.en: Thank you, Dr. Soni.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 索尼医生

translation.en: I'm gonna be on vacation for three weeks starting tomorrow.
translation.zh: 从明天开始 我要休假三周

translation.en: -What?! -Really?
translation.zh: -什么？-你说啥？

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.zh: 你说真的？

translation.en: He'll be in very good care. Dr. Brotman will be taking over.
translation.zh: 会有人照顾好他的布罗特曼医生会接手我的工作

translation.en: -"Dr. Brotman." -Do you have to go?
translation.zh: -“布罗特曼医生”-你一定要去休假吗？

translation.en: -Can't you just push it? -We need you here!
translation.zh: -能不能推迟一段时间？-我们需要你在这里！

translation.en: God, no. My husband would divorce me. We're going to China.
translation.zh: 老天 不行 我老公会气到跟我离婚我们打算去中国

translation.en: You're putting our dad in a coma and then leaving us?
translation.zh: 你打算让我们爸爸陷入昏迷然后就丢下我们拍拍屁股走人？

translation.en: It's not like that, Matt. It's not. Right, Dr. Soni? It's not like that?
translation.zh: 不是这样的 马修 不是这样对吧 索尼医生？你不会这样吧？

translation.en: Well, technically, yes. It's that.
translation.zh: 字面上来讲 没错 就是这样

translation.en: -You can't do that to us! -First Pam, now you?
translation.zh: -你不能这么对我们！-先是帕姆 现在是你？

translation.en: -Can we get Pam back at least? -I'm not in charge of nurse assignments.
translation.zh: -至少可以把帕姆调回来吧？-我不负责分配护士

translation.en: -Hi, Dr. Soni. -Hi, Dr. Liu.
translation.zh: -嗨 索尼医生-嗨 刘医生

translation.en: -Shouldn't you be packing for China? -It doesn't feel fair, Dr. Soni,
translation.zh: -你不该在家打包行李好去中国吗？-这不公平 索尼医生

translation.en: that you can just live your life normally while our dad is lying here.
translation.zh: 在我们爸爸躺在病床上的时候你却能无动于衷地过着正常生活

translation.en: Maybe it isn't.
translation.zh: 也许是不太公平

translation.en: I'm gonna stay a few days until Dad's opening at Bard.
translation.zh: 我会在这里停留几天直到爸爸在巴德学院的艺术展开幕

translation.en: Stay with us at Maureen's house.
translation.zh: 来莫琳家和我们一起住吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Dad says you started your own company.
translation.zh: 爸爸说你自己开了个公司

translation.en: -Yeah, a couple of other guys and me... -How does that work?
translation.zh: -是我和其他人开的…-你是怎么开公司的？

translation.en: Did you just tell your boss, "I'm gonna start my..."
translation.zh: 是不是直接告诉你老板“我打算自己开…”

translation.en: I was one of the partners, so I didn't technically have a boss.
translation.zh: 我是公司合伙人之一严格来说 我没有老板

translation.en: No, I understand. So, you got a better offer?
translation.zh: 不用说了 我明白的有人给了你一份更好的工作？

translation.en: No, there were no offers. That's what was so scary.
translation.zh: 不 没人给我工作这也正是自己开公司的可怕之处

translation.en: We were creating our own opportunity.
translation.zh: 我们自己创造机会

translation.en: -Because you wanted something smaller. -Bigger.
translation.zh: -因为你的目标更小-是更大

translation.en: -Many of the firm's clients came with us. -Which was surprising.
translation.zh: -很多原来公司的客户找我们合作-这真让人惊讶

translation.en: No, we expected it. We can't legally ask clients to come with us...
translation.zh: 不 这是我们预期到的 法律上讲我们不能强求客户选择我们…

translation.en: But they don't have much choice.
translation.zh: 但他们没有太多选择

translation.en: It's totally their choice.
translation.zh: 这完全是他们自己的选择

translation.en: No, I know. Because you have their money.
translation.zh: 不用说了 我明白因为你手里攥着他们的钱

translation.en: Well, their money's with the firm,
translation.zh: 是原来的公司攥着他们的钱

translation.en: but their money is in investments or a bank.
translation.zh: 不过他们的钱不是投资出去了就是放在银行里

translation.en: I understand. My buddy Ptolemy, who lives across the street, or lived...
translation.zh: 我明白 我哥们托勒密住在街对面 或许是住在…

translation.en: Dad told me about your...
translation.zh: 爸爸跟我说过你的…

translation.en: -Karen? I'm sorry. I've also... -Ptolemy's like you, works in arbitrage.
translation.zh: -那个凯伦的事？抱歉 我也…-托勒密像你一样在做套利这行

translation.en: Yeah, that's not what I do.
translation.zh: 我做的不是这行

translation.en: No, I wasn't saying...
translation.zh: 不 我不是说…

translation.en: But Ptolemy said that the system is rigged from the inside.
translation.zh: 但是托勒密说这一行是内部人员非法操控的

translation.en: -That's not entirely true. -But mostly?
translation.zh: -这不完全是真的-但大部分是真的？

translation.en: -So, this is an exciting time for me. -How's your boy?
translation.zh: -这对我来说是做生意的好时机-你儿子好吗？

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 他很好

translation.en: Victoria and I are having some problems.
translation.zh: 维多利亚和我之间出现了些问题

translation.en: I never met her. Karen and I separated.
translation.zh: 我从未见过她 凯伦和我分居了

translation.en: -I know. I just said I was sorry. -Did you?
translation.zh: -我知道 我刚说了我很抱歉-你说了？

translation.en: I'm sorry, too.
translation.zh: 我也很抱歉

translation.en: -I liked Eliza's movie. -She sent it to you?
translation.zh: -我喜欢伊丽莎的电影-她寄给你了？

translation.en: -Are you limping? -Yes!
translation.zh: -你怎么一瘸一拐的？-没错！

translation.en: It's always stiff after I've been sitting.
translation.zh: 我坐久了就老是脚麻

translation.en: -You should see the other dog. -What?
translation.zh: -没有最惨 只有更惨-什么？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 没什么

translation.en: I borrowed an old cane from Maureen's dead ex-husband,
translation.zh: 我借了莫琳过世的前夫的一根旧拐杖

translation.en: but it's really not necessary.
translation.zh: 不过 也不是非得用

translation.en: I keep it in the car. I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 我把它放在车里 我是想说

translation.en: -It's tax season. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -现在是报税季节-没错

translation.en: -Okay. -There's a step!
translation.zh: -好的-小心台阶！

translation.en: -Thank you. -Jean, there's a step.
translation.zh: -谢谢-琼 小心台阶

translation.en: I left the necks on for those of you who are feeling... adventurous.
translation.zh: 脖子我没有切掉…谁敢吃就吃吧

translation.en: Evidently, they net them.
translation.zh: 显然 他们用网把鸟都抓走了

translation.en: They net whole trees, and they just take all of the little birds,
translation.zh: 他们在所有的树上设网把所有的小鸟都抓走了

translation.en: and just deep fry them, and just...
translation.zh: 然后把它们油炸了 再…

translation.en: It's very sad.
translation.zh: 这真是太可怜了

translation.en: I've never known little birds that didn't mind leaving the home.
translation.zh: 我从不知道还有那种愿意离巢的小鸟

translation.en: They're tiny little birds. They're just...
translation.zh: 它们是小雏鸟 只会…

translation.en: The Knicks totally started, but then got to the point with one player away.
translation.zh: 尼克斯队势头正高可之后一个球员被罚下场

translation.en: -Yeah. -The Knicks need a point guard.
translation.zh: -是啊-尼克斯队需要一个控球后卫

translation.en: I'll take two.
translation.zh: 我要拿两张牌

translation.en: Would you fuck Pam?
translation.zh: 你愿意和帕姆上床吗？

translation.en: I would.
translation.zh: 我愿意

translation.en: Just kidding.
translation.zh: 只是开玩笑啦

translation.en: You'd think they never took a photo of me as a child.
translation.zh: 你会觉得我还是孩子时他们从未给我拍过照

translation.en: You were both such middle-aged men in the making.
translation.zh: 你俩都是成长中的中年人

translation.en: Don't check out your shoes Don't look at the sky
translation.zh: 别低头看鞋 别抬头望天

translation.en: Say it with confidence And look them in the eye
translation.zh: 说话自信点 看着别人的眼睛

translation.en: Myron
translation.zh: 麦伦

translation.en: Danny?
translation.zh: 丹尼？

translation.en: The night nurse today is Rich.
translation.zh: 今晚值夜班的护士是里奇

translation.en: He's okay. He doesn't know anything.
translation.zh: 他没事 还是人事不知

translation.en: Dad's blood pressure is 178.
translation.zh: 爸爸的血压数是178

translation.en: His blood pressure dropped, so they put him on a Levophed drip,
translation.zh: 他的血压降下来了 于是他们给他输了去甲肾上腺素

translation.en: but that's hard on his kidneys, so...
translation.zh: 但这会给他的肾造成很大负担所以…

translation.en: It taste really sweet, too.
translation.zh: 这个尝起来也很甜

translation.en: It was a little gooey.
translation.zh: 这个有点黏糊糊的

translation.en: It freaked me out.
translation.zh: 这个好吓人

translation.en: Do I want meatballs? Do I want meatballs?
translation.zh: 我想吃肉丸吗？我想吃肉丸吗？

translation.en: And overnight he contracted sepsis, which is a full-body inflammation.
translation.zh: 昨晚他突然感染了败血症这是一种全身性炎症

translation.en: Unfortunately, the longer he's here, the more susceptible he is to infection.
translation.zh: 不幸的是 他在这里呆得越久就越容易得传染病

translation.en: What about his brain? Do we have an EEG?
translation.zh: 他的大脑情况如何？拍了脑电图了吗？

translation.en: This is a different unit. We're in the ICU.
translation.zh: 我们这里是重症监护室不负责拍脑电图

translation.en: I don't have those answers as of yet.
translation.zh: 至今我还不知道答案

translation.en: So now we're in the right unit to treat his sepsis,
translation.zh: 所以我们现在所在的部门治疗败血症

translation.en: but the wrong unit to treat his head?
translation.zh: 但不治头部疾病？

translation.en: They have a call in to a neurologist. People rarely come in on the weekends.
translation.zh: 他们得叫来一个神经病医师很少有人周末来医院看病

translation.en: Do people not generally get sick on weekends?
translation.zh: 一般人周末不生病吗？

translation.en: We're working on getting you those answers.
translation.zh: 我们会努力把你想要的答案给你

translation.en: This is a helpful summary of the conversations you might want to have.
translation.zh: 这是本很有用的临终对话集锦你们也许会想看一看 （临终关怀）

translation.en: End of life conversation?
translation.zh: 临终对话？

translation.en: These are things we suggest you say to your father before it's too late.
translation.zh: 我们建议你们在还来得及的时候和你们父亲说说这些话

translation.en: -"I love you." -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -“我爱你”-抱歉来晚了

translation.en: "I forgive you." "Forgive me."
translation.zh: “我原谅你了”、“请原谅我”

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -"Thank you." "Goodbye."
translation.zh: -我很抱歉-“谢谢你”、“再见”

translation.en: He told me he liked this when I played it once.
translation.zh: 有回我放这首歌的时候他说他喜欢这首歌

translation.en: I thought I'd go to the Whitney and...
translation.zh: 我本想去惠特尼博物馆…

translation.en: ask to see his sculpture, if it's not lost.
translation.zh: 请求看看他的雕塑如果那个雕塑没丢失的话

translation.en: -I want to say bye now. -We just got on the phone.
translation.zh: -我想挂电话了-我们才刚接通电话

translation.en: -I'm gonna press the button. -Hi, Tony, remember me?
translation.zh: -我要挂电话了-嗨 托尼 还记得我吗？

translation.en: -We've never actually met. -This is Eliza, your cousin.
translation.zh: -我们从未见过面-这是伊丽莎 你的堂姐

translation.en: -I'm pressing the button. -Wait.
translation.zh: -我要挂了-等等

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 见鬼！

translation.en: I'm oddly growing fond of this cafeteria,
translation.zh: 真奇怪 我现在越来越喜欢医院这个餐厅了

translation.en: like I'd almost come here just anyway to eat. How's your boy?
translation.zh: 感觉就像 反正以后大部分时间都要来这儿吃饭 你儿子好吗？

translation.en: She fucking gets in his head. He's always hanging up on me now.
translation.zh: 孩子他妈给他洗脑了现在他老挂我电话

translation.en: -Call him back. -I don't want to. It makes me feel bad.
translation.zh: -给他拨回去-我不想拨回去 这让我难受

translation.en: He's five years old, they hate phones.
translation.zh: 他才五岁 小孩都讨厌电话

translation.en: Eliza, when you were that age, you'd never talk on the phone.
translation.zh: 伊丽莎 你这么大的时候从来不讲电话

translation.en: She makes it too difficult.
translation.zh: 她把关系弄得太僵了

translation.en: I don't know, sometimes I think maybe I sit this kid out,
translation.zh: 我不知道 我有时候想也许我该不管这孩子

translation.en: start another family, and then he finds me at 21.
translation.zh: 组建个新家庭然后等他21岁时来找我

translation.en: Let him come to me.
translation.zh: 让他来找我

translation.en: He's not a girl you're trying to trick into dating you.
translation.zh: 他不是你想办法勾搭来找你的女孩

translation.en: Dad, your limp is worse.
translation.zh: 爸爸 你跛得更厉害了

translation.en: It's always stiff after I've been sitting.
translation.zh: 我坐久了就总是脚麻

translation.en: -I was looking online, could be your hip. -Could be.
translation.zh: -我去网上看过 可能是髋部的问题-有可能

translation.en: -It's my back. -We should get you checked out.
translation.zh: -是背部出了问题-我们该让你去检查一下

translation.en: -Yeah, Dad. -I don't have time to see a doctor now.
translation.zh: -没错 爸爸-我现在可没闲工夫去看医生

translation.en: -Where'd you get manicotti? -We're already at a doctor.
translation.zh: -你去哪儿拿的通心面？-我们就在医院里

translation.en: You really should, Dan.
translation.zh: 你真的该去看看医生 丹

translation.en: -I know what it is, okay? -What is it?
translation.zh: -我知道问题在哪儿 好吗？-在哪儿？

translation.en: It's... I mean, I basically know.
translation.zh: 在…我是说 我差不多知道

translation.en: -Dad, you've got to deal with it. -I've been telling him that.
translation.zh: -爸爸 你得去看医生-我一直这么跟他说

translation.en: -Yeah, look at Dad. -Right?
translation.zh: -没错 想想爸爸的样子-好吗？

translation.en: -He ignored his thing. -Just let me eat my fucking banana. Okay?
translation.zh: -他过去不注意身体-你们他妈的让我吃根香蕉行不行？

translation.en: You should call your son.
translation.zh: 你该给你儿子打电话

translation.en: -Hi, Matt! -Hey, Maureen.
translation.zh: -嗨 马修！-嗨 莫琳

translation.en: Maureen!
translation.zh: 莫琳！

translation.en: It's a shame The Dad is gonna miss the opening tomorrow.
translation.zh: 真遗憾老爹要错过明天的艺术展开幕了

translation.en: -He was really looking forward to it. -Dad asked me to say something.
translation.zh: -他一直盼望着这一天的到来-爸爸让我做开幕演讲

translation.en: I was gonna ask Danny and Jean, too.
translation.zh: 我会请求丹尼和琼也上去说两句

translation.en: He would never have expected you to have shown up.
translation.zh: 他从未料到你会出现

translation.en: We were trying to figure it out. Have you ever even been to this house before?
translation.zh: 我们一直想要让你回来你以前来过这个家吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: The Dad always hoped for a visit,
translation.zh: 老爹一直盼着你能来看看他

translation.en: but I guess you always had a lot to do in the city when you came to town,
translation.zh: 不过我猜每次你来镇上市里总是有很多事要你去做

translation.en: and us, not being the A-list parents and all.
translation.zh: 而我们 也不是什么多重要的父母

translation.en: Danny and Jean, of course, are here all the time,
translation.zh: 当然 丹尼和琼一直在这里

translation.en: but that's less exciting for The Dad.
translation.zh: 但老爹看多了也就不新鲜了

translation.en: I reached out to some of his old friends, who are going to come visit.
translation.zh: 我联系了他的一些老朋友他们会过来看看他

translation.en: Well, I hope they understand they'll be looking at a sleeping man.
translation.zh: 希望他们心里明白他们会看到一个睡着的人

translation.en: Hello, Andy Warhol.
translation.zh: 你好 安迪·沃霍尔

translation.en: I explained that in so many words.
translation.zh: 我跟他们详细解释过了

translation.en: I spoke to Dr. Diebert, the neurologist,
translation.zh: 我跟那个神经病医师戴伯特医生谈过了

translation.en: who seems very knowledgeable, but has no upper lip to speak of,
translation.zh: 他看起来知识渊博但是他也不敢把话说死

translation.en: and if Harold survives the infection,
translation.zh: 要是哈罗德能挺过这次感染

translation.en: they have no idea what person will be in there when he wakes up.
translation.zh: 他们不知道等他醒来时他会变成什么样的人

translation.en: Maybe he'll be Brad Pitt...
translation.zh: 也许他会变成布拉德·皮特…

translation.en: or Neruda,
translation.zh: 或是聂鲁达…

translation.en: or Joe the Plumber, I...
translation.zh: 或是管道工乔 我…

translation.en: I just want him to be Harold.
translation.zh: 我只想他仍是哈罗德

translation.en: Have you looked over the documents I sent you?
translation.zh: 你看过我寄给你的那些文件了吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 看过了

translation.en: And... given where we are with The Dad,
translation.zh: 鉴于我们和老爹现在住在这里…

translation.en: and the Manhattan house is more than we need right now,
translation.zh: 不需要曼哈顿的那个房子…

translation.en: I've taken your counsel, and I think selling the house and the art
translation.zh: 我接受了你的建议 我觉得把那个房子和里面的艺术品

translation.en: to James and Brian is the right thing to do.
translation.zh: 卖给詹姆斯和布莱恩是明智之举

translation.en: So... I signed the places that you marked for me.
translation.zh: 所以…我在你标好的这些地方签了字

translation.en: Great, then it's done.
translation.zh: 很好 那这事就结束了

translation.en: Some of those pieces are quite large. How will they be displayed?
translation.zh: 一些艺术品挺大件的他们打算怎么摆放？

translation.en: James' family owns a series of retirement communities around the country,
translation.zh: 詹姆斯家在全国各地开了一连串的养老社区

translation.en: and they're gonna donate the art to these facilities as a write-off.
translation.zh: 他们打算把这些艺术品捐给这些机构用来抵税

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I can't believe Danny is happy about that.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信丹尼会为此而高兴

translation.en: And Jean...
translation.zh: 还有琼…

translation.en: Who knows what Jean feels about anything.
translation.zh: 谁知道琼对一切是什么感受

translation.en: Well, with Dad's illness,
translation.zh: 既然爸爸病了

translation.en: I thought I'd wait till after the show to tell them anything, just...
translation.zh: 我想我会等到展览结束再告诉他们一切…

translation.en: I don't know, there's just been so much going on.
translation.zh: 我不知道 最近这段时间发生的事情太多了

translation.en: Really, they have no power anyway.
translation.zh: 反正他们也无能为力了

translation.en: I don't know what happened to them as children.
translation.zh: 我不知道他们小时发生了什么事

translation.en: Harold says he tried his best, but they're really such disappointments.
translation.zh: 哈罗德说他尽了力但他们还是成了这种德行

translation.en: Nobody took care of them.
translation.zh: 没人照顾他们

translation.en: I say that as a disappointment, myself.
translation.zh: 我说这种德行是在说我自己

translation.en: I was neglected too during my childhood.
translation.zh: 我童年时也被人忽视

translation.en: It's funny,
translation.zh: 说来好笑

translation.en: I was never interested in having kids.
translation.zh: 我从来没想过生孩子这事

translation.en: Maybe once.
translation.zh: 也许有想过一次

translation.en: No, not even once.
translation.zh: 不 一次也没有

translation.en: Eliza texted she came early to be with Dad.
translation.zh: 伊丽莎发短信说她会早点过来陪爸爸

translation.en: She texted you?
translation.zh: 她发了短信给你？

translation.en: The curator is meeting us at Bard at one,
translation.zh: 馆长约我们下午一点在巴德学院见面

translation.en: so let's get Eliza, say our goodbyes to Dad, and get on the road.
translation.zh: 那我们去接伊丽莎、和爸爸道别然后就赶紧上路

translation.en: Oh, good, Paul came.
translation.zh: 很好 保罗来了

translation.en: Paul Epstein.
translation.zh: 保罗·爱泼斯坦来了

translation.en: I always liked Paul.
translation.zh: 我一直很喜欢保罗

translation.en: Man, he's gotten older.
translation.zh: 天啊 他变得更老了

translation.en: I'm glad Dad still has friends.
translation.zh: 我很高兴爸爸还有朋友

translation.en: I'm gonna go say hi. Come on.
translation.zh: 我要过去打个招呼 来吧

translation.en: Jean, remember Paul and Laurie?
translation.zh: 琼 记得保罗和劳里吗？

translation.en: Jean?
translation.zh: 琼？

translation.en: I don't think I've ever seen Jean run.
translation.zh: 我印象里从未见过琼跑步

translation.en: Yeah, that's how she runs.
translation.zh: 我也是 她跑起来是这样啊

translation.en: You remember that summer I visited Dad on Martha's Vineyard?
translation.zh: 你们记得我去玛莎葡萄园岛看爸爸的那个夏天吗？

translation.en: Dad never invited me or Danny to the summer places.
translation.zh: 爸爸从未邀请过我或丹尼去那些避暑胜地

translation.en: But that summer I was a camp counselor
translation.zh: 但那年夏天 我是个夏令营辅导员

translation.en: -at French Woods in Vermont. -The one with Alisa Lirtzman?
translation.zh: -在佛蒙特州的法国森林艺术营-有艾丽莎·勒兹曼在的那个？

translation.en: No, that was Thoreau. I was only at this one for one summer.
translation.zh: 不 那个是梭罗艺术营我只在这个夏令营工作了一个夏天

translation.en: And I had two days off, and I called him, and he couldn't say no.
translation.zh: 我有两天休假 然后给他打了电话他无法拒绝我

translation.en: He must have gotten permission from your mother.
translation.zh: 肯定是你母亲同意了他这么做

translation.en: It wasn't as convenient as I had thought.
translation.zh: 路上没有我想得那么顺利

translation.en: I had to take two buses and a ferry.
translation.zh: 我得倒一轮汽车再坐一次渡船才能到

translation.en: When I arrived, nobody met me.
translation.zh: 我到时 没人来接我

translation.en: I hitchhiked to the other side of the island.
translation.zh: 我搭便车到了岛的另一端

translation.en: When I got to the house, it was already night.
translation.zh: 等我到那边时已经是晚上了

translation.en: The adults were all going out for dinner:
translation.zh: 大人们都出去吃晚饭了

translation.en: Dad and your mom, and L.J. and Maya, and Paul and Laurie.
translation.zh: 爸爸、你妈妈、艾尔杰、玛雅保罗和劳里

translation.en: Julia said something about me having my bags in the way.
translation.zh: 朱莉娅说我的行李挡了她的道

translation.en: They were happy to have a babysitter, so they left me with the kids.
translation.zh: 他们很高兴来了个保姆于是把孩子们留给了我

translation.en: You were there, Matthew, and Loretta and some other kids I didn't know.
translation.zh: 马修你当时在那里 还有洛蕾塔和其他一些我不认识的孩子

translation.en: We watched Three's Company on TV.
translation.zh: 我们看电视 看了《三人行》

translation.en: The next day, Dad played tennis and worked in his studio.
translation.zh: 第二天 爸爸忙着打网球和在他的工作室里工作

translation.en: I went down to the beach with the kids.
translation.zh: 我和孩子们去沙滩上玩

translation.en: I got to swim in the ocean, which was really special for me.
translation.zh: 我去海里游了会泳这对我来说是件很特别的事

translation.en: I loved that.
translation.zh: 我喜欢那种感觉

translation.en: Later, I showered in the outdoor shower with my suit on,
translation.zh: 游完泳 我穿着泳衣跑到室外浴室那里淋浴

translation.en: and I realized someone was watching me.
translation.zh: 然后我感觉到有人在看我

translation.en: It was Paul.
translation.zh: 是保罗

translation.en: He smiled at me, almost politely,
translation.zh: 他对我笑 几乎很礼貌

translation.en: and then he lowered his tight bathing suit,
translation.zh: 然后他拉下紧身泳裤

translation.en: took out his penis and started stroking it.
translation.zh: 掏出他的老二 开始打飞机

translation.en: -Paul did?! -Oh, God.
translation.zh: -保罗竟然做了这种事？-天啊

translation.en: I watched him until he finished, and then he walked away.
translation.zh: 我看着他 直到他完事然后他就走开了

translation.en: Did you tell anyone?
translation.zh: 你告诉别人了吗？

translation.en: I told Dad that night.
translation.zh: 我当晚就告诉了爸爸

translation.en: He asked if Paul had touched me, and I said no.
translation.zh: 他问我保罗有没有碰我 我说没有

translation.en: He thought we should probably just leave it.
translation.zh: 他觉得我们该忘掉这事

translation.en: They were going back to the city soon anyway.
translation.zh: 反正他们马上就要回市里了

translation.en: But that if Paul did it again, he'd punch him in the nose.
translation.zh: 但要是保罗敢再这么做他会揍得他满脸开花

translation.en: The next day when I was leaving, I looked around for Dad to say goodbye,
translation.zh: 第二天当我要离开时我四处找爸爸跟他告别

translation.en: but he was playing tennis.
translation.zh: 但他却在打网球

translation.en: I thought about telling your mom, Matthew,
translation.zh: 我想过要不要告诉你母亲 马修

translation.en: but I was afraid she'd get angry at me.
translation.zh: 但我害怕她会冲我发火

translation.en: I remember crying on my way to the ferry.
translation.zh: 我记得那天去渡船码头的路上我痛哭失声

translation.en: Jean, can I ask you a question?
translation.zh: 琼 我能问你个问题吗？

translation.en: Why do you always show up for Dad?
translation.zh: 你为什么总是来看爸爸？

translation.en: Why are you always here?
translation.zh: 你为什么总是来这里？

translation.en: Because I'm a decent person.
translation.zh: 因为我人还算正直吧

translation.en: Even though he never took care of us, it's what you do.
translation.zh: 哪怕他从未照顾过我们我们也该照顾他

translation.en: Besides, I like hanging out with you guys.
translation.zh: 此外 我喜欢和你们一起相处

translation.en: I'm going for a smoke.
translation.zh: 我去抽根烟

translation.en: -Do we kick the shit out of him? -He's 80, it'd kill him.
translation.zh: -我们要狠揍他一顿吗？-他都八十了 这会要了他的老命

translation.en: That's true, or hurt him very badly.
translation.zh: 没错 或者会让他伤得很重

translation.en: -And neither of us could take that nurse. -That's for sure.
translation.zh: -而且我们谁也打不过那个护工-这是肯定的

translation.en: I'm gonna... spit on him.
translation.zh: 那我去…唾他一口

translation.en: No, I know what to do.
translation.zh: 不 我知道该怎么做

translation.en: But good, too. You got to try this.
translation.zh: 不过这感觉也不错 你得试试

translation.en: Shit, this is Maureen's dead ex-husband's cane.
translation.zh: 该死 这是莫琳已逝前夫的拐杖

translation.en: I've never done anything like this.
translation.zh: 我从未做过这种事

translation.en: Me neither.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: -Yeah, man! -I'm with you!
translation.zh: -老天 太爽了！-没错！

translation.en: -Fucking yeah, right? -I'm telling you.
translation.zh: -真他妈爽 不是吗？-还用你说

translation.en: What's that, blood? Who's bleeding?
translation.zh: 这是什么 血？谁在流血？

translation.en: -I don't see it. -Your hand.
translation.zh: -我没看到伤口-是你的手在流血

translation.en: Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: -Your face! -Yeah?
translation.zh: -你的脸也在流血-是吗？

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: -That felt great. -I don't know why we don't do that more.
translation.zh: -这感觉太棒了-为何不多砸一会呢？

translation.en: Pam? Pam!
translation.zh: 帕姆？帕姆！

translation.en: -It's her! It's her! It's her! -Oh, Pam!
translation.zh: -是她！没错！就是她！-帕姆！

translation.en: So, last night his blood pressure was 173, but they gave him hydralazine.
translation.zh: 昨晚他的血压是173但医生给他用了肼酞嗪

translation.en: -And an extra dose of Lopressor. -We got it down to 155.
translation.zh: -并多加了一剂美托洛尔-然后血压降到了155

translation.en: -Oh, good. -Oh, that sounds okay?
translation.zh: -这很好-听起来没事 是吧？

translation.en: -Yeah, he's also on Keppra and morphine. -It's in our notes.
translation.zh: -他还在用左乙拉西坦和吗啡-我们都记下来了

translation.en: -He has sepsis, Pam. -Oh, no.
translation.zh: -他得了败血症 帕姆-太糟了

translation.en: -That was after the coma. -Oh, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -是在麻醉昏迷后得的-真抱歉

translation.en: Drug induced, phenobarbital.
translation.zh: 是药物引发的 苯巴比妥

translation.en: -Pento, actually. -I thought it was phenobarbital.
translation.zh: -其实是戊巴比妥-我记得是苯巴比妥

translation.en: What does it matter? We don't know what either of them are.
translation.zh: 管它呢？反正这两种药我们都不认识

translation.en: Okay. Well, I'll make sure to look in on him.
translation.zh: 好吧 我会找时间去看看他

translation.en: It's so good to see you. Please come back to our unit.
translation.zh: 真高兴见到你请回到我爸爸在的这个医疗部

translation.en: -Are you bleeding? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你在流血？-是的

translation.en: Yeah. Hey.
translation.zh: 是啊 嘿

translation.en: I am too, Pam.
translation.zh: 我也在流血 帕姆

translation.en: How's Dr. Soni? Still on vacation?
translation.zh: 索尼医生怎么样？还在度假？

translation.en: -Oh, I don't know. -Oh, okay.
translation.zh: -我不清楚-好吧

translation.en: -Say hi. That was nice. -She's awesome.
translation.zh: -代我向她问好 这可真好-她人很好

translation.en: I'll be back in two weekends, okay? I love you.
translation.zh: 再过两个周末我就回来 好吗？我爱你

translation.en: I forgive you.
translation.zh: 我原谅你

translation.en: -Forgive me. -Come on!
translation.zh: -请原谅我-该出发了！

translation.en: -We should be getting on, too. -No!
translation.zh: -我们也得走了-不行！

translation.en: Could you stay at least ten or fifteen minutes more?
translation.zh: 能否请你们至少再呆十或十五分钟？

translation.en: -Is that Harold's brothers? -His sons, Danny and Matthew.
translation.zh: -你们是哈罗德的兄弟？-我们是他儿子 丹尼和马修

translation.en: You look just like him.
translation.zh: 你们和他长得真像

translation.en: -Are you bleeding? -Come on.
translation.zh: -你在流血？-快走

translation.en: -What's going on? -Let's go tell Jean.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？-我们去告诉琼

translation.en: -Just run! Run! -Why are we running?
translation.zh: -赶紧跑！快跑！-我们为什么要跑？

translation.en: Smashed it.
translation.zh: 我们把他车砸了

translation.en: -What? -Look!
translation.zh: -什么？-你看！

translation.en: -He has dementia. -We thought you'd be happy!
translation.zh: -他得了老年痴呆-我们以为你会高兴！

translation.en: Why would I be happy about this? You smashed a sick old man's car.
translation.zh: 我为什么要为这种事高兴？你们砸了一个病老头的车

translation.en: -He has dementia? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -他得了老年痴呆？-没错

translation.en: -Let's get you a bandage. -I don't want a bandage.
translation.zh: -我去给你拿个创可贴-我不想要创可贴

translation.en: -I want to let it bleed. Let's go to Bard! -He has dementia.
translation.zh: -我就想让它流血 去巴德学院吧！-他得了老年痴呆

translation.en: He didn't have dementia when he molested Jean.
translation.zh: 他骚扰琼的时候可没得老年痴呆

translation.en: -He didn't molest me. -But let's not minimize it, Jean.
translation.zh: -他没有骚扰我-但别假装没事 琼

translation.en: What he did was shitty and damaging, and, I don't know,
translation.zh: 他的所作所为很烂、很伤人

translation.en: the same asshole's in there somewhere, right? Beneath the dementia.
translation.zh: 他某种意义上还是当初那个混蛋不是吗？掩藏在老年痴呆症之下

translation.en: I'm glad you guys feel better. Unfortunately, I'm still fucked up.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你们俩心情好转了不幸的是 我还是觉得糟心

translation.en: You want to take a swing?
translation.zh: 你想去他车那里敲一棍子吗？

translation.en: I could smash every car in this parking lot
translation.zh: 我可以把这个停车场里的车统统砸个遍

translation.en: and burn the hospital down and it wouldn't un-fuck me up.
translation.zh: 放火烧掉这家医院但这不会让我好过一点

translation.en: You guys will never understand what it's like to be me in this family.
translation.zh: 你们永远理解不了我在这个家里一直以来的感受是什么样的

translation.en: Let's go to Bard.
translation.zh: 我们去巴德学院吧

translation.en: This toast is really stressing me out.
translation.zh: 这个开幕致辞真要把我逼疯了

translation.en: Jean, you sure you don't want to say anything?
translation.zh: 琼 你确定不想致辞吗？

translation.en: -Fuck no. -Okay.
translation.zh: -死都不要-好吧

translation.en: I've had these for a while, but I think they're still good. Want one?
translation.zh: 我拿到这些药一段时间了但估计还有药效 要来一颗吗？

translation.en: -What'll they do to me? -Either bring you up or down.
translation.zh: -吃了会怎么样？-让你要么兴奋起来 要么平静下来

translation.en: Hopefully down, I guess.
translation.zh: 希望是让我平静下来

translation.en: Someone took a bite already.
translation.zh: 看来某人已经吃过了

translation.en: That was me. I had a crumb when I last saw Dad.
translation.zh: 是我 上次见爸爸的时候啃了一点

translation.en: Okay. What did it do to you then?
translation.zh: 好吧 之后效果如何？

translation.en: Just made me annoyed at Dad. I don't know.
translation.zh: 只让我对爸爸生气 我不知道

translation.en: What about Marcus?
translation.zh: 马库斯怎么样？

translation.en: They broke up.
translation.zh: 他俩分手了

translation.en: How do you know that?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: This woman keeps smiling at me.
translation.zh: 那个女人一直对我笑

translation.en: I'm getting a real energy from her.
translation.zh: 她让我打起了精神

translation.en: -She's walking over here. -I look okay?
translation.zh: -她正往这边来-我看起来还行吧？

translation.en: Yeah, you look handsome.
translation.zh: 你帅呆了

translation.en: Are you Harold Meyerowitz's son Matthew?
translation.zh: 你是哈罗德·迈耶罗维茨的儿子马修？

translation.en: Yes, and this is Danny, also Harold Meyerowitz's son.
translation.zh: 是的 这位是丹尼他也是哈罗德·迈耶罗维茨的儿子

translation.en: I just wanted to say your father was a huge influence on me.
translation.zh: 我只想告诉你 你父亲对我影响巨大

translation.en: He was a great teacher. He found a way to make everything sound interesting.
translation.zh: 他是个出色的老师他的课总是趣味横生

translation.en: I met my husband, Gary, in his class.
translation.zh: 在他的课上 我结识了我丈夫加里

translation.en: It was important for us to be here when we heard he was sick.
translation.zh: 当我们听说他病了的时候就觉得必须赶来这里

translation.en: He spoke about you a lot. He was very proud of you.
translation.zh: 他经常提起你 他很为你骄傲

translation.en: -I didn't realize he had two sons. -And a daughter.
translation.zh: -我都不知道他有两个儿子-还有一个女儿

translation.en: -Is that Matt and Danny? -L.J.!
translation.zh: -是马修和丹尼吗？-艾尔杰！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I was in Madrid when I heard.
translation.zh: 我听说这事的时候正在马德里

translation.en: I am so damn heartbroken to hear about the old man.
translation.zh: 听到这个老家伙的遭遇我真是心都碎了

translation.en: -Thanks, L.J. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 艾尔杰-嗯

translation.en: How's he doing? Where is he? I'm coming to visit.
translation.zh: 他怎么样？他在哪儿？我要去看看他

translation.en: He's kind of in a coma right now in Pittsfield.
translation.zh: 他现在正躺在皮茨菲尔德的一家医院里 人事不知

translation.en: I don't give a shit. Let's go tonight.
translation.zh: 我才不管 今晚再去吧！

translation.en: And he has sepsis.
translation.zh: 他还得了败血症

translation.en: It's the hospital, it'll kill you. We got to get him out.
translation.zh: 是医院的错 医院会葬送你我们得带他离开医院

translation.en: He'd love if you came, even if he'll have no idea.
translation.zh: 你来他就很高兴了尽管他现在什么也不知道

translation.en: -We'll take pictures. -We'll take pictures!
translation.zh: -拍个照-拍个照！

translation.en: -Yeah. -Where's Loretta?
translation.zh: -好-洛蕾塔呢？

translation.en: Her daughter got chicken pox, she had to stay in town.
translation.zh: 她女儿得了水痘她得留在市里照顾她

translation.en: She was very disappointed.
translation.zh: 她很懊恼

translation.en: -That's too bad. -I never got chicken pox.
translation.zh: -太糟了-我从未得过水痘

translation.en: You should call her, Dan. I know she'd like to see you.
translation.zh: 你该给她打电话 丹我知道她想见到你

translation.en: -I'm going to. -And you'd like her boyfriend, too.
translation.zh: -我会的-你也会喜欢上她男朋友

translation.en: He's a good man, a screenwriter.
translation.zh: 他是个好男人 一个编剧

translation.en: -Congratulations on the show. -You saw it?
translation.zh: -祝贺这次展览圆满成功-你看到了？

translation.en: I should've never left that opening at MoMA.
translation.zh: 我永远不该中途退出纽约现代博物馆的那场开幕式

translation.en: It was just Dad... I felt obligated.
translation.zh: 当时因为爸爸…我觉得我有责任照顾他

translation.en: You thought you were doing the right thing.
translation.zh: 你觉得你在做正确的事

translation.en: You would've stayed.
translation.zh: 你该留下来

translation.en: I probably would've, yeah, but I would've felt bad about it.
translation.zh: 大概吧 但我会为此感到难受

translation.en: But it's a good lesson. Dad can take care of himself.
translation.zh: 不过这是个很好的教训爸爸能照顾好自己

translation.en: You have to take care of yourself.
translation.zh: 你必须照顾好自己

translation.en: No, he can't, Matt. That's why he's where he is now.
translation.zh: 他不能 马修所以他才会躺在医院里

translation.en: I should've been able to tell something was wrong.
translation.zh: 我应该早点看出来他身体不适的

translation.en: I just thought he was getting old.
translation.zh: 我当时只觉得他老了

translation.en: Shit, I yelled at him.
translation.zh: 该死 我还冲他大喊大叫过呢

translation.en: The guy was suffering and I screamed at him on the street.
translation.zh: 老爸身体那么不适我却在大街上吼他

translation.en: There's no catharsis in shouting at an old person who's dying.
translation.zh: 向一个垂死的老人大喊大叫可不是什么情感宣泄

translation.en: -Do you think he's gonna die? -Hey, Dad!
translation.zh: -你觉得他会死吗？-嗨 爸爸！

translation.en: I want you to meet someone.
translation.zh: 我想给你介绍个人

translation.en: -This is Robin. -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -这位是罗宾-很高兴认识你

translation.en: -You, too. -Hey, I'm Matt.
translation.zh: -我也是-你好 我是马修

translation.en: -Hi. Eliza speaks very highly of you. -Oh, okay.
translation.zh: -嗨 伊丽莎对你评价很高-是嘛

translation.en: -You speak highly of me? -You know what he means.
translation.zh: -你对我评价很高-你知道他在说什么

translation.en: Eliza, you've had two wines already.
translation.zh: 伊丽莎 你已经喝过两杯红酒了

translation.en: -Don't have a beer, too. -I can handle it.
translation.zh: -别再喝啤酒了-我驾驭得了

translation.en: Eliza, it's not good to mix wine and beer.
translation.zh: 伊丽莎 喝完红酒再喝啤酒不好

translation.en: You'll feel cruddy tomorrow.
translation.zh: 你明天会想吐得一塌糊涂

translation.en: -I've done it before, Dad. -Maybe she's right.
translation.zh: -我以前这么喝过 爸爸-也许她是对的

translation.en: Maybe she has a constitution that can handle the grape and the grain.
translation.zh: 也许她的体格能让她同时驾驭葡萄和谷物

translation.en: Please, just stay out of it.
translation.zh: 拜托 少喝点就是了

translation.en: Matt's right. I have the fortitude for it.
translation.zh: 马修说得对 我在这方面很坚韧的

translation.en: I'm telling you, you'll feel like crap.
translation.zh: 听我的话 你会宿醉到头痛欲裂的

translation.en: What the fuck, man?
translation.zh: 天啊 你干什么？

translation.en: What does it matter if she drinks wine and beer?
translation.zh: 她同时喝红酒和啤酒有什么关系？

translation.en: Stop interfering with my parenting, Matt!
translation.zh: 别干预我管教孩子 马修！

translation.en: She's 18! What parenting do you need to do here? She's just a person now.
translation.zh: 她都18岁了！你要怎么管教她？她现在已经是个成人了

translation.en: This is something I do, and I'm quite good at it, okay?
translation.zh: 这是我的事 我也很擅长 可以吗？

translation.en: She and I have a very good relationship when you're not around,
translation.zh: 你不在时 她和我关系非常好

translation.en: so stop ganging up on me!
translation.zh: 别和她联起手反对我！

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: You know, I've enjoyed hanging out recently.
translation.zh: 最近我很喜欢和你们一起相处

translation.en: Yeah, me, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: You know, I wanted to apologize for a long time.
translation.zh: 这么久以来 我一直想向你道歉

translation.en: For what?
translation.zh: 为了什么？

translation.en: I'm pissed at myself because when Dad kicked me out of the house
translation.zh: 我在生我自己的气 因为爸爸把我赶出家门那天

translation.en: and I moved back in with my mom,
translation.zh: 我搬回了我妈家住

translation.en: you made an effort to hang out, and I blew you off.
translation.zh: 你努力想约我出来玩我却一直不搭理你

translation.en: I feel like I fucked that up.
translation.zh: 我觉得是我搞砸了我们的关系

translation.en: I think it's really my fault we're not close.
translation.zh: 因为我 我们的关系才疏远了

translation.en: It's hard to be around Dad.
translation.zh: 在爸爸身边真的很难受

translation.en: And your mom, at that time, they were both so critical, and I was just failing.
translation.zh: 还有你妈妈 那时他俩都爱挑刺我又老犯错

translation.en: -We should go in for our toasts. -Are you disappointed in me?
translation.zh: -我们该进去准备致辞了-你对我失望了吗？

translation.en: What? No! No.
translation.zh: 什么？没有！当然没有

translation.en: I know Dad is, but I thought maybe also you were critical of me
translation.zh: 我知道爸爸失望了 但我觉得也许你也在责怪我

translation.en: -for quitting piano and... -No. No.
translation.zh: -放弃钢琴和…-不 我没有

translation.en: You were my big brother. I looked up to you.
translation.zh: 你是我哥哥 我当时很崇拜你

translation.en: -I quit because it was my protest, okay? -Okay, like McEnroe.
translation.zh: -我放弃是因为我在抗议 知道吗？-嗯 就像麦肯罗那样

translation.en: And also because...
translation.zh: 也因为…

translation.en: it was like walking barefoot through broken glass to get a milkshake.
translation.zh: 当时感觉就像光脚走过一地碎玻璃去拿杯奶昔

translation.en: I love the milkshake, but my feet were bleeding.
translation.zh: 我喜欢奶昔 但我的脚流血不止

translation.en: -I can understand that. -Can you?
translation.zh: -我能理解-你能理解？

translation.en: Because my feeling about you is you can't.
translation.zh: 你给我的感觉是你理解不了

translation.en: It's not your fault.
translation.zh: 但这不怪你

translation.en: But, like Dad, you make me feel really bad about myself.
translation.zh: 但你就像爸爸一样让我觉得自己很差劲

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -I said it's not your fault. -Let's go.
translation.zh: -我说了这不怪你-我们进去吧

translation.en: -Can I ask you something? -What?
translation.zh: -我能问你个问题吗？-什么？

translation.en: A few years ago, when Karen and I had you over to our house
translation.zh: 几年前 你来镇上的时候

translation.en: when you were in town,
translation.zh: 凯伦和我招待你来我们家

translation.en: I didn't hear from you afterwards.
translation.zh: 之后我就再也没有你的消息了

translation.en: Maybe it was because Karen and I insulted you in some way,
translation.zh: 也许是因为凯伦和我无意中冒犯了你

translation.en: or Karen maybe had too much grappa?
translation.zh: 或许是凯伦喝了太多格拉巴酒？

translation.en: No, it was nice. I went back to L.A. I don't know.
translation.zh: 不 你们对我很好后来我回了洛杉矶 我也记不清了

translation.en: Were you bored? Most people find us interesting enough.
translation.zh: 我们当时让你觉得无聊了？大部分人觉得我们还算有趣

translation.en: -We've had no complaints. -It's nothing like that. It's just life.
translation.zh: -没人抱怨过我们无趣-不是这样的 只是生活如此

translation.en: It's not more than that.
translation.zh: 除此以外没别的

translation.en: Well, even in life, you can make an effort.
translation.zh: 哪怕生活如此 你也该努力啊

translation.en: Write an e-mail on one of your phones.
translation.zh: 用个手机发个邮件给我

translation.en: -You say you feel guilt, but... -I'm here now.
translation.zh: -你说你感到内疚 但是…-我现在来了

translation.en: I'm in fucking Rhinebeck. I was just in Pittsfield.
translation.zh: 我他妈现在就在莱茵贝克镇我刚才还在皮茨菲尔德

translation.en: -I've been here. -It shouldn't have come to that!
translation.zh: -我一直在这里-不该走到这个地步的！

translation.en: If Dad survives, you'll go back to L.A.
translation.zh: 要是爸爸病情好转 你会回洛杉矶

translation.en: and I'll be taking care of him for a very long time!
translation.zh: 我会继续照顾他很长一段时间！

translation.en: -We'll all help out. -No, we won't all.
translation.zh: -我们会一起照顾他-不 我们不会

translation.en: It'll be me and Jean.
translation.zh: 照顾爸爸的人会是我和琼

translation.en: And mainly me.
translation.zh: 主要是我

translation.en: -I'll come more often. -You made your priorities clear.
translation.zh: -我会经常过来-你把轻重缓急讲得很清楚

translation.en: I'm tired of apologizing for doing well!
translation.zh: 我受够了为我表现得好而道歉！

translation.en: Ptolemy always asked me why you never talked Dad's work up
translation.zh: 托勒密总是问我你为何从不跟你那些有钱客户们

translation.en: to your wealthy clients.
translation.zh: 谈起爸爸的工作

translation.en: He says you could be really helpful.
translation.zh: 他说你本能帮上大忙

translation.en: It's all about perception.
translation.zh: 看法最重要

translation.en: Dad's a good artist, you know.
translation.zh: 爸爸是个出色的艺术家

translation.en: There's no reason he's not as well-known as L.J.
translation.zh: 没理由他不像艾尔杰一样出名

translation.en: Maybe it's not my responsibility to help Dad, maybe that.
translation.zh: 也许帮助爸爸不是我的责任也许就是这样

translation.en: -No, it's what you do. -And also, maybe he's not so great.
translation.zh: -不 是你不想帮忙-还有 也许他不是很伟大

translation.en: Maybe he's undiscovered for a reason, maybe that.
translation.zh: 也许处于某种原因他的才能才一直未被发现

translation.en: Truth is, we don't know, because we were brainwashed.
translation.zh: 事实是 我们不知道因为我们过去都被洗脑了

translation.en: Why are you so angry at him anyways? He loves everything you do.
translation.zh: 你为什么这么生他的气？你做什么他都喜欢

translation.en: Oh, does he? He doesn't tell me that.
translation.zh: 是吗？他没告诉过我这个

translation.en: He tells me!
translation.zh: 他告诉我了！

translation.en: I should be the one who's angry at him!
translation.zh: 我才是该生他气的那个人！

translation.en: I should hate him... for treating me and Jean like second-class citizens!
translation.zh: 我该恨他…恨他像对待二等公民那样对待我和琼！

translation.en: Then why don't you? You should.
translation.zh: 那你为什么不恨他？你该恨他

translation.en: Listen, you and Jean are gonna get some money.
translation.zh: 听着 你和琼会得到一笔钱

translation.en: We got a great deal on the house and all the art,
translation.zh: 那栋房子和所有的艺术品买了个好价钱

translation.en: and I'm gonna give you both my share.
translation.zh: 我会把我的那份分给你俩

translation.en: It doesn't make up for everything, but you guys really deserve this.
translation.zh: 这弥补不了一切但你们值得拿到这笔钱

translation.en: Dad said this was a family discussion.
translation.zh: 爸爸说卖房子需要我们全家一起决定

translation.en: Wait, did this happen already?
translation.zh: 房子已经卖了？

translation.en: Yes, it's done.
translation.zh: 是的 已经卖了

translation.en: No, he told me we'd decide together!
translation.zh: 不 他告诉我说我们要一起决定！

translation.en: And you do this when he can't say anything?
translation.zh: 而你却趁他说不出来话的时候做了这种事？

translation.en: He told me, Matt! You weren't there!
translation.zh: 他告诉我了 马修！你当时不在！

translation.en: If we didn't do something, we'd be spending the next few years
translation.zh: 要是我们什么也不做接下来的几年都得用在

translation.en: throwing his work into dumpsters.
translation.zh: 把他的作品扔进垃圾车里

translation.en: This way we get something for it.
translation.zh: 卖出去还能换点钱回来

translation.en: I don't care about the money. That house, that work means something to me!
translation.zh: 我才不在乎钱 那栋房子和那些艺术品对我很重要！

translation.en: You should embrace this. I should be the one who cares.
translation.zh: 你该高兴地接受这个事实我才是该在乎的那个

translation.en: I grew up there, it's my house. I should care.
translation.zh: 我在那里长大 那里是我的家我才该在乎

translation.en: -Then why don't you? -Because I don't know.
translation.zh: -那你为什么不在乎？-原因我也不知道

translation.en: You're probably right, I should care, but this makes sense.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我是该在乎但这么做对我们更有意义

translation.en: How could you do this to him?
translation.zh: 你怎么能这么对他？

translation.en: Who could even dream up such a plan?
translation.zh: 谁能想出这么个计划？

translation.en: Me! It's what I do for a living.
translation.zh: 我！我就是靠这个谋生的

translation.en: Ptolemy says you guys make yourself indispensable
translation.zh: 托勒密说你们这些人会让自己从不可或缺的人

translation.en: -to vulnerable rich people. -Tell me more about my business.
translation.zh: -变成脆弱的有钱人-快教教我怎么做生意啊

translation.en: I really want to know what you, or Dad, or fucking Ptolemy thinks
translation.zh: 我还真的很想知道你、爸爸或那个傻逼托勒密

translation.en: about what I do every day for a living.
translation.zh: 对于我为谋生每天做的工作是什么看法呢

translation.en: You kicked me in the shin!
translation.zh: 你踢到我小腿胫骨了！

translation.en: I was disappointed in you for quitting piano.
translation.zh: 你放弃钢琴是让我很失望

translation.en: What the fuck is wrong with you?
translation.zh: 你他妈是怎么回事？

translation.en: I know it's hard! It's hard for all of us! Get it together!
translation.zh: 我知道现在很艰难！我们都很艰难！振作点！

translation.en: You are doing with Tony just what Dad did with me and Jean!
translation.zh: 你现在对托尼所做的就是爸爸当初对我和琼做的！

translation.en: We want to thank Bard for making this show happen,
translation.zh: 我们想感谢巴德学院组织这次展览

translation.en: and thank many of you for making the trip.
translation.zh: 也感谢那些特地赶来的人

translation.en: My dad, and I'm sure every artist involved in this show, would be really pleased.
translation.zh: 我爸爸和参加这个展览的所有艺术家肯定会非常高兴

translation.en: My father was a teacher here for 33 years, so this is particularly special for him.
translation.zh: 我爸爸在这儿当了33年的教员这个展览是特地为他筹办的

translation.en: And... this piece is special for me as it's called "Matthew."
translation.zh: 还有…这个对我来讲很特别的作品它名叫“马修”

translation.en: My father tells a story of how this piece came to be.
translation.zh: 我爸爸跟我讲过这个作品是如何诞生的

translation.en: How I would sit on the hardwood floor of his studio,
translation.zh: 我当时如何坐在他工作室的硬木地板上

translation.en: getting nails in my ass and...
translation.zh: 坐在一地钉子上…

translation.en: hand him tools and make suggestions.
translation.zh: 给他递工具并提出点建议

translation.en: And he would let me help, or let me think I was helping.
translation.zh: 而他会让我帮忙或让我觉得我在帮他忙

translation.en: And when it was done, he'd said we'd made it together...
translation.zh: 作品完成后 他说这是我们共同努力的结果…

translation.en: even though I don't remember it.
translation.zh: 尽管我都不记得这回事了

translation.en: But...
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: I remember...
translation.zh: 我仍记得…

translation.en: that feeling of being very proud.
translation.zh: 那种无比自豪的感觉

translation.en: You know, of wanting to...
translation.zh: 那种想要…

translation.en: be an artist like my dad.
translation.zh: 成为像我爸爸一样的艺术家的感觉

translation.en: And that was a good way to feel.
translation.zh: 这感觉很好

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't know why I'm...
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不知道为什么会…

translation.en: I've just been angry at him for so much of my adult life.
translation.zh: 我成年后的大部分时间都在生他的气

translation.en: I guess I was trying to outrun him...
translation.zh: 我猜是因为我想努力超越他…

translation.en: but I didn't.
translation.zh: 但我没做到

translation.en: I'm still his son.
translation.zh: 我还是他的儿子…

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 而且…

translation.en: I've given away his life's work.
translation.zh: 我还把他毕生的心血都卖掉了

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: And if...
translation.zh: 要是…

translation.en: If Dad doesn't make it, he and I aren't okay.
translation.zh: 要是爸爸挺不过来他和我都不会释怀

translation.en: We never got to be okay.
translation.zh: 我们永远不会释怀

translation.en: -Danny, do you want to say a few words? -Yes. Thank you, Matthew.
translation.zh: -丹尼 你想说几句话吗？-好的 谢谢 马修

translation.en: No, I was giving it to you.
translation.zh: 别 我是要把它给你

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -Why don't you sit here? -Thank you.
translation.zh: -在这里坐会儿吧-谢谢

translation.en: You'll have to bear with me.
translation.zh: 请大家包涵一下

translation.en: I'm not a good speaker, and also, I've never done it.
translation.zh: 我这人不太会在公众面前致辞我也从来没这么做过

translation.en: It's something I've gone through great pains to avoid.
translation.zh: 这是我承受了巨大痛苦来逃避的事情

translation.en: When I used to perform music in front of an audience...
translation.zh: 我曾经在一位观众面前演奏音乐…

translation.en: it was too excruciating.
translation.zh: 那感觉极其痛苦

translation.en: The... reward wasn't...
translation.zh: 回报不能…

translation.en: It just wasn't worth the self-hatred.
translation.zh: 不能安抚我自我憎恨的心

translation.en: Not to mention, unlike my brother Matthew...
translation.zh: 更不用说 不像我弟弟马修…

translation.en: I find this particular piece to be painful,
translation.zh: 我觉得这个作品让我痛苦…

translation.en: because it was during a time I wasn't really speaking with my dad.
translation.zh: 因为我爸爸创作它的时期正是我和他关系破裂的时期

translation.en: He had just left my mom, and Jean, and me,
translation.zh: 他刚离开我妈妈、琼和我

translation.en: and remarried Matthew's mother,
translation.zh: 和马修的母亲再婚

translation.en: whom we really did not like.
translation.zh: 我们很不喜欢她

translation.en: Again, unlike Matt,
translation.zh: 还有 不像马修

translation.en: I was not included in the art-making process.
translation.zh: 我没有参与那个艺术创作过程

translation.en: It was not mine, too.
translation.zh: 这个艺术品也不是我的

translation.en: This piece isn't called "Danny." In fact, there are no "Dannys."
translation.zh: 这个作品不叫“丹尼” 实话说我爸没做过叫“丹尼”的作品

translation.en: Or "Jeans."
translation.zh: 或是叫“琼”的作品

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Hey, some of you know my father is in a hospital in Pittsfield right now.
translation.zh: 你们中的一些人知道我爸爸现在在皮茨菲尔德的一家医院里

translation.en: And... we don't know how that's going to go.
translation.zh: 而且…我们不知道他会不会好起来

translation.en: Our doctor's in China,
translation.zh: 我们的医生跑中国去了

translation.en: -and the only really good nurse we had... -Excuse me.
translation.zh: -我们遇到的唯一真正负责的护士…-借过一下

translation.en: ...got reassigned to a different floor.
translation.zh: 被分配去了其他楼层

translation.en: Maybe...
translation.zh: 也许…

translation.en: Maybe I need to believe my dad was a genius
translation.zh: 也许我需要相信我爸爸是个天才

translation.en: because I don't want his life to be worthless.
translation.zh: 因为我不想他的人生一文不值

translation.en: And... if he isn't a great artist, that means he was just a prick.
translation.zh: 而且…要是他不是个伟大艺术家那就意味着他只是个混蛋

translation.en: But I think the work's good.
translation.zh: 但我觉得这件作品很棒

translation.en: I think it deserved more attention than it got.
translation.zh: 我觉得它值得更多的关注

translation.en: I think that's true. Matt?
translation.zh: 千真万确 对吧 马修？

translation.en: I wish he had more success,
translation.zh: 我希望他获得更大的成功

translation.en: because that would've made his life easier,
translation.zh: 因为这会让他活得轻松点

translation.en: even if that kind of thing doesn't ultimately mean much.
translation.zh: 哪怕这种玩意根本没太大意义

translation.en: I don't know. L.J.?
translation.zh: 我也不知道 你呢 艾尔杰？

translation.en: I don't know either.
translation.zh: 我也不知道

translation.en: If I did, I'd tell you.
translation.zh: 要是知道 我会告诉你的

translation.en: Also, I'm really proud of my daughter, Eliza, who's a freshman here.
translation.zh: 我也很为我的女儿骄傲她叫伊丽莎 是这里的大一新生

translation.en: And really, a talented filmmaker.
translation.zh: 也是一个才华横溢的电影制作人

translation.en: Thank you...
translation.zh: 谢谢…

translation.en: How are you feeling?
translation.zh: 你感觉怎么样？

translation.en: Wow, look at this.
translation.zh: 哇哦 看看谁来了

translation.en: -I love your hair. -Thanks. Robin cut it.
translation.zh: -我喜欢你的发型-谢谢 罗宾帮我剪的

translation.en: -I wish I had the guts to do it. -Hey, Robin.
translation.zh: -真希望我也有胆剪个这个发型-嗨 罗宾

translation.en: -Do it! Robin will do it right now! -I've got scissors in my bag.
translation.zh: -那就剪吧！罗宾现在就能给你剪！-剪刀就在我包里

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: How's the hip?
translation.zh: 髋部怎么样？

translation.en: I'm bionic now.
translation.zh: 我现在也是有人工髋骨的人了

translation.en: That's a reference for Jean only.
translation.zh: 这句话仅供琼参考

translation.en: I know what bionic is.
translation.zh: 我知道人工髋骨是什么

translation.en: -I don't. -It's a show.
translation.zh: -我不知道-是个电视节目

translation.en: You taught me well.
translation.zh: 你把我教得很好

translation.en: With a head full of dreams and a backpack filled with candy,
translation.zh: 带着满怀梦想的心和塞满糖果的背包

translation.en: I set out on my journey.
translation.zh: 我踏上了旅途

translation.en: Sometimes, when you least expect it...
translation.zh: 有时 在你最不经意的时候…

translation.en: Are you going my way?
translation.zh: 要搭便车吗？

translation.en: ...you may meet a new friend. Slap!
translation.zh: 你会遇见新朋友 啪！

translation.en: Slap! Slap! Slap!
translation.zh: 啪！啪！啪！

translation.en: -Jean, that's you with the rabbit. -You're gonna miss it.
translation.zh: -琼 是你和那只兔子-你会错过这个的

translation.en: Kiss. Slap.
translation.zh: 亲吻 啪

translation.en: Something changed inside me that day.
translation.zh: 那天我的内心发生了某种改变

translation.en: The end?
translation.zh: 剧终？

translation.en: Jean, you were so good.
translation.zh: 琼 你演得真好

translation.en: -She's got real chops. -I was well-edited.
translation.zh: -她演技很好-只是剪辑比较出色啦

translation.en: That's wonderful, honey.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 这太棒了

translation.en: I don't know that I've seen a sex scene shot quite like that before.
translation.zh: 我都不知道以前看没看过像这样的激情戏拍摄手法

translation.en: I used deliberately very harsh, direct light.
translation.zh: 我故意用了非常刺目的直射光

translation.en: I wanted to appear very unattractive.
translation.zh: 我想表现得毫无魅力

translation.en: Wonderful mise-en-scène.
translation.zh: 舞台布景真棒

translation.en: For my Jeopardy! parody I did at my office,
translation.zh: 我模仿《危险边缘！》拍的作品是在我的办公室拍的

translation.en: we just had to use the overhead fluorescents.
translation.zh: 只需用到头顶的日光灯

translation.en: Yours had wonderful mise-en-scène as well, Jean.
translation.zh: 你的作品舞台布景也很棒 琼

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: And this is your best yet, Eliza.
translation.zh: 这是你至今最棒的作品 伊丽莎

translation.en: Thanks, Dad. I've made eight more since then.
translation.zh: 谢谢 爸爸 自那之后我又拍了八部作品

translation.en: I'm in five of them.
translation.zh: 其中五部都有我的参与

translation.en: Bruno! Did you hit traffic?
translation.zh: 布鲁诺！你路上堵车了？

translation.en: -We were expecting you earlier. -I brought lunch.
translation.zh: -我们以为你会早点到-我带了午餐过来

translation.en: The Dad is being very stubborn.
translation.zh: 老爹非常顽固

translation.en: I can't get him to do any of his exercises.
translation.zh: 不肯听我的去做复建运动

translation.en: How's he doing?
translation.zh: 他怎么样？

translation.en: Well, the earliest appointment we can get with the neurologist is next month.
translation.zh: 那个神经病医师最早也要下个月才有空

translation.en: It's a lot for me to do by myself here.
translation.zh: 我这里有一大堆活儿要做

translation.en: Oh, fortunately, we got a little more money from the sale.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 卖了那栋房子后我们小赚了一笔

translation.en: Oh, James sent photos
translation.zh: 詹姆斯寄来了照片

translation.en: of one of the sculptures in the retirement home in Arizona.
translation.zh: 拍的是一个放置他在亚利桑那州开的养老院里的雕塑

translation.en: They look quite stunning.
translation.zh: 看起来相当棒

translation.en: I have to say, I was very surprised that you tried to stop the deal
translation.zh: 我得说 我当时很惊讶在费了那么大劲促成房屋出售后

translation.en: after all the trouble you went through setting it up.
translation.zh: 你却试图阻止这事

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 这个嘛…

translation.en: I just thought... I changed my mind.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得…我改主意了

translation.en: Well, it was my decision, as I'm next of kin.
translation.zh: 决定权在我 毕竟我才是最近的亲属

translation.en: It's too late now.
translation.zh: 现在木已成舟了

translation.en: I found these in The Dad's things. I think they're yours.
translation.zh: 我在老爹的物品里发现了这个我觉得这是你的太阳镜

translation.en: They're Danny's.
translation.zh: 这是丹尼的

translation.en: We just have to finish filling out these insurance forms,
translation.zh: 我们得填完这些保险表格

translation.en: which seem to be written in a foreign language.
translation.zh: 这些表格看起来像是用外语写的

translation.en: Why don't you ask me? Somebody in my company will do that.
translation.zh: 你为何不让我帮忙？我公司的人就能帮你填这个

translation.en: Well, I don't like to ask for...
translation.zh: 我不喜欢…

translation.en: help.
translation.zh: 求助

translation.en: -Let me do it, okay? -But it's a big day.
translation.zh: -把这事交给我 好吗？-不过今天是个大日子

translation.en: It's The Dad's first meal off of the feeding tube.
translation.zh: 是老爹摘除喂食管后第一次正常吃饭的日子

translation.en: He's very excited that you brought lunch.
translation.zh: 你带午餐过来让他很开心

translation.en: He's watching TCM.
translation.zh: 他在看特纳经典电影频道

translation.en: Hey, Dad.
translation.zh: 嗨 爸爸

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: What are you watching?
translation.zh: 你在看什么？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我也不知道

translation.en: In these '30s movies, the men wore tuxedos all the time.
translation.zh: 这些二十世纪三十年代老电影里的男演员们老是穿着晚礼服

translation.en: Things have gotten much more casual.
translation.zh: 现在人们就穿得随便多了

translation.en: Maybe they dressed up because they lived shorter lives back then,
translation.zh: 也许他们这么盛装打扮是因为当时他们寿命比较短

translation.en: wanted to celebrate life.
translation.zh: 总是想要庆祝生命

translation.en: We spent three hours today at Goodwill.
translation.zh: 今天我们在古德维尔逛了三个小时

translation.en: The Dad had a funny joke.
translation.zh: 老爹讲了个有趣的笑话

translation.en: What was that?
translation.zh: 什么笑话？

translation.en: I'll set you up again.
translation.zh: 我再来一遍

translation.en: We spent three hours today at Goodwill.
translation.zh: 今天我们在古德维尔逛了三个小时

translation.en: Which pretty much destroyed mine.
translation.zh: 逛到我骨头歪了

translation.en: -That's good, Dad. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -挺逗的 爸爸-谢谢

translation.en: You should see the other dog.
translation.zh: 没有最惨 只有更惨

translation.en: That's true, The Dad got very impatient.
translation.zh: 没错 老爹很不耐烦了

translation.en: As we were handing over the boxes,
translation.zh: 在我们移交那些箱子的时候

translation.en: I saw that I had accidentally included my good wok,
translation.zh: 我发现自己不小心把我那口好炒锅放进去了

translation.en: and I hesitated.
translation.zh: 我犹豫了

translation.en: Then I thought,
translation.zh: 然后我想

translation.en: "I haven't made Chinese food in ten years. I'm not gonna make Chinese food again."
translation.zh: “我有十年没做中国菜了以后也不想再做了”

translation.en: But you have your idea of yourself,
translation.zh: 但如果自己有想法的话

translation.en: and you want to hold onto that.
translation.zh: 就要坚持自己的想法

translation.en: -You okay? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你还好吧？-嗯

translation.en: Dad, take it easy.
translation.zh: 爸爸 放松

translation.en: We just got you out of the hospital, we don't want you to go back!
translation.zh: 我们刚把你从医院接回来不想这么快把你送回去！

translation.en: It was very unpleasant in the hospital.
translation.zh: 住院的感觉真难受

translation.en: You know, I was there for a couple of months.
translation.zh: 我住了好几个月的院

translation.en: -I know. -Maureen has been my savior.
translation.zh: -我知道-莫琳一直是我的救星

translation.en: Harold, you're getting brown sauce all over the sheets.
translation.zh: 哈罗德 你把棕色酱汁洒得满床单都是

translation.en: No, now you're just rubbing it in.
translation.zh: 别搓了 都吸在单子里面了

translation.en: Matt, could you help The Dad get ready for his nap?
translation.zh: 马修 你能帮忙让老爹小睡一下吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: I'm gonna try to visit more.
translation.zh: 我会努力多来看你

translation.en: It's hard because Tony starts kindergarten this year,
translation.zh: 这有点难办 托尼今年要上幼儿园了

translation.en: and I want to be there for that.
translation.zh: 我想陪在他身边 照顾好他

translation.en: But I want to be here more.
translation.zh: 但我想多来看看你

translation.en: L.J.'s coming for lunch in a couple of weeks.
translation.zh: 几周后 艾尔杰要来吃午饭

translation.en: You should come for that.
translation.zh: 你该过来和我们一起共进午餐

translation.en: He left me a very effusive message about my show,
translation.zh: 关于我的展览 他给我留了一段非常感情横溢的信息

translation.en: and someone wrote a rave on my Google.
translation.zh: 有人在我的谷歌上留了一段热情赞语

translation.en: It was very inspired of you to set that up.
translation.zh: 你的安排非常鼓舞人心

translation.en: -Jean and Danny organized it, Dad. -Is that right?
translation.zh: -爸爸 展览组织人是琼和丹尼-是吗？

translation.en: -But you made the sale. -Yeah, that was me.
translation.zh: -但负责销售的是你-对 是我

translation.en: I bought a piece back from Brian and James.
translation.zh: 我从布莱恩和詹姆斯那里买回了一个作品

translation.en: It's the piece from the show, "Matthew."
translation.zh: 就是展览上那个名为“马修”的作品

translation.en: Because "Matthew" and...
translation.zh: 因为它名为“马修” 而且…

translation.en: we did it together.
translation.zh: 它是我们一起创作的

translation.en: Thank you for...
translation.zh: 谢谢你…

translation.en: letting me be a part of your process.
translation.zh: 让我参与你的创作过程

translation.en: It had a big effect on me, Dad.
translation.zh: 这对我影响很大 爸爸

translation.en: Your confidence was contagious.
translation.zh: 你的自信极富传染力

translation.en: And I think that's why I'm able to do what I do now.
translation.zh: 我觉得这正是我能从事现在这份工作的原因

translation.en: I remember I made "Matthew" in 1966, the year the Whitney bought my piece.
translation.zh: 我记得“马修”是我在1966年惠特尼买下我作品那年创作的

translation.en: It couldn't have been 1966.
translation.zh: 不可能是1966年

translation.en: It was. I didn't work in bronze after that.
translation.zh: 是的 那之后我再没创作过青铜作品

translation.en: I wasn't born yet.
