translation.zh: 我那时还没出生

translation.en: Oh, that's right, isn't it?
translation.zh: 没错 是吧？

translation.en: Then it couldn't have been you watching me, could it?
translation.zh: 那当时看我创作的人就不可能是你 不是吗？

translation.en: Maybe it was your brother.
translation.zh: 也许是你哥哥

translation.en: You should've called it "Danny."
translation.zh: 那你该给它取名叫“丹尼”

translation.en: You're right, I should have.
translation.zh: 的确如此

translation.en: I'm going to go to sleep now.
translation.zh: 我先睡了

translation.en: It's okay if you want to sit here longer while I fall asleep.
translation.zh: 我睡着后你不用着急走

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: I love you, Dad.
translation.zh: 我爱你 爸爸

translation.en: Love you.
translation.zh: 我也爱你

translation.en: Hey, my brother.
translation.zh: 嘿 弟弟

translation.en: -My brother. -Thanks for paying for this.
translation.zh: -你好 哥哥-谢谢你的慷慨解囊

translation.en: The private room is... It's not necessary.
translation.zh: 没必要…给我弄个单人病房

translation.en: I can get work done this way.
translation.zh: 这样我能安静做事

translation.en: -How was Dad? -Oh, I don't know.
translation.zh: -爸爸怎么样？-我不知道

translation.en: He's still Dad.
translation.zh: 他还是老样子

translation.en: You know, I said goodbye to him so many times in my head,
translation.zh: 我在脑海中跟他告别了很多次

translation.en: it's strange, in a way, I wasn't prepared for him to survive.
translation.zh: 我现在感觉怪怪的没想到他真能挺过来

translation.en: Well, now we'll know what to do the next time.
translation.zh: 现在我们会知道接下来做什么

translation.en: The three of us had a real rhythm going.
translation.zh: 我们三个之前步调很一致

translation.en: I just don't want to have to speak publicly again.
translation.zh: 我不想再得面对公众讲话

translation.en: You know, sometimes I wish
translation.zh: 有时我希望

translation.en: Dad had done one horrible, unforgivable thing,
translation.zh: 爸爸曾做过一件极为恶劣不可原谅的事

translation.en: something specific I could be angry about.
translation.zh: 一件我可以为此生气的事

translation.en: But it isn't one thing,
translation.zh: 但没有这样一件事

translation.en: it's tiny things every day.
translation.zh: 只有日常生活中的小事

translation.en: It's drip, drip, drip.
translation.zh: 点点滴滴的小摩擦

translation.en: I'm sorry I couldn't stop the house and the art from being sold.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉我没能阻止那栋房子和艺术品的出售

translation.en: In the end, Maureen was determined.
translation.zh: 最后 莫琳决定要卖了它们

translation.en: I'm over it.
translation.zh: 这件事我已经释怀了

translation.en: I'm not.
translation.zh: 我还没有

translation.en: I think these are your Vuarnets.
translation.zh: 我想这是你的瓦内特太阳镜

translation.en: I thought those were yours.
translation.zh: 我以为这是你的

translation.en: -Maybe they were mine. -No, I think you're right.
translation.zh: -也许是我的-不 我想你说得对

translation.en: -They're mine. -I'm remembering now owning them.
translation.zh: -这是我的-我想起这是我的了

translation.en: -No, they look like a pair I had. -No, you're right.
translation.zh: -不对 这看起来很像我以前的墨镜-不 你说得对

translation.en: -They were mine. -Give me them.
translation.zh: -这是我的-给我

translation.en: Well, you can have them anyway.
translation.zh: 好吧 给你就给你吧

translation.en: Can you help me walk?
translation.zh: 你能扶我起来走走吗？

translation.en: The nurse is supposed to be here to do it, but I get antsy.
translation.zh: 这本该是护士的工作但我有点坐烦了

translation.en: Hey, I loved Eliza's new movie.
translation.zh: 嘿 我喜欢伊丽莎的新电影

translation.en: It's good, right?
translation.zh: 很棒吧？

translation.en: -You've done a great job with her. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -你把她教育得很好-谢谢

translation.en: You know, I'm glad she likes you so much.
translation.zh: 我很高兴她那么喜欢你

translation.en: Hey, when you get out of here, you want to come to L.A.?
translation.zh: 等你出院后 你想来洛杉矶吗？

translation.en: I love Los Angeles. I haven't been there, but I love it.
translation.zh: 我爱洛杉矶 我从未去过那儿但是我很喜欢那地方

translation.en: You could stay with me, see what you think.
translation.zh: 你可以和我一起住 看看感觉如何

translation.en: I don't know. The weather's nice.
translation.zh: 我不知道 那里天气不错

translation.en: I could get you a ticket in a couple of weeks.
translation.zh: 几周后我可以给你买张票

translation.en: I don't know. I think I should stay and help Maureen with Dad.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我觉得我该留下来帮莫琳照顾爸爸

translation.en: I have sympathy for her, but I don't trust her.
translation.zh: 我同情她 但我不信任她

translation.en: Well, if you change your mind...
translation.zh: 要是你改主意了就告诉我…

translation.en: I was gonna stay here longer, but I think I should leave tonight
translation.zh: 我本打算在这里待久一点但我想我该今晚离开

translation.en: and get back to Tony.
translation.zh: 回到托尼身边

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Go be with your boy.
translation.zh: 没错 回去陪你儿子

translation.en: Thanks for, you know...
translation.zh: 谢谢你…

translation.en: taking care of me.
translation.zh: 照顾我

translation.en: Maureen went into town for groceries a few hours ago.
translation.zh: 几小时前 莫琳去市里买菜去了

translation.en: The famous blueberry pancakes.
translation.zh: 著名的蓝莓煎饼

translation.en: I don't know what she could be doing.
translation.zh: 我不知道她在搞些什么

translation.en: How's her drinking?
translation.zh: 她还酗酒吗？

translation.en: I made her a deal.
translation.zh: 我跟她约法三章

translation.en: I said we'd put in a pool if she stopped drinking.
translation.zh: 我说要是她能戒酒我们就在家里建个泳池

translation.en: You know, since the Bard show,
translation.zh: 巴德学院的展览结束后

translation.en: Matthew has personally invested in a piece of mine.
translation.zh: 马修以个人的名义投资了我的一个作品

translation.en: You should have seen Matt, Dad.
translation.zh: 你该看看马修的 爸爸

translation.en: When you were sick, he was there the whole time.
translation.zh: 你病的时候 他一直在这里

translation.en: He really whipped us into shape.
translation.zh: 他让我们拧成一条绳

translation.en: I think you and Jean should look into getting me a solo show.
translation.zh: 我觉得你和琼该想办法让我开场个人展览

translation.en: That would put me back on the map.
translation.zh: 这会让我重振威名

translation.en: You know, we were all there the whole time.
translation.zh: 我们三个当时一直在这里

translation.en: Every time I turn on TCM, it's Meet Me in St. Louis.
translation.zh: 每次打开特纳经典电影频道就看到《相约圣路易斯》

translation.en: What's on the premium channels?
translation.zh: 付费频道都播什么？

translation.en: It was rough there for a minute. We thought we might lose you.
translation.zh: 当时情形一度很危急我们以为可能会失去你

translation.en: There's something called Sex Tape on Starz. You know anything about that?
translation.zh: Starz频道有个叫《性爱录像带》的节目 你知道吗？

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: 不太知道

translation.en: Should we try it?
translation.zh: 要不要看一看？

translation.en: -Hello? -Hi, Mom!
translation.zh: -喂？-嗨 妈妈

translation.en: -Hi, honey. -Maureen is leaving for Cuba on Monday.
translation.zh: -嗨 亲爱的-莫琳周一要离开去古巴

translation.en: I thought you could stay with me while she's away.
translation.zh: 我想她不在的期间你可以过来和我一起住

translation.en: You know, Matt invited me to L.A.
translation.zh: 其实马修邀请我去洛杉矶

translation.en: I'm still recovering. I could really use the help.
translation.zh: 我还在康复期 我非常需要你的帮助

translation.en: -Have you ever been to L.A.? -You're still recovering, too.
translation.zh: -你去过洛杉矶吗？-你也还在康复期

translation.en: And we've got the premium channels now. We get the Knicks.
translation.zh: 我们现在能看付费频道了能看尼克斯队的比赛

translation.en: I know. I lived here when you were in the hospital.
translation.zh: 我知道 你住院时我就住在这里

translation.en: You'll have a nurse with you.
translation.zh: 会有一名护士看护你

translation.en: I really need you to stay with me. I'm asking you to do this, please.
translation.zh: 我非常需要你留下来照顾我我在请求你留下来 拜托

translation.en: You know I don't like asking for things. I need you, Danny.
translation.zh: 你知道我不喜欢求人我需要你 丹尼

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I think there's some of Jean's cookies in the dining room, if you take a look.
translation.zh: 去餐厅看看 我记得那里还有一些琼做的饼干

translation.en: I'll take you to lunch next week at Baba Louie's,
translation.zh: 下周我带你去芭芭·路易斯餐厅吃午餐

translation.en: which is the best pizza in the Berkshires, maybe the best pizza period.
translation.zh: 那里的披萨是全伯克郡最好吃的也许世界上最好吃的披萨

translation.en: Okay, thanks.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢

translation.en: Pick a day.
translation.zh: 你决定哪天去

translation.en: Except Saturday, L.J.'s coming up for lunch,
translation.zh: 除了周六不行 艾尔杰要来吃午饭

translation.en: so you'll need to find something else to do,
translation.zh: 你得找些其他事做

translation.en: but you could go to a movie, or I think there's bowling.
translation.zh: 不过你可以去看个电影或是打个保龄球什么的

translation.en: -Sorry. -Danny, what are you doing?
translation.zh: -抱歉-丹尼 你搞什么？

translation.en: Sorry, Dad, I didn't think that would be so loud.
translation.zh: 对不起 爸爸 我没想到声音会这么大

translation.en: See if you can rescue some of the cookies from the porcelain.
translation.zh: 看看能不能从瓷器碎片中捡起几块没摔碎的饼干

translation.en: I'm leaving now, Dad. I'm gonna drive back to the city.
translation.zh: 我要走了 爸爸 我要开车回市里

translation.en: -You'll be here, right? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你会待在这里吧？-是的

translation.en: I'll clean this up, don't worry.
translation.zh: 我会把这些打扫干净 别担心

translation.en: And then I'm going to L.A. to see Matthew.
translation.zh: 然后我要去洛杉矶看望马修

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: I forgive you.
translation.zh: 我原谅你

translation.en: Forgive me.
translation.zh: 请原谅我

translation.en: Thank you. Goodbye.
translation.zh: 谢谢 再见

translation.en: Flight leaves at 4:30. You think we'll be okay?
translation.zh: 飞机四点半起飞 我们能赶上吧？

translation.en: Yeah, traffic is fine, and you're flying business class,
translation.zh: 交通很顺畅 而且你是商务舱

translation.en: so the check-in should be quicker.
translation.zh: 登机应该比其他人快

translation.en: I've never flown business class.
translation.zh: 我从未坐过商务舱

translation.en: I've never done business.
translation.zh: 我从来不是商务人士

translation.en: My brother had miles.
translation.zh: 我弟弟有航程优惠

translation.en: This is a good time to go to the airport.
translation.zh: 现在很适合去机场

translation.en: It's coming back that's the problem.
translation.zh: 从机场回来的路比较堵

translation.en: I'll probably get stuck in that traffic on the way back.
translation.zh: 等我回来的时候大概也会堵在这里

translation.en: -Can you wait for one second? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -能稍等片刻吗？-好的

translation.en: Loretta!
translation.zh: 洛蕾塔！

translation.en: Loretta!
translation.zh: 洛蕾塔！

translation.en: Danny!
translation.zh: 丹尼！

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm just consulting for someone around the corner
translation.zh: 天啊 我刚在给某客户做咨询

translation.en: and went to get tea.
translation.zh: 然后去喝杯茶

translation.en: -What are you doing in Stuy Town? -I was going for a ride with my chauffeur.
translation.zh: -你来史蒂城做什么？-我在和我的司机兜风

translation.en: No, I'm kidding. I'm on my way out to the Coast.
translation.zh: 不 开玩笑的 我要去西海岸

translation.en: -Coast? -Los Angeles.
translation.zh: -西海岸？-洛杉矶

translation.en: Los Angeles, really?
translation.zh: 你要去洛杉矶？

translation.en: Yeah, that's the town car. Matt got it for me.
translation.zh: 是的 那是马修给我订的专车

translation.en: I usually take the A train.
translation.zh: 我通常是坐地铁

translation.en: No, this is not representative of where I am in my life.
translation.zh: 这不代表我的生活状态

translation.en: Yeah, I'm going to stay with him for a while.
translation.zh: 我要去他那里待一段时间

translation.en: Oh, that's nice. What's this cane?
translation.zh: 不错啊 这个拐杖是什么？

translation.en: Oh, this is an affectation I'm trying.
translation.zh: 是我装模作样的新道具

translation.en: No, new hip.
translation.zh: 不是的 我换了个人工髋骨

translation.en: Oh, wow! Dan, are you okay?
translation.zh: 哦！丹 你还好吧？

translation.en: Yeah, better.
translation.zh: 比以前好多了

translation.en: I tried my best to ignore it, but the hip won out.
translation.zh: 我努力去忽视它 但还是髋骨赢了

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 这个嘛…

translation.en: Oh, my God! How's your dad?
translation.zh: 忘了问你！你爸爸怎么样？

translation.en: He's okay. He's out of the hospital.
translation.zh: 他很好 已经出院了

translation.en: Oh, that's great. My dad was worried.
translation.zh: 太好了 我爸爸当时很担心

translation.en: Yeah, he's better health-wise. Otherwise, he's the same.
translation.zh: 他的养生观念更好否则 他也会和我爸一样

translation.en: Sometimes they're just the same, aren't they?
translation.zh: 有时他们简直一样 不是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, he's still waiting for his life to begin.
translation.zh: 是啊 他还在等待开始新人生

translation.en: Oh, no, but he's done so well, don't you think?
translation.zh: 不会吧 但他的事业很成功你不觉得吗？

translation.en: -I don't know, has he? -He has.
translation.zh: -我不知道 他有吗？-他有

translation.en: He taught all those years at Bard. I used to love to hear him talk about art.
translation.zh: 他在巴德学院教了这么多年书我过去很喜欢听他谈论艺术

translation.en: He did good work. His kids are great. It's a shame he can't feel that way.
translation.zh: 他课教得好 孩子也很优秀他没有这种想法真是太遗憾了

translation.en: L.J. mentioned you were seeing a screenwriter?
translation.zh: 艾尔杰提过你在和一个编剧交往？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that didn't take.
translation.zh: 早分了

translation.en: You know, after my divorce, I don't know what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 自从离婚后 我都不知道自己在干嘛

translation.en: I won't be leaving New York for good. I'll be back.
translation.zh: 我不是永远离开纽约 我会回来的

translation.en: That's what everyone says who goes to L.A., then it's 20 years later.
translation.zh: 每个去洛杉矶的人都这么说然后一晃眼 二十年过去了

translation.en: -I'll see you in 20 years. -Okay, bye.
translation.zh: -那二十年后见-好啊 再见

translation.en: No, I have to come back
translation.zh: 不行 我必须回来

translation.en: for Eliza's Freshman Film Festival in a month.
translation.zh: 参加一个月后伊丽莎的大一新生电影节

translation.en: -Can I come? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我能去吗？-可以啊

translation.en: It's at Bard.
translation.zh: 电影节在巴德学院举行

translation.en: I'd love to come.
translation.zh: 我很想去看看

translation.en: It's not un-pornographic, I'm warning you.
translation.zh: 事先申明 会有色情作品

translation.en: -I'm in the art world, I've seen it all. -She's really talented, I think.
translation.zh: -我生活在艺术世界 什么都见识过-我觉得她真的很有才华

translation.en: You know, I think she's got something.
translation.zh: 我觉得她身上有某种艺术特质

translation.en: I'm sure she does. It's a talented family.
translation.zh: 她肯定有 艺术细胞就流淌在她的家族血脉里

translation.en: I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 就是说啊

translation.en: Well, something to look forward to, isn't it?
translation.zh: 有盼头了 对吗？

translation.en: Here it is.
translation.zh: 在这里

translation.en: This is him.
translation.zh: 是他的作品

translation.en: That's so cool.
translation.zh: 这可真酷
